El joven José de 25 años de edad es soltero, no tiene  hijos  que depende de él vive en una comunidad de Nacaome, valle al sur de Honduras, no  tiene casa propia, vive con sus padres y se dedica desde hace 08  años  a la venta de leche, su venta es de forma ambulante el viaja en su bicicleta todos los días de para vender su producto.
José es un joven luchador que desea salir adelante está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de mas leche, ya que la demanda es buena y tiene buena oferta también desea comprar cuajada para revenderla en los mercados de la zona,  con el apoyo de este crédito espera mejorar su ingreso y por ende su calidad de vida él desea comprarse una bicicleta para mejorar su negocio.
 Su sueño es mejorar  su negocio y tener una casa propia. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Mayo del 2015.
texts.en:
José is a 25-year-old young man. He is single and has no children depending on him. He lives in a community within Nacaome, in the Valle department in southern Honduras. He does not have his own house, so he lives with his parents. For eight years, has earned his living selling milk as a street vendor. He travels on his bicycle every day in order to sell his product.

José is a determined young man who would like to get ahead. He is requesting the loan for the purchase of more milk, as demand is good and he has good sales. He would also like to buy "cuajada" [a fresh white cheese] to resell in the local markets. With the support of this loan, he expects to improve his income and therefore his quality of life. He would like to buy himself a bicycle to improve his business.

His dream is to improve his business and have his own house.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - May 2015

loans.use: to purchase milk and "cuajada" [a fresh white cheese]

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Don Gerardo, es un señor trabajador, luchador. Ha trabajado con ADIM, durante 44 ciclos, demostrando ser una persona cumplida y responsable con las cuotas de pagos.  Se dedica a la venta de leña y además es agricultor de varios productos  como frijol, maíz, verduras etc. el ejerce esta actividad económica más de 40 años. Actualmente está solicitando crédito para invertirlo en fertilizantes, y comprara 10 quintales de urea. Con el fin de garantizar que su producción sea de calidad y así conquistar a la clientela.
texts.en: Gerardo is a hardworking, tenacious man.  He has worked with ADIM for 44 loan cycles, and has shown himself to be punctual and responsible with his payments. He is engaged in selling wood, and he is also a farmer who grows beans, corn, vegetables, and other products.  He has been engaged in this business for over forty years.  Currently, he is requesting a loan to invest in fertilizer, and to purchase 10 quintals of urea in order to ensure that his production is of quality, and thus, win customers.  .

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and 10 quintals of urea.

loans.name: Adelina

texts.en: Adelina is 60 years old and married. She operates a grocery store, which she has been doing for a number of years. She earns a good return, in addition to her husband's income. Adelina joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and develop her skill in business engagements. She requested her second loan for 7,000 PHP which she will use to buy more inventory to sell. She hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more inventory to sell in her grocery store.

loans.name: Juditha

texts.en: Juditha has always dreamed of opening and managing her own retail store to support her needs. Juditha is a widow and lives in Banonong, Dapitan City, in the Philippines. She applied for a loan to restock her store with basic inventory items like sugar, oil, milk and canned goods. She is now on her way to repaying the loan with her new profits and supporting her children.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic inventory items like sugar, oil, milk and canned goods

loans.name: Luzvillan

texts.en:
Luzvillan, 37 years old, is married and a resident of Jose Dalman, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. Luzvillan with her husband has had a small fish vending business. They have been in this business for many years already, selling fish in different neighborhoods using a motorcycle. Since she wants to be more productive, she has now decided to expand her resources, purchasing fish in bulk for resale at market.

In March of 2013, both Luzvillan and her husband agreed to join Paglaum MPC to seek financial assistance for her existing business. But aside from financial assistance they received, they say that they also enjoyed the add-on benefits like insurance and savings. She has now applied for a loan of 12,000PHP to buy her fish for resale. She hopes that with Paglaum’s help, and with the patience and diligence of her husband, she is looking forward to being a successful vendor someday and eventually owning a stall in the public market.

loans.use: To buy more fish for resale

location.town: SINDANGAN-TAMIL, JOSE DALMAN, ZAMBONGA DEL NORTE

loans.name: La Barranca L Group

texts.es:
Claudia es una mujer de 26 años de edad, es casada tiene un lindo hijo de un año, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de San Andrés Semetabaj.
Claudia (es la que se encuentra en medio de la fotografía de blusa negra) con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la compra y venta de granos básicos como frijoles, arroz, ella tiene cuatro años de realizar esta labor.
Claudia ahora se ve a la necesidad de comprar sus puertas y ventanas para terminar su casa, pues ella no ha logrado comprarlos porque no cuenta con el dinero necesario, por tal motivo tomo la decisión de unirse a un grupo de mujeres para juntas solicitar un préstamo para cubrir esta necesidad.
Claudia sueña con poder comprar un terreno  y darle estudio a su hijo.
texts.en:
Claudia, age 26, is married and has a beautiful one year old son.  This humble family lives in a community in San Andrés Semetabaj.

Claudia (she is in the middle of the photo, and she is wearing a black blouse) buys and sells basic products like rice and beans in order to get income and get her family ahead.  She has been engaged in this work for four years.

Claudia now needs to buy doors and windows in order to finish her house.  However, she has not managed to buy them because she does not have the needed money.  That is the reason she decided to get together with a group of women in order to jointly request a loan to cover this necessity.

Claudia dreams of being able to buy a piece of land and of giving her son an education.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows.

loans.name: Carlos Borromeo

texts.es:
Carlos, de 53 años de edad, tiene 30 años de casado y tiene 4 hijos, 2 de sus hijos todavía viven con ellos y estudian educación básica, los otros dos trabajan y estudian.
 
Carlos, trabaja en una institución de seguridad, también comercializa con especies menores (venta de cerdos y aves de corral), su esposa lo apoya en esta actividad, ya que ellos compran los cerdos  pequeños, los crecen y engordan para luego destazarlos y comercializar la carne o llevarlos al  tianguis de la ciudad más cercana, su hijo lo apoya en el cuido de estos animales.

Carlos, necesita el crédito para aumentar la crianza de cerdos, comprar alimento y vitaminas para  los animales, con esto contribuirá  a generar más ingresos para su familia.

Carlos, anhela que su negocio siga prosperando, ya que en este negocio están involucrados  miembros de su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is 53 years old.  He has been married for 30 years and has 4 children.  Two of his children still live with them and study basic education, the other two work and study.  

Carlos works in a security institution, but also sells small animals such as pigs and poultry.  His wife helps him with this job.  Since they buy small pigs, they raise and fatten them in order to later butcher them and sell the meat or take it to the market of the nearest city.  His son helps with the care of these animals.  

Carlos needs a loan to increase pig breeding by purchasing food and vitamins for the animals.  With this he will help generate more income for his family.

Carlos is anxious that his business continues to thrive, since members of his family are involved in this business.

loans.use: to increase pig breeding by purchasing food and vitamins for the animals.

loans.name: Lucia Del Carmen

texts.es: Lucia tiene 40 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 14, 13 y 22 años de edad. Lucia se gana la vida con su negocio de venta de ropa, actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años en su vivienda. Con el fin de brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia, ella solicito su primer crédito para mejorar las paredes de su vivienda, mejorar el area del lavadera, por lo que se siente muy agradecida por el apoyo recibido,  ya que su vivienda se encuentra mucho mejor. Gracias a la buena experiencia con el crédito anterior Lucia ha decidido construir un cuarto dormitorio, para lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lamina, cemento, ladrillos, madera y mano de obra para construir un cuarto dormitorio y de esta manera seguir mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Lucia is forty years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their three children, who are ages 22, fourteen, and thirteen. Lucia makes a living selling clothing. She has been in business for three years and works from home. In order to give her family better living conditions, she requested her first loan to make home improvements. She repaired the walls and remodeled the bathroom. Her home is now in much better condition, so she is very grateful for the support she received. 

The positive experience of her previous loan has since inspired Lucia to build another bedroom, for which she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the necessary material (sheet metal, cement, bricks, and wood) as well as pay for labor to carry out the project.

loans.use: to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Lourdes Group

texts.es:
El grupo ¨Lourdes¨, esta integrando por 2 mujeres y 1 hombre quien están con ADIM para solicitar un préstamo para la inversión de sus diferentes negocios. La coordinadora es Claudia de 34 años, soltera y con 4 hijos de edades de 14, 11, 8, 1 ½ ella tiene una  venta de gallinas en el mercado de Masaya. Desea el crédito para la compra de especies de gallinas como las coloradas y blancas. Y otra parte para que el transportarse de su casa al negocio.  
Las demás integrantes son, Maria Lourdes, de 72 años quien también se dedica a la venta de gallinas en mercado municipal. Y Luis de 29 años vende quesos desde hace 15 años.
texts.en:
The group Lourdes comprises two women and one man who have come to ADIM to request a loan to invest in their respective businesses. Claudia is the group coordinator. She is 34 years old and a single mother of four. Her children are ages fourteen, eleven, eight and one-and-a-half. She sells hens at the market in Masaya. She wants to use this loan to buy different species of hens, like red and white. Part of her loan will also be used toward transportation to and from her business from home.

The other members are Maria Lourdes, age 72, who also works selling hens at the local market, and Luis, age 29, who has been selling cheese for the past fifteen years.

loans.use: to buy hens.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en: Rosa is 59 years old and married. She lives with her husband and three children in Dipolog. For the past twenty-five years, Rosa and her husband have been farmers. She earns 20,000 PHP per crop on her rice farm. Rosa became an active member of PMPC in 2012. She is now requesting a 14,000 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer to have a heavier and higher crop yield on her rice farm. In the future, she hopes to expand and improve her business for the progress of her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her rice crop.

loans.name: Gaudiosa

texts.en: Gaudiosa is a widow with two children, and the family lives in Dapitan, Philippines. She is a diligent and determined mother and has always been known to provide the best for her family. Gaudiosa earns a living by barbecue vending, selling pork and chicken barbecue. She decided to expand her business after learning that she could obtain financial assistance through PMPC. Consequently, she has requested a 10,000 PHP loan to buy additional ingredients like chicken and pork meat for her business to increase production. Gaudiosa smiles at the thought of having a comfortable life with adequate income.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients like chicken and pork meat for her business to increase production

loans.name: Maricar

texts.en: Maricar makes a good earning by hog raising in Dipolog. She is 25 years old and single. This is how she supports her needs and her parents as well. She wants to increase her profit, so Maricar approached Paglaum to borrow an amount to purchase an additional three piglets. She has high hopes that she will have more savings for her future.

loans.use: to purchase an additional three piglets.

loans.name: Wendy

texts.es: Wendy de 27 años de edad se dedica a la preparación y venta de almuerzos diariamente trabajando desde las 5 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde. Su madre le enseñó a preparar comidas a ella , a su hermana y a sus sobrinas y esto impulsó a Wendy a crear una alternativa de generación de ingresos a la medida de sus conocimeintos y satisfacciones por su buen sazón. Sus principales clients son sus vecinos, empleados del sector donde se encuentra ubicada operarios y peatones que por allí se acercan. Su meta está centrada en incrmentar sus ingresos , fortaleciendo su capital de trabajo y haciendo mejoramiento a su local, mientras su mayor desafio es lograr recurswos financieros no onerosos para inverstirlos en su negocio. .  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará insumos alimentarios, materiales costructivos para cambiar la cubierta del negocio, evitando que la humedad afecte a su clientela. Wendy es madre de 2 hijos en las edades de 5 y 8 años, que son su principal motor para persistir en el mejoramiento de sus condiciones de vida, y esto la impulsa diariamente a trabajar para lograr que cada dia sea mejor.
texts.en:
Wendy, 27, has a business making and selling lunches.  She works every day from 5am until 5pm. Her mother taught her to prepare food for herself, her sister, and her nieces, and this prompted Wendy to find an alternative way to generate income through her knowledge of cooking and the good flavor of her food.  

Wendy's main customers are her neighbors and employees in the area, which is in a location where a lot of employees and people come through.  Her goal is centered on increasing her income, strengthening her working capital, and making some improvements to her shop.  Her main challenge is finding capital at a reasonable cost to invest in her business. 

At this time, Wendy is applying for a Kiva loan, the first financing that she has done through the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo. With this loan, she will buy food supplies for her business and construction materials to change the roof of her shop so that her customers are not affected by moisture.  

Wendy is the mother of 2 children between the ages of 5 and 8 who are her main motivation to persist in her efforts to improve their living conditions. They are also her motivation to work daily to make each day better.

loans.use: to buy supplies and to change the roof of her business

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is a widow with four children. Roselyn has a small fishing business; she personally sells the catch from her fishing boat in nearby municipalities. Since she became a member of Paglaum MPC, she has been a member in good standing for almost 3 years.

She wants to obtain financial assistance from Paglaum MPC amounting to Php 5,000 for the purchase of new nets. As much as possible, they have to have all the needed fishing accessories to minimize chances of a low or zero catch. She already has floaters to help guard their fish cages. She also wants to buy the fish catch of her neighbors so she can sell more fish to the nearby fish market, where they will fetch higher prices. Through this way, she can be able to gain more profit.

In the future, she dreams of purchasing a new fishing boat to expand and improve her business by setting aside some savings from the daily sales. She wishes to see her children have stable jobs as well.

loans.use: to purchase new nets and other fishing accessories.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor, de 43 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar debido a la pobreza extrema en que vivía; está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a cuidar a sus hijos y a realizar los oficios del hogar.

Víctor, inicio a trabajar junto a su padre sembrando maíz y cortando algodón; de esa forma aprendió un poco de la agricultura.- Ahora, tiene mucha experiencia en este trabajo, a tal punto que hoy cultiva 15,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y sus cultivos están a 800 metros de distancia desde su casa; pero además cría ganado de repasto.

Víctor, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono, pesticidas y fertilizante, para realizar la siembra de cultivo de maíz.
	
El sueño de Víctor, es tener un terreno propio donde sembrar, además desea tener buena salud para poder trabajar y sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Víctor, age 43, did not have the chance to go to school due to the extreme poverty in which he lived.  He is in a relationship, and his life partner takes care of the children and does the household chores.

Víctor started working together with his father planting corn and cutting cotton.  This way he learned a little about agriculture.  Now he has a lot of experience in this work.  He has so much experience that he now cultivates 15,000 square meters of corn.  His crops are 800 meters from his house.  He also raises grazing cattle. 

Víctor needs the loan to buy agricultural supplies like compost, pesticides, and fertilizer in order to plant his corn crop.

Víctor’s dream is to have his own land to plant.  Also, he wishes to have good health in order to be able to work and get his family ahead.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like compost, pesticides, and fertilizer in order to plant his corn crop.

loans.name: Paso Firme Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Juana Marcelina es una madre de familia de 60 años de edad, su edad no la impide seguir progresando en el negocio en el que ahora se dedica, ella forma parte del grupo "Paso Firme" conformado por 5 personas que también se dedican a un negocio independiente.
La Sra. Juana Marcelina cuenta con el negocio de lavandería mas de 8 años por el cual le permite obtener un bienestar económico para su familia, ella se dedica al negocio y realiza las actividades de lavado, planchado y teñido de prendas de vestir, este negocio le ha permitido seguir creciendo económicamente y como empresaria, su meta como empresaria es  seguir creciendo y poner mas locales de lavandería ya que le gusta su negocio al que se dedica al cien por ciento.
El préstamo lo utilizara en la compra de productos y materiales que necesita para su lavandería  como detergentes, lejía, enjuague y tientes de ropa para el teñido de prendas y así poder devolver las prendas de sus clientes con mayor rapidez. Ella se siente contenta de poder formar parte del grupo y de esa manera obtener capital de trabajo, agradece el apoyo brindado y la confianza que depositan en ella.
texts.en:
Juana Marcelina is a 60 year old mother. Her age doesn't stop her from continuing to progress in her business in which she now works. She is part of the "Paso Firme" communal bank made up of 5 people who also have their own businesses.

Juana Marcelina has had a laundromat for 8 years which has allowed her to achieve a economic well-being for her family. She works in the business, washing clothes, ironing and dyeing clothing. This business has allowed her to continue growing economically and as an entrepreneur.

Her goal as an entrepreneur is to continue growing and open more laundromat locations as she likes the business and is 100% dedicated to it. She will use the loan to by products and materials she needs for her laundromat like detergent, bleach, rinse and dyes to dye the clothing and be able to return the clients clothing more rapidly. She is happy to be part of this group and in this way obtain working capital. She is grateful for the support offered and the confidence shown in her.

loans.use: to buy utensils and products for her laundromat.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro es un hombre de 32 años que se encuentra muy agradecido por el préstamo que ha tenido acceso, pues gracias a ello ha logrado superarse de gran manera que ahora obtuvo muy buenas ganancias, él ahora solicita un nuevo préstamo para poder comprar sus fertilizantes para la siembra de papa porque el ahora no cuenta con el capital necesario.
El gran sueño de Pedro es seguir mejorando su vivienda y seguir aumentando su cultivo.
texts.en:
Pedro is 32 years old. He is very grateful for the loan he obtained because it allowed him to greatly improve himself and make a very good profit. He is now requesting a new loan in order to be able to buy fertilizer for his potato crops, since he doesn't have the necessary capital at hand. 

Pedro's main goal is to continue improving his home and increasing his crops.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Anjara Esther

texts.es: Anjara de 26 años de edad,  soltera y sin hijos, es una buena estudiante de arquitectura que estudia mucho para alcanzar sus metas en la vida. Con la ayuda de sus padres, Anjara  con mucha dedicación a sus  estudios está logrando un buen rendimiento y así poder ser una buena arquitecta.  Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  para el pago de sus estudios y  así poder sacar su título de arquitectura. Anjara  se encuentra muy agradecida por la ayuda brindada y se despide con muchos deseos de culminar sus metas propuestas agradece a Kiva y Edaprospo.
texts.en:
Anjara is 26 years old, single and has no children. She is a good student of architecture who studies a lot in order to achieve her goals in life. With the help of her parents, Anjara is very dedicated to her studies, is performing well, and hopes to be able to be a good architect. 

With the loan, she will invest in the payment of her studies and thus be able to earn her degree in architecture. Anjara is very grateful for the support offered and sends her regards with a great deal of desire to reach her proposed goals and she thanks Kiva and Edaprospo.

loans.use: to pay for her studies.

loans.name: Lilian De Jesus

texts.es: Dona Lilian, de 57 años,  soltera. Solicita a ADIM por séptima vez crédito para invertirlo en su negocio de venta de lácteos y carne. Quien se dedica desde hace 6 años con los ingresos que obtuvo de su trabajo anterior. Su compañero le ayuda en el negocio vendiendo los productos en bicicleta. Así llegar a clientelas lejanas al negocio. Ella invertirá en compra de productos como queso, cuajada, y carne. Con el crédito anterior expresa que puedo ingresar en su negocio el producto de la carne que actualmente vende. Y con las ganancias que obtendrá de este crédito desea apertura una mini-pulpería e ingresar productos de granos básicos.
texts.en:
Lilian is 57 years old and single. She is seeking a loan from ADIM for the seventh time to invest in her business selling dairy products and meat. Lilian started this business six years ago with money she had saved working in her previous job. Her partner helps her by selling products by bicycle. In this way they can reach far away customers. 

Lilian will invest the money in buying products such as cheese, curd, and meat. With her previous loan she stated that she would invest it in her business to sell meat, which she now does. And with the earnings from this loan, Lilian would like to open a small general store and invest the money in basic grains.

loans.use: to buy products such as cheese, curd, and meat.

loans.name: Nelson Jeovany

texts.es:
Nelson, de 25 años de edad, es un estudiante muy aplicado y responsable, está soltero y con mucho esfuerzo y apoyo de su familia, tiene la oportunidad de estar estudiando la carrera universitaria de su preferencia, aunque tiene que hacer algunas actividades que le generen ingresos para solventar muchos gastos, solo vive con su madre, su padrastro.

Nelson, es egresado de la carrera comunicación social, para lograr estudiar su familia muchas veces no disponía de los recursos económicos para poderle ayudar plenamente en sus gastos universitarios, pero a pesar de todo hasta el momento esta logrando su propósito de ser un profesional, para solventar otras necesidades tiene que trabajar; últimamente en trabajos relacionados a su su carrera, pero anteriormente tenia que hacer viajes en un carro para obtener ingresos económicos en tiempos oportunos y libres.

Nelson, para culminar sus estudios universitarios tiene que pagar gastos de graduación y su familia no dispone de todo el dinero para ayudarle, es por eso que ha optado por solicitar un crédito para complementar el dinero para el derecho de graduación, pagar la embestidura académica y otros gastos que son requisitos para obtener su titulo universitario. 

Nelson, sueña con cumplir con los requisitos para obtener su tan merecido titulo universitario, luego optará por un puesto de trabajo que garantice la superación económica para él y su familia.-
texts.en:
Nelson is 25 years old and a very dedicated and responsible student. He is single, and thanks to his hard work and his family's support, he was able to go to college and pursue a degree of his choice. He lives with his mother and stepfather.

Nelson is earning a degree in Social Communication. In order for him to go to school, his family didn't always have enough financial resources to help him completely cover college expenses, but in spite of everything so far he is achieving his goal of becoming a professional. He has to work in order to make enough income to cover many expenses. Lately the jobs he has taken have been related to his field, but before he had to travel by car in order to make an income whenever the opportunity arose and he had enough free time.

In order to finish college, Nelson has to pay the graduation fees and his family doesn't have the full amount to help him. That is why he has decided to request a loan in order to make up the difference and pay the graduation fees and other college expenses that are mandatory in order for him to obtain his college degree.

Nelson wants to fulfill all the requirements he needs in order to obtain his hard-earned college degree. He will then apply for a job that can guarantee his and his family's financial advancement.

loans.use: to cover graduation costs and other college expenses.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is a 42 year old woman and mother of one child. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband is a vegetable seller by profession, he sells vegetables e.g. lady fingers (okra), corn flour, palak (spinach), etc. Her husband is the only one responsible for feeding the entire family and manages the household.
Shamim's husband needs to purchase different types of vegetables for reselling purposes so that he can increase the size of his business, improve his sales growth and earn a maximum profit. Due to an unfavorable financial position her husband is not in a position to purchase additional vegetables for his business purposes.
Therefore, Shamim has applied to Kiva for a loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can help her husband to purchase the above items for his business purposes.
She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband increase his vegetable business.

loans.name: Fanny Cecilia

texts.es:
Fanny  mujer ecuatoriana de 35 años de edad,  nació  en la ciudad de Latacunga en la parroquia de Mulaló, vive en casa propia junto a sus  hijos  y su esposo, Fanny   es una  mujer  muy emprendedora y trabajadora, desde muy pequeña se dedicó a trabajar duro para ser un apoyo para sus padres, quienes lo han sacrificado todo para darle educación, pero que lamentablemente por no tener recursos económicos solamente le pudieron dar la educación primaria, pero esto no ha sido obstáculo para ella.
Fanny se dedica a la  crianza de animales menores como pollos, cerdos, cuyes y a la producción de leche y agricultura desde hace varios años , ella dedica diariamente a todas esta labores entre 6 y 8 horas, todo esto lo aprendió de sus padres, desde muy pequeña, quienes han sido para ella un ejemplo de lucha constante. 
Hoy está solicitando un crédito para la compra de una vaca lechera , ya que actualmente, la demanda  es muy buena, esto ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos y sustentar sus ventas para no perder sus clientes. Para Fanny lo más difícil de su trabajo es cuando tiene que trasladar sus productos  ya que no cuenta con vehículo apropiado para esto.
Vino a la Fundación por muy buenas referencias y quiere agradecer muchísimo a quienes forman parte de esta noble institución quienes le han abierto las puertas para poder cumplir con su necesidad, es por eso que agradece a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida personal y familiar.
texts.en:
Fanny is a 35 year old Ecuadorean woman. She was born in Latacunga in Mulaló parish. She lives in her own house together with her children and her husband. Fanny is a very enterprising and hard-working woman who since she was small worked hard to be a support for her parents. They sacrificed everything to give her her education. Unfortunately they did not have the economic resources and she only got her Primary schooling but this has not been an obstacle for her.

Fanny has been working raising small animals like chickens, pigs, guinea pigs and producing milk and farming for some years. She dedicates 6 to 8 hours every day to this work which she learned from her parents when she was quite young. Her parents have been an example of constant struggle for her.

Today she is requesting a loan to buy a milk cow as the demand now is very good. this will help to increase her income and sustain her sales and not lose clients. The most difficult part of her work for Fanny is when she has to transport her products and does not have an appropriate vehicle to do it. She comes to the Fundación with very good references and wants to thank those who form part of this noble institution who have opened their doors to fill her need. She is grateful to the Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador and to Kiva for making her personal and family's growth possible.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow as demand has grown.

loans.name: Yaneth Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yaneth, de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casada, su esposo es agricultor y tienen 2 hijos. 

Yaneth, tiene mucha experiencia en la agricultura, ya que desde la edad de 10 años, ayudaba a su padre en la siembra de maíz y frijol.- Toda su vida se ha dedicado a esta actividad y cuando se casó aprendido las técnicas de manejo de otros cultivos que anteriormente no conocía; por ejemplo el cultivos de tomate, chile dulce, loroco, pepino, sorgo y papaya.- Gracias a que su esposo es un agricultor que también posee mucha experiencia, entre los dos han sabido compartir sus conocimientos, para lograr salir adelante y aumentar sus producciones, en cultivos que no son muy tradicionales en nuestro país.- Los terrenos donde cultivan están en las cercanías de su casa.

El crédito que Yaneth, está solicitando será utilizado para comprar insumos agrícolas y realizar la siembra de 7,000 metros cuadrados de cultivo de maíz.

Yaneth, sueña con tener ganado y comprar un sistema de riego para sembrar en época de verano.
texts.en:
Yaneth, 35, has a ninth grade education.  She is married with two children, and her husband is a farmer.  Yaneth has a great deal of experience in farming because she has been helping her father sow corn and beans since she was 10 years old.  

She has been engaged in this activity all of her life, and when she got married she learned techniques, which she hadn’t been familiar with before, for growing other crops. For example, she learned how to plant tomatoes, sweet peppers,”loroco” [small white edible flowers], cucumber, sorghum, and papaya.  

Fortunately, her husband is a farmer with a lot of experience as well, and they have shared their knowledge with each other, and managed to get ahead and increase their production of crops that are not very typical of their country.  The land where they cultivate their crops is near their home.

The loan Yaneth is requesting will be used to purchase farm inputs, and sow 7,000 square meters of corn. She dreams of having livestock, and purchasing an irrigation system for summer planting.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs, and sow 7,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Jose Nelson

texts.es:
José, de 43 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, está casado, su esposa realiza las labores del hogar y tiene tres hijos de los cuales dos estudian.
José, tiene mucha experiencia en la siembra de cultivos, dado que esta actividad la aprendió de su padre quien es agricultor.- Actualmente José, trabaja como jornalero y además siembra maíz; el área que cultiva es de 7,000 metros cuadrados, la cual cultiva junto a sus tres hijos y que está ubicada a 600 metros de su casa.

José, necesita el crédito para comprar abono, pesticidas y fertilizantes para sembrar 7,000 metros cuadrados de cultivo de maíz.

José, sueña con brindarle a sus hijos la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
José is 43 years old, studied up until grade five and is married. His wife works looking after the home and they have three children, two of whom study. 

José is very experienced in planting crops, he learnt this work from his father who is a farmer.  Nowadays, José works as a laborer and also plants corn, the area of his plantation is 7,000 square meters. He cultivates the crop with his three children, it is located 600 meters from their home. 

José needs this loan to buy fertilizer, pesticides and natural fertilizer to plant 7,000 square meters of corn. 

José dreams of being able to give his children the opportunity to study at university.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and natural fertilizer to plant 7,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en: Shazia is a 40 year old, married woman. She is a very talented lady and excels in her work of stitching. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community. Some years ago she started her business of tailoring and running her household activities. At this time, Shazia is working hard to continually provide income for her family's everyday expenses. She is now requesting a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase more spools of thread, ribbons, cloth, needles and scissors for sewing more dresses to get a boost in her earnings. Shazia wishes to spend her earnings on providing a quality life for her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of thread, ribbons, cloth, needles and scissors.

loans.name: Jimna

texts.en:
Jimna is a a hardworking mother who is always out in the streets to sell her fish. She is very diligent and determined fish vendor and she works twice as hard so she can sustain her needs. 

Jimna is from Lagag, Sindangan.  She has applied for her membership with PMPC and she appreciates the programs and services of the Coop. 

Jimna is in need of capital to purchase more fish to sell. She asked for financial assistance from Paglaum MPC in the amount of PHP 12,000 and she is thankful to them for financing her capital needs. In addition, she wants to expand her business and to manage it well for her loyal customers. 

Jimna deeply wishes that someday she could own a space in the public market where she can display her fish.

loans.use: bush fish

loans.name: Anna  Liza

texts.en:
Anna Liza signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the necessary additional working capital for her sari-sari store (general store) business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-time borrower like her. 

Anna  Liza has been able to turn the tide in her favor and is making good sales these days. She wanted to take advantage of this good fortune, so  recently she took out a another loan to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for her family.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Paciencia

texts.en:
Paciencia lives in Polo, Dapitan. She is a widow and has a fish-vending business.  She owns a small fish pond as well. 

Paciencia has earned a promising income doing this type of business for the past years, which is enabling her to sufficiently provide for her family. Now, she wants a comfortable living space for her family. Out of the money she has saved from her earnings, Paciencia has started to repair her house. To finish her project, she has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase additional construction materials for her house, as well as fishing materials and more fingerlings for her fish pond. Paciencia has high hopes that her business will grow and continue to benefit her family.

loans.use: buy construction materials & fish fingerlings

loans.name: Nhóm 06 Thôn Tiên Thắng Quảng Lợi Group

texts.en:
Quế works in agriculture raising livestock. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in the future.

Quế is 32 years old and she is married with 1 child.  She is the group leader of the Nhóm 06 Thôn Tiên Thắng Quảng Lợi solidarity group, which consists of 4 members.  She lives and works in Quang Xuong district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Quế joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Quế has successfully repaid 4 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

Quế has been involved in this business for 6 years.  The main harship that Quế faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Quế hopes for her business to do well.  With her business profit, she hopes to build a new house, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: buy livestock

loans.name: Thành

texts.en:
Thành works in agriculture growing vegetables.  Thành is 48 years old and she is married with 3 children.  Thành lives with 1 dependent in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2015, Thành joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid 1 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

Thành has been involved in this business for 1 year.  The main harship that Thành faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

Thành hopes to maintain a successful business, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: build a toilet

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma is 55 years old and is married with six children.

Elma works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

Elma has borrowed and paid 15 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns an income from clothing sales.

Elma aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Ma. Paz

texts.en:
As a widowed mother of two children, Paz works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from clothing sales and pig fattening. 

Paz is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell for her general store business.

Paz has been sustaining her business activities through her past 2 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Ana Marie

texts.en:
Ana Marie is 33 years old and has three children. She is married and two of her children are in school.

Ana Marie is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Ana Marie requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Ana Marie has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Ana Marie would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Fanny Esther

texts.es: Hace cinco años por la necesidad de aportar a los gastos de la vivienda y sus deseos de seguir surgiendo como trabajadora independiente, Fanny decidió ofrecer a sus vecinos productos por medio de catálogos especializados en ropa, calzado, perfumería y demás productos del cuidado personal.  Todos los días esta emprendedora mujer de 53 años, sale a las calles del barrio donde habita en el municipio de Soledad a exhibir la gran variedad de productos de la oferta del catálogo y recopilar los encargos de clientes para realizar el pedido ante sus proveedores.  Una vez cumple con su meta de venta realiza el pedido el cual cancela de  contado, en la actualidad  por tener un capital muy escaso, ella está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, el cual invertirá en los encargos de productos para entregar a sus clientes; ropa, calzado, perfumes y demás.  Para Fanny esta inversión permitirá que se incrementen las ventas.  Fanny es madre de un hijo mayor de edad y su meta familiar es continuar haciéndole mejoras locativas a su vivienda, así mismo desea tener mayor inventario y variedad de productos en su negocio.
texts.en:
Five years ago, due to the need to contribute to the household expenses and her wishes to continue arising as an independent employee, Fanny decided to offer her neighbors products from specialized catalogs of clothing, shoes, perfumes and other personal care products. Every day this enterprising 53 year old woman goes out into the streets of the neighborhood where she lives, in the town of Soledad, to show the large variety of products offered in the catalogs and to collect orders from clients to order from her suppliers. Once she meets her selling goal, she places the order which she settles in cash. 

Now, because she has very little money, she is applying for a CrediKiva which is the first funding that she has asked for from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will invest it in product orders to deliver to her clients; clothing, shoes, perfumes, etc. For Fanny, this investment will allow her to increase her sales. Fanny is a mother of an adult-aged child and her family goal is to continue to make improvements to her home. Likewise she wishes to have a greater inventory and product variety in her business.

loans.use: to invest in product orders to deliver to her clients; clothing, shoes, perfumes, etc.

loans.name: Leny

texts.en:
Leny is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  Leny is 42 years old and two of her children are in school.

Leny has a frozen food retail business in the Philippines.  She has requested a PHP 21,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of frozen foods to sell.

Leny has been in this business for eight years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: buy frozen food

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is 58 years old and is married with seven children.

Leonila works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Leonila has borrowed and paid 22 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for ten years and also earns an income from fattening pigs.

Leonila aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
Cesar, de 24 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a realizar los oficios de su casa, tienen un hijo de 4 años de edad que aún no estudia, actualmente viven en casa de su madre pero solo su pareja y su hijo dependen de él.

Cesar, trabaja en limpieza y mantenimiento de piscinas desde hace 8 años, no tiene otro tipo de ingreso, antes solo estudiaba, su trabajo está a 400 metros desde su casa, viaja en moto y entra a trabajar desde las 7:00 a.m. hasta las 4:30 p.m.  

Cesar, necesita el crédito para comprar lámina y madera para terminar de hacer su casa, pues quiere darle a su hijo su propia casa.

Sus sueños son, que su hijo se prepare academicamente y que su casa este terminada antes del invierno, espera que su hijo se gradué de alguna carrera universitaria.
texts.en: Cesar is 24 years old. He went to school until the ninth grade. He is married and his wife makes a living by making trades from home. They have a 4 year old son that is not in school yet. They currently live in his mother's house but only his spouse and his son depend on him. Cesar has worked in pool cleaning and maintenance for 8 years. He does not have another form of income and before working he was only going to school. His work is 400 meters from his house. He travels by motorcycle and he works from 7:00 A.M. to 4:30 P.M. Cesar needs the loan to buy metal sheets and wood to finish making his house, because he wants to give his son his own home. His dreams are that his son is academically prepared and that his house is finished before winter. He hopes that his son graduates with a university degree.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets and wood to finish making his house, because he wants to give his son his own home.

loans.name: Elflida

texts.en:
Elflida is 58 years old and married with six beautiful children. She has been a wholesaler of bananas and camotes (sweet potato & cassava) in their town for almost five years. From this longtime experience of selling, she already has high knowledge in dealing with this kind of business. Even though there are many competitors in the town, Elflida still gets more customers above the rest, due to her good salesmanship and characteristic effort. She has been successful over the years and manages to save more money for her family. 

For now, Elflida is planning to own a stall near a public market where she can start her retailing business for additional income in the near future. To fund this project, she needs additional capital to purchase 500 kilos of bananas and camotes for wholesale, so she has requested a loan from Paglaum-MPC.

loans.use: to purchase 500 kilos of bananas and camotes for wholesale.

loans.name: Marta Lorena

texts.es:
Doña Marta, es una mujer de cincuenta y cinco años de edad, encantada por el mundo de las telas, corte y confección. Ella tiene treinta y cinco años ejerciendo su profesión como costurera desde su casa de habitación, donde ha hecho crecer una tienda en la cual oferta sus creaciones. Antes ya había sido beneficiada con un préstamo de Kiva y MiCrédito, con este logro obtener buenas ganancias y su negocio salió adelante notablemente, es por eso que ella está muy agradecida. 
Cada cierto tiempo, Marta, necesita abastecerse de nuevas telas, para crear ropa, vestidos, ropa de cama, toallas, bordados, entre otros, es por eso que ella ha vuelto a solicitar un préstamo a Kiva junto a MiCrédito para abastecerse de lo que es su materia primay comprar telas, hilo, agujas entre otros. En un futuro planea incursionar en el mundo de las manualidades.
texts.en: Marta is a fifty-five year old woman who is enthusiastic about the world of fabric and dressing making. She has been practicing her profession as a seamstress for thirty-five years from her house, where she has grown a store in which she offers her creations. Previously, she had been benefitted a Kiva and MiCrédito loan. With this loan she managed to get good earnings and her business significantly went ahead. She is very thankful for this. Every so often, Marta needs to stock up on new fabrics to create clothing, dresses, linen, towels, embroidery, among others. For this reason, she has reapplied for a Kiva loan alongside MiCrédito to stock up on goods and to buy fabric, thread, needles, etc. In the future, she plans to venture into the world of crafts.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, needles, etc.

loans.name: Juan Ramón

texts.es:
Juan, de 43 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está acompañado, su esposa se dedica a realizar los quehaceres del hogar y cuida de sus 2 hijos que asisten a la escuela.

Juan, tiene mucha experiencia en la agricultura, toda su vida se ha dedicado a realizar esta actividad, la cual aprendió de sus padres, de esta forma obtiene ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia.


El crédito que está solicitando, es para comprar abono, pesticidas y fertilizantes para realizar la siembra de cultivo de maíz.

Juan, sueña con mejorar su vivienda, además le gustaría iniciar a criar ganado para no depender solo de la agricultura.
texts.en:
Juan is 43 years old and studied up until the ninth grade, he has a partner, his wife who takes care of the home and their two children who attend school. 

Juan has a lot of experience in farming, he has been doing this work his entire life, and learnt the skills from his parents. With this work Juan is able to make enough money to care for his family. 

The loan that Juan is asking for is to buy fertilizer, pesticides and compost to plant a crop of corn. 

Juan dreams of improving his home, he would also like to raise cattle so that he doesn't depend solely on agriculture.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and compost to plant a crop of corn.

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en:
Zahida is a 47 years old, married woman.  She is involved in the business of selling stitching materials to support her family. She offers different laces, ribbons, threads, and buttons in different colors. She has become popular in her street for providing good materials to her customers.

She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. Currently she has applied a loan of PKR 45000  to purchase lace, buttons and spools of threads in different colors. This will improve her earnings and enable her to better support the needs of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase laces, buttons and spools of threads in different colors.

loans.name: Yaira Yulieth

texts.es:
La señora Yaira es una mujer muy trabajadora y dedicada al su negocio, el cual es la venta de cerdos para engorde, esto lo realiza hace mas de 5 años y lo atiende desde su casa de habitación, anteriormente se le apoyo con un credito de manera grupal, pero por la buena administración de su negocio, ahora lo solicita de forma individual.
Doña Yaira solicita el préstamo para comprar arena, cemento y madera para remodelar un área de su casa y construir una caseta para vender lácteos y carne de cerdo y así mejorar en su negocio, los principales cliente de la señora son sus vecinos y personas que transitan a diario por su casa de habitación, espera que esta inversión le permita salir adelante con su familia.
Doña Yaira sueña con tener un negocio bien establecido y tener todo lo necesario para la buena atención de sus clientes.



Danli, Honduras –Abril del 2015
texts.en:
Yaira is a woman who works very hard and is devoted to her business, which is selling pigs for fattening. She has been running her business from her home, for more than five years. 

In the past, she was granted a loan as a member of a group; however, because of her good business management, now she is requesting a loan as an individual.

Yaira is requesting a loan to buy sand, cement, and timber to remodel an area in her home and build a stall to sell dairy products and pork, and thus improve her business. She hopes that this investment will allow her to get ahead with her family.

Her main customers are her neighbours and people who walk by her house on a daily basis.   

Yaira dreams of having a well-established business and having everything she needs to provide good customer service.

Danli, Honduras – April, 2015

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, and timber to remodel an area in her home and build a stall to sell dairy products and pork.

loans.name: Phan

texts.en:
Phan is a 64-year-old widow who lives with her two grown children and a daughter-in-law in a community in the province of Kampong Chhnang, Cambodia. Her son is a blacksmith while her daughter and her daughter-in-law work in a factory. The three of them earn around $11 a day.

Phan is applying for a 1,200 USD loan through Kiva's field partner KREDIT to buy a machine, metal cutter and other tools for her son to use in his metalwork. With them he can earn additional income to support the family.

In the future, Phan hopes to have enough money to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy a machine, metal cutter and other tools for her son to use in his metalwork

loans.name: Florenda

texts.en:
She hails from the town of Talibon, Bohol. Her name is Florenda, and she is 29 years of age. She is a married woman with three dependents. Her oldest child is 10, and the youngest is 4. She engages in farming. She grows and sells rice. She needs funds in order to improve the yield of her farm. Her husband earns a living by being a conductor of a van for hire.

She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers and rice seedlings. She will be able to grow and sell quality rice in few months to come. This will allow her to augment her income and be able to handle her finances. Thus, she could now be able to provide her family with good food and better living conditions.

Florenda hopes that she will be able to handle her farming business to be able to support the schooling of all her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and rice seedlings.

loans.name: Manuel Adolfo

texts.es:
Manuel tiene 54 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico con su cónyuge en una comunidad rural dedicada a la agricultura, ganadería y crianza de animales que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de arroz, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 30 años, el préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha, esto lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto lo que incrementará su nivel de ingresos y le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel is 54 years old and lives in his own home, made of rustic materials, with his spouse. They live in a rural community devoted to agriculture, livestock and animal breeding. The community can be found located in the district of Pomahuaca, province of Jaén in the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Perú. 
He makes a living in agriculture, specifically growing rice. He has 30 years of experience in this area. The loan that he will be granted will be used in farming, applications and additions of plant protection products, fertilizers and labor for his harvest. This will help the physiological, morphological and productive improvement of cultivation, and will also help him to have an opportune harvest and therefore have a higher output and better product quality. Therefore, he will not have problems selling his product, which will increase his income level and allow him to improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: with farming, applications and additions of plant protection products, fertilizers, and labor for his harvest.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia is from Sindangan. She is 39 years old and married. 

Sonia wants to start a sari-sari store business in her house in order to help her husband in earning a living for their family. 

She has applied for her membership in Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) to gain access to financial services, to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. 

Sonia is requesting a new loan of PHP 5,000 which will be used to purchase store inventory and  to be used as working capital. 

This loan will be her first loan from PMPC. She plans to use the revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase store inventory and use it as working capital.

location.town: Sindangan - Dicoyong, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Nor

loans.name: Rizalina

texts.en:
Rizalina is 53 years old and married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Rizalina has a repair shop business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 30,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy new tools and equipment for her repair shop.

Rizalina has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment for her repair shop.

loans.name: Tazeem

texts.en:
Tazeem is a 51 years old woman who lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her two sons and three daughters.  Her children are in school. Her husband has been running her own business of clothes selling for 25 years and he is responsible to feed the entire family and manage the house hold. 

Her husband needs to purchase different types of clothes in bulk for reselling purpose, but due to insufficient financial means her husband is unable to purchase these clothes. Therefore Tazeem is applying for Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.  Her husband can also increase the size of his business and earn maximum profits with the help of this loan amount. 
Tazeem is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to assist her husband, who wants to increase stocks in his clothing business

loans.name: Rosela

texts.en:
Rosela is 46 years old and married with two children. With one child in school, Rosela works very hard to provide for them.

Rosela runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

Rosela has been in this business for 19 years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, noodles, sardines, sugar, and school supplies.

In the future, Rosela would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Sy

texts.en:
Sy, 52, is the mother of six children, only one of whom is in school. The family lives in Kampong Chhnang province. For the past ten years she has earned an income farming rice and growing lotus to sell.

Sy is now borrowing 450 USD through Kiva's field partner VisionFund to buy solar lights. She hopes to improve her family’s lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy solar lights.

location.town: Kampong Chhnang Province, Kampong Leng District

loans.name: Fatima Guadalupe

texts.es:
Fatima, de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está soltera y tampoco tiene hijos, sus abuelos viven con ella y solo ellos dependen de ella.

Fatima, tiene venta de hojas de guineo desde hace 5 años, aprendió esta labor con sus abuelos, ya que ellos también vendían este tipo de hojas; Fatima, también tiene vacas lecheras, antes ella solo estudiaba y le ayudaba a sus abuelos en casa, el terreno donde tiene las huertas, está a 100 metros desde su casa, su mamá se involucra en la venta; ella comienza desde las 6.00 a.m. hasta las 12.00 m.d. o hasta que saque todo el pedido.

Fatima, necesita el crédito para comprar cepa de guineo y pagara para que preparen la tierra, con esto aumentará su siembra.

Sus sueños son, sembrar bastante guineo para vender más y de las ganancias pagar el crédito y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en: Fatima, 28, has a high school education.  She is single, and has no children; her grandparents live with her and they are her only dependents.  Fatima has been selling banana leaves for five years. She learned this work from her grandparents because they also sold this type of leaves.  Fatima also has dairy cows.  Previously, she only studied and helped her grandparents at home.  The land where she has her gardens is situated 100 meters from her home.  Her mother is involved in the sales, and she begins at 6:00 a.m. and works until 12:00 p.m., or until she gets the entire order out.  Fatima needs the loan to purchase bananas, and pay for preparation of the land and, with this, she will increase sowing. Her dream is to sow enough bananas to increase sales, pay the loan from the profits, and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase bananas, and pay for preparation of the land and, with this, she will increase sowing.

loans.name: Luzvisminda

texts.en:
Luzvisminda is 55 years old, married, and has two children.

Luzvisminda is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Luzvisminda has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Luzvisminda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan, se dedica a la crianza de ganado y cerdos, le gusta también trabajar en el campo cultivando granos básicos para tener una parte de la alimentación familiar, sus padres le enseñaron a realizar estas actividades, ya que para ellos era su fuente de ingresos; Juan vive con su esposa, hijos, nueras y nietos, es una persona que ha enseñado a sus hijos a desarrollar este mismo negocio y cuenta con la colaboración de ellos para trabajar.
Con el préstamo tiene pensado pagar el terreno en que realiza la siembra de granos básicos, así mismo comprara terneros y cerdos para fortalecer el negocio, con la inversión espera que las cosechas venideras sean abundantes y que sean de ayuda para cambiar su situación familiar.
Juan sueña con seguir trabajando para mantener su negocio y compartir con su familia un estilo de vida mucho más digno.
texts.en:
Juan makes a living raising cattle and pigs, he also likes to work in the fields cultivating basic grains to provide food for his family. His parents taught him these skills, for them it was their means of income. 

Juan lives with his wife, children, and grandchildren. He has taught his children to develop the business and he relies on their collaboration to get the work done. 

With this loan, Juan will pay for the land where the basic grains are grown and also buy calves and pigs to strengthen the business. With this investment his hope is that future harvests will be abundant and will help to improve his family's living situation. Juan hopes to keep working to keep his business going and to share with his family a way of life that is much more dignified.

loans.use: to pay for the land where basic grains are grown, also to buy calves and pigs to strengthen the business

loans.name: Sokhon's Group

texts.en:
Sokhon, 48, lives in Battambang province. She is a mother of three children, and only one of them is in school.

The source of her family’s income is from grocery selling. She has been involved in this business for more than twelve years, and it earns her about 110,400 KHR per day.

Due to the lack of funds, she is now taking a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy more grocery items for resale. She hopes to earn more money and have the ability to keep sending her child to school.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items for resale.

loans.name: Nhóm 09-Phố 5-P.đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
An is the group leader of the Nhóm 09-Phố 5-P.Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of three members. She is 53 years old, married with two children and lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

For more than ten years now An has run a food stall selling tofu. A lack of capital with which to develop her business is her main challenge.

In 2013 An joined Kiva's field partner Thanh Hoa to access its credit and improve her business. She has taken out and successfully repaid three prior loans. She is now requesting a 27,000,000 VND loan to be split among the three women. Her portion will be used to buy more tofu ingredients.

An wishes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for the tofu she sells.

loans.name: Princess Joy

texts.en:
Due to financial hardship, Princess Joy helps her husband in gaining income by providing a manicure and pedicure service within her locality. She is 23 years old, married, and has two children.

She aims to continue and strengthen this business, but she has not enough capital. For this reason, she is asking for an additional PHP 5,000 to buy cosmetics, nippers, a nail cutter, brushes, and other materials she needs to provide the said service.

Through patience and strong determination, she believes that someday she will make her business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, nippers, a nail cutter, brushes, and other materials needed.

location.town: Brgy. San Antonio South, Bambang, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Balqees

texts.en:
Balqees is a widow. Some years ago, she decided to support her family by starting a business tailoring to meet their day-to-day expenses. Balqees is popularly known in her area for her skill in stitching. However, due to a shortage of raw materials, she is facing difficulty in meeting daily expenses related to her business. 

Therefore, she has requested for a loan of PKR 45000. With the requested loan, she wants to purchase stitching materials, such as threads of different colors, laces, zippers and cloth to stitch more dresses on time to generate a healthy income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase stitching materials, such as threads of different colors, laces, zippers, and cloth to stitch more dresses on time.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is a woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 47 years old, and three of her children are in school.

Thelma has a buy-and-sell ready-to-wear business in the Philippines. Thelma requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more items such as shirts, pants, etc.

Thelma has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items such as shirts, pants, etc.

loans.name: Ay's Group

texts.en:
Ay is living in Kampong Cham province; she is a 46-year-old mother of four children and two of them are in school. To overcome her family’s hardship, she grows rice on three hectares of farmland and is working as a construction worker as an additional source of income for her family. 

She has been involved in these businesses for twenty six years and it earns her about 31,500KHR per day. Due to a lack of funds, she is now applying for a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer. She hopes to earn more money and expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer to be able to expand her business

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Oeun

texts.en:
Oeun, 57, is a mother of six children and  two of them are in school, living in Kampong Cham province. The sources of her family’s income are from rice farming, sesame farming and tailoring clothes for fee. She has been involved in these businesses for more than ten years and it earns her about 87,800KHR per day. 

Due to a lack of funds, she is now taking a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy seeds, fertilizer and cloth. She hopes to her business will be expanded through this loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer to be able to expand her business

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Virgilia

texts.en:
Virgilia is 55 years old and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Virgilia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as junk foods, canned goods, personal care products, and other groceries.

Virgilia has been in this business for 24 years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Virgilia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as junk foods, canned goods, personal care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Guillermo Alcides

texts.es:
Guillermo, de 36 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a realizar labores domesticas y tiene tres hijos.

Guillermo, trabaja en una Iglesia evangélica, dicho trabajo consisten en realizar diversos tipos de actividades como limpieza, seguridad y toda actividad que le encomienden, ya que fue por medio de un amigo que lo recomendó a trabajar en ese lugar por ser una persona humilde, responsable y trabajador.- Guillermo, también se dedica a realizar labores agrícolas en su tiempo libre, ya que esto lo aprendió desde muy pequeño por medio de su padre, quien también era agricultor.

Guillermo, necesita el crédito para mejorar su vivienda, específicamente quiere mejorar algunas paredes y parte del techo de su casa, antes de la época lluviosa.
 
Guillermo, sueña con tener una vivienda digna, cómoda y segura para toda su familia, además desea poder darle una buena educación a su hija.
texts.en:
Guillermo is 36 years old and attended school through sixth grade.  He is married.  His wife takes care of their home and they have three children.  

Guillermo works in an evangelical church, where he does different work, including cleaning, security, and anything else they ask of him.  His friend recommended him for the job, since he is a humble, responsible, and hardworking person.  Guillermo also farms in his free time.  He learned to farm when he was very young from his father, who was also a farmer.

Guillermo is requesting this loan to improve his home, specifically to improve some walls and part of his roof before the rainy season.  He dreams of having a decent, comfortable, and safe home for his family.  He also hopes to give his daughter a good education.

loans.use: to improve his home, specifically to make improvements to some walls and part of the roof before the rainy season.

loans.name: Phet's Group

texts.en:
Phet, 51, is a rural villager living in Pursat province. She is a mother of six children. Growing rice and feeding ducks are the sources of her family’s income. She has been involved in these businesses for more than ten years, and she can earn about 60,200 KHR per day.

Now she has not enough funds to renovate her old house, so she decided to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund to fulfill her needs. She hopes she will have a suitable house to stay in through this loan.

loans.use: to renovate her old house.

loans.name: Sa Em's Group

texts.en:
Sa Em is 32 years old and a mother of three children who are all in school. She lives in Kratie province.

Growing cassava and working on other farms for a fee are the sources of her family’s income, and she could earn about 48,700 KHR per day.

Due to lack of funds, she is now leading a group to take a new loan via VisionFund to buy farming supplies for her cassava farming. She hopes to earn more income and improve her family’s living.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Moises Serpas

texts.es:
Moisés, de 31 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, ya que sus padres vivían en pobreza extrema; está casado, no tiene hijos y su esposa se dedica a realizar los quehaceres del hogar.

Moisés, a los 10 años de edad ya trabajaba junto con su padre en la siembra de maíz y frijol; así fue como aprendió esta actividad, luego a los 14 años de edad sembraba solo en su propia parcela de maíz y frijol; desde entonces se ha dedicado a trabajar en la agricultura, además trabaja como jornalero en una finca cafetalera de 6:00 a.m. a 11:00 a.m. El lugar donde cultiva está a una distancia de 2.5 kilómetros y el recorrido lo hace montando su yegua todos los días, mientras su esposa le ayuda a realizar las labores agrícolas de todo el proceso de producción y de esta forma han logrado salir adelante y gracias al crédito anterior hoy poseen 2 vacas.

El préstamo que está solicitando Moisés, será utilizado para comprar insumos agrícolas para sembrar maíz en un área de 14,000 metros cuadrados.

Moisés, sueña con tener un lugar propio donde vivir y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Moisés is 31 years old. He was not able to go to school, since his parents were extremely poor. He is married, with no children. His wife devotes her time to taking care of the home.

At 10, Moisés was already working along side his father growing corn and beans. That was how he came to learn this trade. At 14, he was already cultivating his own plot of corn and beans. Since then he has devoted himself to farming. He also works as a day laborer on a coffee plantation, from 6:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. The place where he grows his crops is 2.5 kilometers away and he makes the trip riding his horse every day, while his wife helps him with his farming in the production process. This is how they have been able to get ahead. Thanks to the previous loan they now have two cows.

Moisés is seeking this loan to buy agricultural supplies to plant corn over a 14,000 square meter area.

Moisés dreams of having his own place to live and a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for growing corn over a 14,000 square meter area.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase tools like a polishing machine, a drill, metal materials, and paint.

loans.name: Vy's Group

texts.en:
Vy is living in Kampong Cham province; she is aged 40 and the mother of four children. Growing rice on one hectare farmland and working as a construction worker are the sources of her family’s income. She has been involved in these businesses for twenty two years and it earns her about 35,600KHR per day. 

This is her third loan cycle for her group which consists of two members. As a group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farming. She hopes to earn more income and ability to expand her current business through this loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer and thus expand her business

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Sokly

texts.en:
Sokly, a rice farmer for over 29 years, is a 48-year-old widowed mother of three children residing in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. One of her children is a factory worker, another a taxi driver, while the third attends school. Together, they earn approximately $31 per day. 

With her son getting married soon, Sokly has decided to apply for a loan to buy materials for his wedding. In the future, she wants to build fences around her house and support her child to finish high school.

loans.use: to buy materials to hold a wedding for her son

loans.name: Hoeurn's Group

texts.en:
Hoeurn is a rural villager living in Kampong Cham province; she is a 35-year-old mother of two children and a rice farmer for more than five years. She could earn about 52,500KHR per day. 

Because of she has not enough money to buy water pumping machine for her rice field and pay for plowing fee, so she decides to take a new loan via VisionFund to fulfill her needs. She hopes this loan will help her to improve her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to buy a water pumping machine for her rice field and pay for plowing fees

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Jose Alexander

texts.es:
José, está acompañado, tiene tres hijos, de 17, 12 y 9 años de edad,  solo dos de ellos dependen de él, la familia vive junta; por la necesidad de cubrir los gastos de su hogar hace dos años opto por instalar en su casa una granja de pollos de engorde, recibió asesoría de veterinarios para tener más experiencia en el negocio, no cuenta con ayuda económica del extranjero.
Para ir mejorando la rentabilidad de su negocio solicita un crédito para invertirlo en pollos, concentrado y vacunas para que los animales tengan un crecimiento sano, pretende tener mayor productividad para atender a nuevos clientes y lograr aumentar sus ganancias, las cuales piensa utilizar para cubrir el pago de la deuda y sus compromisos familiares.
Sus deseos son tener para la granja una infraestructura adecuada, equipo de reproducción moderno, además sueña con cubrir todas las necesidades familiares, es decir que tengan mejor alimentación, vestuario y educación.
texts.en:
José is married and has three children who are 17, 12, and 9 years old. Only two of them are dependent on him. Their family lives together. José chose to set up a poultry farm at his house two years ago because of the necessity to cover household expenses. He received advice from veterinarians in order to have more experience in the business. He doesn't receive any financial support from outside the country.

In order to keep improving the profitability of his business, José is requesting a loan to buy chickens, chicken feed, and vaccines for the animals for healthy growth. He hopes to have increased productivity in order to serve his new customers and increase his profits, with which he will use to pay back his debt and for his family commitments.

José's wishes are to have an adequate infrastructure for the poultry farm and to have modern equipment. He also dreams of meeting all his family's needs, that is, better food, clothing, and an education.

loans.use: to buy chickens, chicken feed, and vaccines for the animals for healthy growth.

loans.name: Sokly's Group

texts.en:
Sokly is a 26-year-old mother of a small child, living in Kampong Cham province. Growing rice and a factory worker are the sources of her family’s income for more than five years. She could earn about 52,800KHR per day. 

Now she lacks funds to buy fertilizer and seeds to sow on the farm, so she decided to take a Kiva loan via VisionFund to fulfill her needs. She hopes to earn more income and expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds to expand her business

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Glenda Yosmary

texts.es:
La joven Glenda es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable vive en una comunidad al sur de Honduras junto a su familia. Su negocio es la elaboración y  venta de pan y rosquillas, desde hace 11 años, la cual funciona en su casa de habitación en el municipio donde vive.
