Glenda necesita el préstamo para la compra de más materia prima como harina, huevos, azúcar, aceite, etc. para seguir realizando su trabajo, el cual le brinda una gran parte de sus ingresos. Con el préstamo espera que las ventas de su negocio aumenten, ya que tendrá suficiente producto para atender los pedidos de sus clientes y gracias a esto poder mejorar la calidad de vida de la familia con el aumento de los ingresos en el hogar.
Espera en un corto plazo hacer crecer su negocio y con esto poder seguir apoyando a su familia en los diferentes problemas económicos que se les presenten, para que puedan tener mayores oportunidades en la vida.


Choluteca, Honduras – Abril  del  2015
texts.en:
Glenda is a hardworking and responsible person who lives in a community in the southern part of Honduras together with her family.  She has worked making and selling bread and ring shaped pastries for 11 years.  She works in her home in the town where she lives.

Glenda is requesting this loan to purchase more ingredients like flour, eggs, sugar, oil, and other items to continue doing her work, which provides a large part of her income.  She hopes that the loan will help her sales increase, since she will have enough product to meet her orders from her customers.  Thanks to this, she can improve her family's quality of life with an increase to her household's income.

In the short term, she hopes to grow her business and continue supporting her family with the different financial problems that they face so that they can have better opportunities in life.

Choluteca, Honduras - April 2015

loans.use: to purchase flour, eggs, sugar, oil, and other items for her business.

loans.name: Anabella

texts.en:
Anabella is a married woman with three children, and is a very hard working entrepreneur.  Anabella is 47 years old and has one child still in school.  She has operated a food vending business in the Philippines for 14 years. 

Anabella requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like bananas, cooking oil, sugar, and other materials for her food production business.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like bananas, cooking oil, sugar, and other materials for her food production business.

loans.name: Ravy

texts.en:
Ravy is a rice farmer and fisherman living in Kratie province and she is a 31-years-old mother of three children, one of them is in school while the other two are too young to go to school. 

Through her businesses, she could earn about 95,400KHR per day. Due to lack of funds, she is now applying for a loan to buy farming supplies for her farming. She hopes to earn more income and have enough consumption to use.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies to grow enough rice for her family's needs

loans.name: Roeung

texts.en:
Roeung, 38, is a mother of five children and two of them are in school, living in Kratie province. Cassava farming and working on other farms for a  fee are the sources of her family’s income. She has been involved in these businesses for twenty years and it earns her about 20,000KHR per day. 

Due to a lack of funds, she is now taking a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy seeds, fertilizer and to pay for the plowing fees. She hopes to earn more income and have ability to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer and pay for plowing fees

loans.name: Haleema

texts.en:
Haleema  is a 39-year-old, married woman. She is been in the work of hand embroidery. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. 

To help her to continue her operations, she has requested for a loan of 40000 PKR  to buy spools of threads in different colors and along with packs of beads, sequins and stones for embellishment; will allow her to cater to more customers consistently. She is hopeful to get an increase in her income by targeting more customers. She dreams for her bright future and desires to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy spools of threads in different colors and along with packs of beads, sequins and stones for  embellishment

loans.name: Pov

texts.en:
Pov is a 27-year-old single man who is from Kandal Province in Cambodia. Currently, he is working in a factory in the city and he has been a garment-factory worker since 2009, making a daily income of USD5. Pov doesn’t have a motorcycle to commute to work and to travel to his family home on public holidays, therefore he would like a loan to buy a motorcycle. 

This is his third-loan cycle with Kiva. This loan will help him have his own motorcycle and improve his traveling conditions. In the future, Pov dreams of having a new house.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to commute to work and to travel to his family home when he is free from his work

loans.name: Maximiliano

texts.es:
Maximiliano, desarrolla las actividades de agricultura, caficultura y crianza de ganado, vive felizmente con su compañera de viva y una hija recién nacida, son reconocidos en su comunidad como personas honestas y trabajadoras; toda su vida ha trabajado desarrollando este negocio, cumple un horario de seis de la mañana a cinco de la tarde, trabaja solo, el oficio lo heredo de su padre.
Está necesitando de un crédito para comprar una novilla y sus profilácticos, para engordarla y luego comercializarla a un buen precio, espera tener cambios significativos en su estilo de vida y en su negocio.
Sueña con ampliar y diversificar su negocio, darle a su familia una vida más digna y continuar trabajando.
texts.en:
Maximiliano works in agricultural activities, coffee growing and raising cattle. He lives happily with his life's companion and a newborn daughter. They are known in their community for being honest and hardworking  His whole life he has worked in this business. His schedule is from six in the morning until five in the afternoon. He works alone and he inherited this trade from his father. 

He needs this loan to buy a heifer and its preventative medicine to fatten it and later sell it at a good prices. He hopes to have significant changes in his lifestyle and in his business.

He dreams of expanding and diversifying his business, giving his family a more dignified life and continuing to work.

loans.use: to buy a heifer and preventive medicine for it, to fatten it and sell at a good price.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida operates a small store selling school supplies, items like paper, pens, crayons, pencils, notebooks, bond paper, and many others.  She is 61 years old and a widow, with five grown dependents.

She is  asking for a loan to buy more school supplies, such as intermediate pads, assorted ball pens, notebooks, and pencil  erasers.  

These additional stocks would enable Nida to cater her customers' needs and add to her income.  With these, she will be able to handle her finances and start to expand her business as well.

She is hoping that someday she will be able to improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to add to her inventory of school supplies get

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his farming through the application of modern farming technology.

loans.name: Maria Veronica

texts.es:
Verónica, de 37 años de edad, no estudio, no sabe leer ni escribir, está casada, su esposo trabaja en la agricultura y tiene 5 hijos.

Verónica, se dedica a elaborar y vender empanadas, un alimento típico de nuestro país hecho a base de plátanos, leche, harina y azúcar, el cual aprendió de una amiga que le sugirió dedicarse a este oficio.- Verónica, sale a vender sus productos 3 veces a la semana por las tardes y lo hace recorriendo todo el caserío donde vive y sus dos hijas le ayudan.

El préstamo que Verónica, está solicitando es para comprar verduras para salir a vender en todo el Caserío y otros lugares cercanos, ya que algunos de sus clientes le han solicitado que venda este tipo de productos, esto le servirá a ella para incrementar sus ingresos y de esta manera mejorar su economía familiar.

Verónica, sueña con darles una buena educación a todos sus hijos, así como también una vivienda digna y segura.
texts.en:
María Verónica, 37, didn't go to school and she doesn't know how to read or write. She is married. Her husband works in agriculture and they have 5 children.

María Verónica makes and sells empanadas, a traditional food from her country made from plantains, milk, flour, and sugar. She learned this from a friend who suggested she work in this activity. María Verónica goes out to sell her products 3 times a week in the afternoon. She travels around the village where she lives and her two daughters help her.

The loan that María Verónica is requesting is to buy vegetables so she can go out to sell in the entire village and other nearby places, since some of her customers have asked her to sell this type of product. This will help to increase her income and thus improve her family's finances. María Verónica dreams of providing all her children with a good education, as well as decent and safe housing.

loans.use: to buy vegetables so she can go out to sell in the entire village and other nearby places.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more ice pop stocks for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, lime, firewood, fruits, sugar and other materials so that the business can continue to function.

loans.name: Blanca Luz

texts.es:
Blanca, de 50 años de edad, se dedico a estudiar cosmetologia, actualmente está acompañada, su pareja atiende su propia tienda, donde vende todo tipo de productos de la canasta básica, tienen una hija en común y con ellos vive una hija que solo es de su pareja.

Blanca, tiene una Sala de Belleza y Peluquería para ambos sexos, en la cual brinda los servicios de alisados, pistoleados, planchados, corte de cabello, tintes, etc.- Esta actividad la realiza desde hace más de veinte años, dicho negocio lo tiene en la misma casa de habitación, por lo que no tiene que recorrer ninguna distancia para ir a su trabajo, el cual atiende en el horario de lunes a domingo de 8:00 a.m. a hasta las 5:00 p.m.

El presente préstamo lo necesita para comprar un lava cabezas, nuevas sillas y espejos, para brindar un mejor servicio y comodidad a sus clientes.
 
El sueño de Blanca, es llegar a tener su Sala de Belleza con todo el mobiliario y equipo adecuado, para brindar todos los servicios que le solicitan sus clientes, ya que actualmente le hace falta mejorar su equipo.
texts.en:
Blanca, 50, devoted herself to the study of cosmetology.  At this time she lives with a partner who works tending to his own store, where he sells all types of consumer staples.  Together they have a daughter.  Her partner has another daughter who lives with them.

Blanca has a beauty and hair salon for both men and women, where she provides services of hair straightening and ironing, haircuts, hair coloring, etc.  She's been doing this work for more than 20 years, and her business is located in her house.  This way she doesn't have to travel any distance to go to work.  She tends to this business every day from 8am until 5pm.

Blanca needs this loan to buy a shampoo basin, new seats, and mirrors to provide better service and comfort to her customers.

Blanca's dream is to have a beauty salon with all of the furniture and appropriate equipment, so that she could provide all of the services that her customers request, because at this time she has not been able to improve her equipment.

loans.use: to buy equipment for her beauty salon

loans.name: Ana Aida

texts.es:
Ana, requiere de un nuevo crédito para incrementar el inventario de su negocio, comprara pollos, concentrado, vacunas, etc., fortalecerá la granja para mantener en buenas condiciones a los pollos para venderlos gordos y saludables, otra parte será de utilidad para invertir en insumos para la venta de tamales.
El financiamiento anterior le ha servido para que su negocio de venta de tamales se mantenga en el mercado así como también ha establecido mejor la granja de pollos de engorde; su familia vive en óptimas condiciones y le colaboran en sus actividades para seguir progresando.
texts.en:
Ana needs a new loan to increase the inventory of her business, to buy chickens, concentrated feed, vaccines, etc., and to reinforce the coop so as to maintain her chickens in good condition in order to sell them fat and healthy.  The other part will be useful to invest in supplies for the sale of tamales.
The previous financing served her so that her tamale sales business could continue in the market and also she made the coop better for her fattening chickens.  Her family lives in the best conditions and collaborate in her activities in order to continue progressing.

loans.use: to buy chickens, concentrated feed, vaccines, etc., to reinforce the coop, and buy supplies for the sale of tamales.

loans.name: Ruddy Yaxander

texts.es:
Ruddy Yaxander es un joven estudiante de Ingenieria Industrial, él solicita un prestamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es  Ruddy, Tengo 18 años de edad. Nací en la ciudad de Santo Domingo. Soy soltero, Vivo con mis padres y dos hermanas, en la provincia de santo domingo este. Mis hermanas estudian,  mi madre trabaja pero mi padre está sin empleo por el momento.
Deseo ingresar a la universidad UTESA  a estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Industrial, ya que hasta el momento es la carrera por la cual me siento más atraído, y además tengo plena confianza en mí mismo, de que lo puedo lograr.
Por tal razón, es mi necesidad de este préstamo, ya que los ingresos de la casa no permiten el pago de universidad y de no ser aprobado tendré que acudir a la universidad pública, done el tiempo para llegar a graduarme tardará mucho más.
Tengo metas en la vida y para eso me enfocaré cada día en mis estudios, y sé que llegaré. Este es mi sueño poder ser un gran ingeniero en lo profesional y así tener la satisfacción de vivir mejor.
texts.en:
Ruddy Yaxander is a young Industrial Engineering student. He is asking for a loan to be able to cover his education costs.
 
This is his story: My name is Ruddy. I am 18 years old. I was born in Santo Domingo. I am single and I live with my parents and two sisters in the province of East Santo Domingo. My sisters are in school. My mother works but my father does not have a job at the moment. I want to get into the university UTESA to study Industrial Engineering, since until now it is the career that I'm most drawn to, and I also have full confidence in myself and what I can achieve. For this reason, I need this loan because the house income doesn't allow for university payments and if I'm not approved I will have to go to the public university where the time it will take for me to graduate will be much more. I have life goals, so I will focus myself in my studies every day and I know I will get there. This is my dream, to be a great professional engineer and thus have the satisfaction of living better.

loans.use: to cover higher education expenses.

loans.name: Orbelina Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel, de 46 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, actualmente está soltera y solo tiene una hija de 28 años de edad, la cual trabaja como promotora de salud, en su casa también viven sus padres y una nieta de 1 año de edad.- Los padres de Maribel, no trabajan por lo que ella tiene que ayudarles para su manutención.

Maribel, se dedica a atender un pequeño negocio en su casa, en donde vende todo tipo de golosinas y bebidas, pero que próximamente trasladara al mercado municipal de su municipio, porque acaba de adquirir un local en el mercado, a través de una gestión realizada en la misma institución.- Maribel, tendrá su nuevo local a muy pocos metros de su vivienda, pero en un lugar más transitado, por lo que espera que sus ventas aumenten.

El préstamo que Maribel, está solicitando es para comprar más productos como golosinas, bebidas gaseosas, agua embotellada, pan, etc.

Maribel, sueña con llegar a tener una vivienda digna, cómoda y segura, por lo se dedicara desde ya, a hacer todo lo posible para que su negocio marche bien y le dé los frutos esperados.
texts.en:
Maribel is 46 years old and studied until the ninth grade. Currently she is single and has one daughter who is 28 years old, who works as a health promoter. Maribel's parents and her granddaughter, who is one year old, also live in her house. Maribel's parents don't work and she has to help support them.  

Maribel works attending a small business in her house where she sells all types of candies and drinks but soon she will move to the local market in her city. She is just about to acquire a booth in the market through completing the necessary paperwork there. Maribel will have her new booth a few meters from her home, in a location where there is more traffic and she hopes that her sales will increase. 

Maribel is requesting a loan to be able to buy more products such as candy, soft drinks, bottled water, bread, etc. 

Maribel dreams that she will be able to have a house that is respectable, comfortable and safe, and she will work to achieve that, doing all that is possible so that her business will succeed and provide the awaited benefits.

loans.use: to buy more products such as candy, soft drinks, bottled water, bread, etc.

loans.name: Maria Santos

texts.es:
María, es acompañada, tiene una hija de 10 años de edad; por la necesidad que existía en su hogar de una buena alimentación, vestuario y salud, ella decidió poner en práctica lo que sus padres le habían enseñado, por lo que desde hace tres años se dedica al cultivo de hortalizas como tomates, chiles, pepinos, etc., su jornada de trabajo inicia a las siete de la mañana y finaliza a las tres de la tarde.
Ha solicitado un crédito con el que básicamente comprara abono, fertilizantes y otras plantas para tener un negocio más diversificado, estará invirtiendo otra parte en los trabajos de preparación de la tierra en la que realiza su siembra, espera dar un buen desarrollo a sus cultivos en esta temporada y así cosechar más productos.
A María le gustaría cumplir el sueño de tener un negocio más rentable y  seguir disminuyendo las carencias de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is married and has a 10-year-old daughter.  Because of the necessity in her home for good food, clothing, and health, she decided to put into practice what her parents taught her.  For this reason, for three years she has been making a living by planting vegetables such as tomatoes, chilies, cucumbers, etc.  Her workday begins at 7:00 a.m. and ends at 3:00 p.m.
She has requested a loan with which she will basically buy manure, fertilizers, and other plants in order to have a more diversified business.  She will invest another part in the work to prepare the soil where she will plant.  She hopes to provide a good conditions for her crops this season and thus harvest more products.
Maria would like to realize her dream of having a more profitable business and continue diminishing the poverty of her family.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, and other plants in order to make her business more diversified.

loans.name: Giorgi

texts.en:
Giorgi, who is a 41-year-old married man, lives in Kutaisi city. He has a wife and two little sons. He is a hardworking and motivated man, with a great desire to ensure his family of a good style of life. 

Giorgi works on a security services and gets a 250 GEL fixed salary. He also cultivates a plot of agricultural land. However the income isn't enough for a four-member family to satisfy even basic needs. 

So he wants to start a trading activity with his wife and requested a loan for this purpose. The startup program, which is a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, enables the rural poor to get a loan for starting or re-starting businesses. His application was approved under the framework of this program to get a loan of 2,300 GEL for purchasing a stock of various kinds of clothing for the trading business start-up. 

Giorgi and his wife will sell the clothing at increased prices and get an additional source of income which will be a great support for the family. 

Giorgi relies on a the goodwill of Kiva lenders and will be very grateful for the help.

loans.use: To start trading clothing

loans.name: Mat

texts.en:
Mat is 55 years old, a married mother with four children. She earn her main income from running a small food store in front of a garment factory near her house, and she has been in the business since 2014. Three of her children are factory workers. All of them reside in the Kampong Speu province, Cambodia. Her husband is 57 years old, he stays at home (her husband gets sick). Mat and her children can make around $22 per day. 

She wants to improve her family’s finances, so she seeks a loan to buy clothes and lotion to sell to the factory workers. 

In the future, she wants to save money to expand her business, and to buy more soil to fill the yard around her house.

loans.use: to buy clothes and lotion to sell to the factory workers

loans.name: Mico Salasala Group

texts.en:
The borrower, who is in his early 30s, is married with one small child.  He has been running a gengeduka for one and a half years now.   He works from 06 am to 06 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.  

This will be his first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He will use this loan to restock the out-of-stock items in the gengeduka.  He dreams of owning  a general store.  

He will share this loan with his loan group, Mico Salasala, which consists of five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock the out-of-stock items in the gengeduka.

loans.name: Nurinisu

texts.en:
Nurinisu is a hardworking woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1961. She is living in a big district with her family. She is married and has two children. 

Before doing business she was a housekeeper and raised her children. With free time she made wool thread from wool. She used to help her husband with work, and after he became sick she did the business by herself. Now she does a business of keeping and selling livestock. Her youngest son helps her to do business. She is goal-oriented, and a hardworking woman who tries to help her family doing this business. 

She is asking for financial support from Kiva lenders to buy livestock and expand her business. She hopes to be supported by Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy livestock and expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase raw materials.

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
Joy is 33 years old with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store  in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, condiments, home care products, personal care products and other groceries.

Joy has borrowed and paid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store  for three years and also earns an income from food vending.

Joy aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, condiments, home care products, personal care products and other groceries

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es: A Jessica le va muy bien en el negocio tiene alrededor de un año de haber iniciado en el negocio de la serigrafía, el cual llamó Tauro`s Producciones, brindando servicios como impresión de logos en las camisetas, tazas, gorras, bolsos y otros, el cual está trabajando con mucha fuerza, complementado con la fotografía.  Trabaja desde su casa. Su patrimonio se vió fortalecido con el crédito anterior, cuenta con lo básico para brindar los servicios de fotografía, su cámara y la computadora, así como la máquina para sublimación que recién adquirió con el financiamiento. Está solicitud express representa la oportunidad para adquirir más equipo especializado, diversificar sus servicios, mejorar la calidad de sus creaciones y ampliar sus cartera de clientes.
texts.en: Jessica has operated an imprinting business--called Tauro's Producciones--for a year now and says that she is pleased with her progress.  She sells printing and photography services and can, for example, apply a logo to t-shirts, cups, hats, bags, etc.  Jessica had a camera and computer before and she used a previous loan to buy other equipment that she needed for the business.  She will use this loan to buy more specialist equipment and says that the investment will allow her to improve the quality of her work and attract more customers.

loans.use: to buy equipment for her imprinting business.

loans.name: Alba

texts.es: Doña Alba es una señora con 75 años de edad, casada, no tiene hijos. Trabajadora y con muchos deseos de superación. Tiene muchos años de experiencia en la cría de animales, le va muy bien a la hora de las ventas porque tiene muchos clientes, por el buen trato que les brinda y son buenas las ganancias. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo en su negocio. Ella tiene sus animales en la casa de la suegra, debido a que donde vive es un proyecto de viviendas otorgadas por el gobierno por medio del Bono, y ahí no hay espacio para mantenerlos. También cuenta con la ayuda de sus familiares para el cuido de los cerdos, la cual es la actividad principal de ella, sin embargo cria al mismo tiempo pollos. Es una clienta muy activa, con mucho entusiasmo y trayectoria en la Fundación. Inició con los servicios que brinda la Fundación hace muchos años en el programa de Banco mujer, luego se salió y optó por los créditos individuales. El préstamo lo va invertir en comprar cerdos, insumos y hacer unos arreglos al chiquero, debido a que su objetivo es crecer, mantenerse ocupada y sentirse útil al trabajar y apoyar en su hogar económicamente, porque busca mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alba is 75 years old, married and has no children. She is hardworking and has a great desire for self improvement. She has spent many years raising animals and her sales do very well because she has many customers due to her good service, which results in a good income. 

Alba's husband helps her with this business. She keeps the animals in her mother-in-law's house since Alba's house is a housing project granted by the government through the Bono program and there is no space to keep them there. Alba's relatives also help her to raise pigs which is her main business activity, however she also raises chickens at the same time. 

Alba is a very active client who has a lot of enthusiasm and a long association with the Foundation. She took up the services that the Foundation offered many years ago through the Banco mujer program which she later left, opting for individual loans. 

This loan will go towards buying pigs, supplies and making some improvements to the pigsty. Alba's goal is to grow, keep herself busy and feel useful by working and supporting her household financially since she aims to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs to fatten up.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge, prepara hot dog, tortas mexicanas, hamburguesas, etc., para vender y generar ingresos con los que cumple con sus compromisos, su negocio está funcionando aproximadamente desde hace 15 años, trabaja de lunes a sábado, el oficio aprendió siendo empleado de un puesto de comida rápida. Vive con su esposa y un hijo de 3 años de edad, de su familia es el único que trabaja.
El préstamo le será de ayuda para comprar pan, embutidos, carnes, tomates, aderezos, condimentos, aceite, etc., tendrá la materia prima para preparar la venta con productos frescos y de calidad, su objetivo es mejorar la situación económica para cubrir mejor las necesidades familiares.
Sus sueños son seguir ampliando su negocio y abrir un nuevo punto de ventas.
texts.en:
Jorge makes hot dogs, Mexican sandwiches, hamburgers, etc. to sell and generate income so he can pay his debts.  His business has been going for approximately 15 years.  He works from Monday to Saturday.  He learned the business when he was an employee in a fast food stand.  He lives with his wife and three-year-old son.  He is the only one in the family who works.
The loan will help him to buy bread, sausages, meats, tomatoes, garnishes, condiments, oil, etc. so he will have the raw materials in order to prepare for sales with fresh, quality ingredients.  His objective is the improve the economic situation in order to better cover the family necessities.  
His dreams are to continue expanding his business and to open new points of sale.

loans.use: to buy bread, sausages, meats, tomatoes, garnishes, condiments, oil, etc., so he will have the raw materials to prepare for sales with fresh, quality products.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Esfuerzo Mutuo Group

texts.es: Banco Mujer Esfuerzo Mutuo es un grupo integrado desde el año 2006 en la comunidad de Shiroles, reserva indígena de Talamanca. Tienen mucha experiencia en las tareas agropecuarias. La agricultura es la principal fuente de empleo en esa zona. Todas se dedican a criar animales como pollos y cerdos, además de sembrar plátano y banano para su respectiva venta, también siembran productos para consumo propio, debido a que es uno de los cantones más pobres de Costa Rica. Todas las socias tiene sus activdiades productivas para ayudar en sus hogares debido a que los salarios son muy bajos. Doña Vilma es una de las integrantes fundadoras de éste Banco Mujer,  tiene 48 años de edad y es madre de 3 hijos. Tiene muchos años de estar separada de su esposo y vive  con un hijo mayor de edad y es Él quien le ayuda en su finca. Ella en una mujer muy valiente ya que siempre ha buscado la forma de sacar adelante a su familia, pese a la enfermedad crónica del corazón que siempre ha padecido, ha sido intervenida quirúrgicamente varias veces del corazón. Aún así Doña Vilma trabaja de sol a sol en su pequeña finca en donde cultiva plátano. Ha obtenido varios créditos, ahora solicita otro financiamiento para reforzar la actividad productiva la cual le genera ingresos para la manutención de ella y su hijo. Va a comprar insumos, químicos, bolsas y más para la plantación de plátano que tiene. Los deseos de esta señora son mejorar sus condiciones de vida y tener la posibilidad de pagar servicios privados de medicina, para mejorar su salud. Junto a Doña Vilma están en el grupo 3 socias más que van invertir en actividades agropecuarias. Todas buscan los mismos objetivos superarse para mejorar la calidad de vida de ellas y sus familias.
texts.en: Banco Mujer Esfuerzo Mutuo is a group formed in 2006 in the community of Shiroles in the Talamanca indigenous reservation. They have a lot of experience with agricultural work. Agriculture is the primary source of employment in this area. All of them work to raise animals such as chickens and pigs, in addition to growing plantains and bananas to sell. They also grow products for their own consumption since it is one of the poorest cantons in Costa Rica. All of the members have their businesses to be able to help in their households since their earnings are very low. Vilma is one of the founding members of this bank. She is 48 years old and is the mother of 3 children. She has been separated from her husband for many years and lives with an adult son and it is he who helps her on the farm.  She is a very courageous woman since she always has looked for the way to get her family ahead, despite chronic heart disease which she has always suffered from. She has had surgical intervention to her heart several times. Even so, Vilma works day to day in her small farm where she grows plantains. She has gotten several loans, and now is asking for another loan to reinforce the productive activity which generates the income to support herself and her son. She will purchase supplies, chemicals, bags, and more for the plantain crop that she has. This lady's desires are to improve her living conditions and have the possibility of paying for private medical care to improve her health. Along with Vilma, there are 3 other members who will invest in agricultural work. All of them look for the same objectives to improve themselves to improve the quality of life for themselves and their families.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and chemicals for the crops.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Esfuerzo Mutuo Group

texts.es: Banco Mujer Esfuerzo Mutuo es un grupo integrado por 4 socias y fue iniciado en el año 2006 en una comunidad de Talamanca llamada Shiroles, la cual es reserva indígena. Tienen mucha experiencia en el sector agropecuario. La agricultura es la principal fuente de empleo de esa comunidad. Todas son mujeres indígenas y se dedican a criar cerdos y a sembrar plátano y banano para su respectiva venta. Son actividades familiares en las que siembran también lo de consumo propio. Este es uno de los cantones más pobres de Costa Rica. Todas las socias tiene sus actividades productivas sin descuidar a sus familias, asi ayudan en sus hogares y en el gasto de los estudios, debido a que los salarios son muy bajos y algunas son solteras. Maylin es una socia con 22 años de edad, soltera y tiene dos hijos. Es jefa de hogar. La actividad principal para la manutención de su hogar es la cria de cerdos. Cuando cumplen su ciclo de producción ella los vende. Compra los animales por edades, para asi tener ingresos todos los meses y poder salir adelante con sus hijos, ya que los dos cursan la primaria. Le va muy bien y siempre se ha dedicado a ésta actividad, con la finalidad de superarse y darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Ésta integrante va invertir el préstamo en comprar cerdos y concentrado. Con Maylin hay dos socias más que invertira en la agricultura del plátano y la otra en cerdos.
texts.en: The Banco Mujer Esfuerzo Mutuo is a group comprised of 4 members and was begun in the year 2006 in the a community of Talamanca called Shiroles, which is an indigenous reservation. They have a lot of experience in the agricultural sector. Agriculture is the primary source of income in this community. All are indigenous women and they work raising pigs and growing plantains and bananas to sell. They are family businesses in which they also plant for their own consumption. This is one of the poorest areas of Costa Rica. All of the members have their businesses without neglecting their families, so they help in their households and with the education expenses, since their earnings are very low and some are single. Maylin is a member, 22 years old, single, and she has two children. She is the head of the household. The primary activity to support her household is raising pigs. When they complete their production cycle, she sells them. She purchases the animals by age, so to have income every month and to be able to gt ahead with her children, since they are in primary school. It is going very well for her and she has always worked in this job, with the goal of improving herself and giving her children a better quality of life. This member will invest the loan in purchasing pigs and concentrated feed. With Maylin are two other members who will invest in growing plantains, and the other in pigs.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Thảo

texts.en:
Mrs Thảo operates a food stall/restaurant selling fruit. Thảo is 58 years old and she is married with four children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Thảo's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She has been involved in this business for five years.

The main hardship that Thảo faces in her life is not having latrine so her family shares the neighbor latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Thảo hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find good jobs, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: David

texts.pt:
O Senhor David vive na casa própria com a sua esposa e dois filhos menores de idade, é pedreiro e trabalha muito distante da sua residência. Ele tem uma barraca em casa e a esposa cuida do negócio. Com o presente emprestimo vai aumentar o volume do seu negocio, comprando refrigerantes e carne para revender. Além de venda de diversos produtos sua esposa prepara refeiҫões na barraca. 
 O seu sonho é aumentar o volume do negócio e melhorar as condiҫões de vida.
Ele tem como desafio abril um restaurante para sua esposa
texts.en:
David lives with his wife and two underage children in a house that he owns. He's a mason and works very far from his home. He owns a stall in his house and his wife runs the business. With the current loan he'll increase turnover in his business by purchasing soft drinks and meat for re-selling. Aside from selling various merchandise, his wife prepares meals at the stall.
His dream is to increase turnover in his business and improve his living conditions.
His challenge is opening a restaurant for his wife.

loans.use: to purchase various soft drinks and meat for re-selling.

loans.name: Caetano

texts.pt: O Senhor Caetano vive na casa propria com esposa e três filhos. É tecnico de laboratório. Com o presente  empréstimo vai adiquirir material de construção, nomeadamente cimento, pedra, ferros, areia e pregos para dar continuidade com a sua obra. Tem como sonho terminar a sua casa e mobíliar, visto que, vive com a familia numa casa inacabada. O seu maior desafio é adquirir uma viatura que lhe facilite o deslocamento da sua residência até ao local de trabalho visto ser muito distante.
texts.en: Caetano lives with his wife and three children in a house that he owns. He's a lab technician. With the current loan he'll purchase construction supplies such as cement, rocks, iron, sand and nails so that he can continue his construction work. His dream is to finish his house and furnish it, because he lives with his family in a house that is yet unfinished. His biggest challenge is acquiring a vehicle that makes it easier for him to commute from home to work, since they're very far apart.

loans.use: to purchase cement, rocks, iron, sand and nails so he can continue his construction work.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is 42 years old and married with four children. With four children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Leonora runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, condiments, personal care products and other groceries.

She has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items. 

In the future, Leonora would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, eggs, condiments, personal care products and other groceries

loans.name: Noemi

texts.en:
Noemi is a married woman, 68 years old, with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines. Noemi requested a PHP 22,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Noemi has been in this business for two years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Ana Yancy

texts.es:
Ana, requiere de un nuevo préstamo para comprar frutas y verduras frescas para seguir teniendo un negocio competitivo y además le hará reparaciones al local en que tiene ubicado su negocio, con esta nueva inversión seguirá trabajando y su negocio tendrá mejor vistosidad.
El préstamo anterior le ha sido de mucho beneficio para mejorar su negocio, ofreciendo a sus clientes mejor variedad de frutas y verduras frescas, su familia se mantiene.
texts.en:
Ana needs a new loan in order to buy fresh fruits and vegetables in order to continue having a competitive business and in addition she will make repairs to the place where her business is located.  With this new investment, she will continue working and her business will look better.
The previous loan was of much benefit to improve her business, offering a better variety of fresh fruits and vegetables to her customers.  Her family holds together.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruits and vegetables in order to continue having a competitive business and in addition she will make repairs to the place where her business is located.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to plant vegetables and use the concentrate to fatten chickens.

loans.name: Miguela

texts.en:
Her name is Miguela, 29, a resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Bernardino, a vendor, and is blessed with a child who is still in the elementary level in school. The couple works hard to sustain their daily needs and send thier child to school.

Miguela buys several kilos of various kinds of vegetable and fruits such from a wholesaler and sells them by the kilo at her stand. She also sells mangoes, apples, citrus fruits and other Filipino fruit staples. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 1,000 in sales every day. 

Miguela is requesting a PHP 19,000 loan to purchase sweet potatoes, yams, cabbage, carrots, bitter melon, tomatoes, onions, raddish, etc. to sell at her vegetable stand. Filipino dishes are usually prepared with veggies that will make their dish more flavorful and nutritious. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help and a good return on her investment, for it will surely help cover their everyday needs and for their child's school needs.   

Miguela prays that God will prosper her business to give her family a good life and send her child to school. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members weekly to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies. 

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is comprised of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for various kinds of fruits and veggies to sell.

loans.name: Sally

texts.en:
Sally is a married woman, 56 years old, with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Sally has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

Sally has been in this business for five years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Jhon Alex

texts.es: Alex es un joven de 23 años de edad, vive con su madre y 2 hermanos que se dedican al jornal. Alex tiene nacionalidad colombiana y comenta que se vivo a Ecuador con la esperanza de conseguir un trabajo y ya no presenciar  los enfrentamientos que existen en Colombia. Alex desde que llego a Ecuador se dedica a la agricultura y  a la crianza de animales menores ya que es su madre es quien le enseña a estas actividades. Alex va a invertir el dinero del crédito en la compra de pollos. Alex aspira mejorar su negocio, mediante la crianza de animales menores y de ser posible le gustaría a futuro comprar un lote para mas adelante construir una pequeña casa, ya que en la actualidad paga arriendo por la casa en la que vive con su familia.
texts.en:
Alex is a 23-year-old young man. He lives with his mother and 2 brothers, who are day laborers. Alex has Colombian nationality, and he says that he moved to Ecuador in hopes of finding work and no longer witnessing the clashes that occur in Colombia.

Ever since Alex arrived in Ecuador, he has made a living by farming and raising small animals. His mother taught him these trades.

Alex is going to invest the loan money in the purchase of chickens. Alex aspires to improve his business raising small animals, and if possible, in the future he would like to buy a lot where he would later build a small house. Currently, he pays rent for the house where he lives with his family.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Maria Niña

texts.en:
Maria Niña is 33 years old and married with two children.

Maria Niña works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like home care products, beverages, condiments and other groceries.

Maria Niña has borrowed and paid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from fish vending.

Maria Niña aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like home care products,  beverages, condiments and other groceries

loans.name: Loida

texts.en:
Loida is 39 years old and married, with three children. With three children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Loida runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like beverages, canned goods, junk food, home care products and other groceries.

She has been in this business for three years now. 

In the future, Loida would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like beverages, canned goods, junk food, home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge, de 49 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, creció con sus padres y dos hermanos, está casado y tiene 6 hijos, tres están a cargo de él y los tres mayores cada uno tiene su hogar; su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos del hogar y además trabaja en la agricultura junto con él y sus hijos.

Jorge, siembra hortalizas como chile, tomate y frijol, aprendió a trabajar la agricultura desde que tenía 15 años de edad, gracias a unos amigos que le enseñaron y así poco a poco fue aprendiendo, también cultiva maíz y frijol, también trabaja en la alcaldía de la comunidad los días de semana de 6:00 a.m. a 8:00 p:m. los días libres son los días en los que él trabaja la agricultura y las hortalizas. Sus hijos y su esposa le ayudan mientras él anda trabajando por el pueblo.

Jorge, está solicitando un crédito para comprar fertilizantes, pesticidas y abono, además pagara el alquiler del terreno donde siembra. 

Jorge, sueña con construir una vivienda más grande, ya que la familia es extensa y no cuenta con el espacio suficiente, también desea ayudar y apoyar a sus hijos para que puedan terminar sus estudios y vivir feliz con su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge is 49 years old and studied up to Grade 2. He grew up with his parents and two siblings. He is married and has 6 children. Three of them are dependent on him and three are adults and have their own homes. His wife does domestic work and also works in farming along with him and his children.

Jorge grows vegetables like chile, tomatoes and beans. He learned how to farm from some friends who taught him when he was 15. And so little by little he has been learning. He also grows beans and corn and also works at the community's City Hall weekdays from 6 am until 8pm. On his days off he does his farming and vegetables. His children and his wife help him while he works for the city.

Jorge is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, pesticide and manure as well as pay the rent on the land he farms. Jorge dreams of building a larger house as his family is big and they don't have sufficient space. He also wants to help and support his children so they can finish their studies and live happily with his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and manure and pay to rent the land he plants.

loans.name: Orn

texts.en:
Orn is a 29-year-old factory worker. She is married, with a dependent child in her care, and she resides in Kompong Speu province, Cambodia. 

She has been working in a factory in a nearby province for over four years and earns approximately $5 per day. Her husband is a 24-year-old; he is a construction foreman earning $8 per day. Previously, both of them were farmers. 

Orn has decided to take out a loan because she needs money to buy a cow to fatten and breed for calves to sell. With this loan, she will be able to have enough money to buy a cow. 

In the future, she wants to save money to build a kitchen room and to support her child to earn a higher education.

loans.use: to buy a cow to fatten and breed for calves to sell

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
Wilfredo tiene 49 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, con un hijo a su cargo, vive en casa familiar en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad dedicada a la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio, ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de jornalería como peón agrícola, desde hace 10 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes dan buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. Solicita préstamo para la compra de nuevas herramientas para su negocio, esto le servirá para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que va a incrementar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Wilfredo is 49 years old, is in a common-law marriage with one dependent child, and lives in his family house in a rural zone of the Oyotún district, a community devoted to agriculture, animal husbandry and trade, which is located in the Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

He makes a living by providing services as an agricultural laborer, which he has done for 10 years and therefore has experience in the business and regular clients who give good personal and professional references for him. He is requesting the loan to buy new tools for his business, which will allow him to provide better service to his clients, which will increase his income level and will improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy new tools for his business.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
Jesusa lives at Amulung with her family. She sold vegetables before and now she is selling bags to students in their village. She is offering bags needed for the upcoming school days. 

She will still continue her vegetable vending business for additional profits. 

Jesusa is now asking for a loan of P8,000 to invest in buying more bags to sell. She will also buy some vegetables. 

In the future, Jesusa hopes to improve her small business and keep sustaining the needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy more bags to sell

loans.name: Reamay

texts.en:
Reamay is 23 years old with three children. With one child in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Reamay runs a food vending in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

She has been in this business for one year. 

In the future, Reamay would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 50 years old and has four children. She is married and has one child still in school.

Evangeline is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Evangeline requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Evangeline has been in this business for 22 years now; she also earns additional income from buying and selling banana and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Ritchel Joy

texts.en:
Ritchel Joy is a woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ritchel Joy is 34 years old and has four children who are in school.

Ritchel Joy has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 4,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Ritchel Joy has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Juana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Juana, está progresando con la ayuda de los créditos que le facilita Padecoms y los inversionistas Kiva, su venta de comida y de tortillas ha suplido las necesidades de sus clientes, teniendo así mejores ganancias para cubrir sus compromisos y apoyar a sus hijos para que terminen el bachillerato.
Nuevamente solicita un crédito para comprar verduras, granos básicos, azúcar, aceite, sal, bebidas, etc., de esta manera resurtirá el inventario del negocio para que sus clientes continúen satisfechos.
texts.en:
Juana is progressing with the help of the loans which PADECOMSM and the Kiva investors offer.  Her food and tortilla sales have supplied the necessities of her customers, thus she has better earnings to cover her debts and support her children so that they can complete high school.
Once again, she is requesting a loan to buy vegetables, basic grains, sugar, oil, salt, drinks, etc. and in this way she will restock the inventory of the business so her customers continue to be satisfied.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, basic grains, sugar, oil, salt, drinks, etc. and in this way she will restock the inventory of the business.

loans.name: Maria Veronica

texts.es: Veronica es madre soltera, a sus 19 años de edad tiene 2  hijos; uno de 4 meses y el otro de 4 años y ya asiste a la escuela.  Veronica se dedica a la crianza de animales menores ya que comenta que en la actualidad no puede salir a trabajar al jornal  ya que tiene que cuidar a su bebe. Veronica solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de chanchos. Veronica es una buena madre  y espera seguir trabajando en su negocio para salir adelante con sus hijos
texts.en:
Veronica is a single mother, and at her 19 years of age she has 2 children; one is 4 months old, and the other is 4 years old, and already goes to school. Veronica works in the raising of small animals, because she says that currently she cannot go out to work at a day job since she has to take care of her baby.

Veronica requests a loan so that she may invest it in the purchase of pigs. Veronica is a good mother, and hopes to continue working in her business so that she and her children can get ahead.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct a bathroom in the patio of her house

loans.name: Ketty Cecilia

texts.es:
La ciudad de Manta es considerada el balneario más importante, popular y visitado del Ecuador por sus hermosas y acogedoras playas, primer puerto de aguas profundas del Ecuador y sur América.
En este lugar vive la señora Ketty, tiene 62  años de edad y  está divorciada, tiene cuatro hijos mayores de edad e independientes.
Doña Ketty es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de Lencería y bisutería de todo tipo (aretes, cadenas, pulseras, etc.). Trabaja todos los días de la semana de dos a tres horas en la tarde. Tiene dos años  a esta actividad y le va muy bien, lo que más vende son los aretes, callares y anillos.
Este crédito es para comprar lencería y bisutería. Este es el tercer ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por el compañerismo.  Su sueño es que se incremente la venta de perfumes.
texts.en:
The city of Manta is considered the most important, popular, and visited seaside resort of Ecuador for its beautiful and inviting beaches.  It is the first deep-water port in Ecuador and South America.  

In this place lives Ketty.  She is 62 years old and is divorced.  She has 4 children who are of age and independent.  

Ketty is a housewife who, in order to obtain her own resources, has made a living selling lingerie and jewelry of all kinds (earrings, chains, bracelets, etc.).  She works every day of the week for 2-3 hours in the afternoon.  She has been doing this job for 2 years, and it is going very well.  She sells the most of earrings, necklaces, and rings.  

This loan is to buy lingerie and jewelry.  This is her third cycle in the Loan Group, which she likes for the camaraderie.  Her dream is to increase the sale of perfumes.

loans.use: to buy lingerie and jewelry.

loans.name: Jelyn

texts.en:
Jelyn is 44 years old and has four children. She is married and has one child still in school.

Jelyn is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Jelyn has been in this business for eight years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Judy

texts.en:
Judy is 57 years old, married, with eight children.

Judy works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell like milk, coffee, spices, noodles, canned goods, drinks, spices, eggs, etc.

Judy has borrowed and paid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from buying and selling bananas, and food vending.

Judy aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell like milk, coffee, spices, noodles, canned goods, drinks, spices, eggs, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies and to pay laborers to remove the weeds from the land where he will grow basic grains.

loans.name: Jose Teodolindo

texts.es:
José, tiene como actividades económicas principales el cultivo de granos básicos, la crianza de cerdos y aves de corral, las desarrollas gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres, por su cuenta a aprendido a trabajar en la jarcia, carpintería y albañilería, para tener mejores ingresos; actualmente está acompañado y tiene cuatro hijos, solo tres están estudiando, toda su familia depende de él.
Invertirá en cerdos, insumos agrícolas y pagará el arrendamiento del terreno en que va a sembrar granos básicos, espera fortalecer su negocio para tener en un futuro mejores condiciones económicas y familiares.
Sus sueños son salir adelante con su familia y darles a sus hijos un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Jose has as his principal economic activities the cultivation of basic grains and the raising of pigs and barnyard birds.  He carries these out thanks to the teachings of his parents.  On his own, he learned the crafts of weaving agave fiber, carpentry and masonry in order to have better income.  Nowadays, he is married and has four children.  Only three are studying.  The whole family depends on him.
He will invest in pigs and agricultural supplies and he will pay the rent for the land where he will plant basic grains.  He hopes to fortify his business in order to have better future economic and family conditions.
His dreams are to forge ahead with his family and give his children a better future.

loans.use: to invest in pigs and agricultural supplies and to pay the rent for the land where he will plant basic grains.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 46 years old and has eight children. She is married and has two children who are in school.

Rowena is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Rowena has been in this business for three years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Ratha's Group

texts.en:
Ratha, 29, is a mother of three children, living in Kampong Cham province. Nowadays, she helps to overcome her family’s hardship through growing cassava for sale and she could earn about 25,000KHR per day. 

Due to lack of funds, she is now applying for a loan to buy fertilizer, pesticides and pay for labor fee. She hopes to gain more yields than last year and have the ability to buy more farmland to expand her farming area.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and pay for labor fees

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase the types of food provided and to replace the damaged  equipment needed for her stall

loans.name: Endang

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! This is Endang, one of Ruma’s agents. Endang lives in Depok, an area located about one hour and thirty minutes drive from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. He is happily married. Together with his, they have one child. Endang owns a stall that sells daily consumer products and mobile airtime credits to his community. He already joined Ruma for almost a year. He knew Ruma from Ruma’s sales executive that came to his stall. 

As the business grows, Endang is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to his community. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Endang improves his business and accordingly, his community who needs access to such services. As seen in the photo, Endang is the one who is smiling. He thanks you for your kind and endless support.

loans.use: to give his community better access to communication and financial services by selling mobile airtime credits and providing bill payment services.

loans.name: Machimbo Group

texts.en:
Modesta, who is in her early 30s is married with three children who are still in school.  She has been running two projects,  a retail shop and mamalishe for five years now.  She works from 06 am to mid-night daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Modesta's 13th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to increase on both business and has paid back all her loans successfully. She used the profit to pay school fees, bought a plot of land, bought a TV set, bought a radio, a fridge, cupboards, loan repayment and covered household expenses.  She will use this loan to restock the out of stock items in her mamalishe store and to increase inventory in the retail shop. She dreams of building her own house.

MODESTA will share this loan with her loan group Machimbo which consist of two member which has two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock the out of stock items in her mamalishe store and to increase inventory in the retail shop.

loans.name: Ana Elizabeth

texts.es:
La ciudad de Manta es considerada el balneario más importante, popular y visitado del Ecuador por sus hermosas y acogedoras playas, primer puerto de aguas profundas del Ecuador y sur América.
En este lugar vive la señora Ana, tiene 47 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 2 hijos de 20 y 21 años que estudian en la Universidad. Su esposo es supervisor de una línea aérea.
Doña Ana es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y cosméticos.  Trabaja cinco días a la semana dos  horas al día, le ayuda una de las hijas cuando ella puede y está desocupada,  vende en efectivo y también  deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene seis años en esta actividad y le va muy bien, lo que más vende es ropa interior y cosméticos (rímel, lápiz de labios, esmaltes, etc.).
Este crédito es para comprar  vitrinas, zapatos para hombres y mujeres, blusas, shorts, interiores, etc.  Está en el Grupo De Crédito hace 10 años  y le gusta porque no piden tantos requisito. Su sueño es tener un local propio y grande.
texts.en:
The city of Manta is considered the most important, popular, and highly visited resort town in Ecuador because of its beautiful and inviting beaches. It is the first port to the deep waters of Ecuador and South America.

Here lives Ana, who is 47 years old and married. From this relationship she has two children who are 20 and 21 years old and attend college. Her husband is a supervisor for an airline.

Ana is a housewife who sells all kinds of clothing and cosmetics in order to have her own income. She works five days a week for two hours a day. One of her daughters helps when she can and isn't busy. She sells for cash or on credit, collecting every eight days. She has been working in this area for six years, and it is going very well for her. She mainly sells undergarments and cosmetics (mascara, lipstick, nail polish, etc.).

This loan is to buy display cabinets, men's and women's shoes, blouses, shorts, undergarments, etc. She has been part of the credit group for 10 years, and she likes it because they don't have as many requirements. Her dream is to have a large store of her own.

loans.use: to buy display cabinets, men's and women's shoes, blouses, shorts, undergarments, etc.

loans.name: Sonia Esther

texts.es:
La ciudad de Manta es considerada el balneario más importante, popular y visitado del Ecuador por sus hermosas y acogedoras playas, primer puerto de aguas profundas del Ecuador y sur América.
En este lugar vive la señora Sonia, tiene 54  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo se hace cargo del negocio familiar (hostería).
Doña Sonia se dedica al negocio familiar que es una Hostería donde llegan personas de diferentes ciudades y países a hospedarse.  Trabaja con la ayuda de su esposo,  pero la señora Sonia es quien más atiende. Su negocio lo tiene hace más de 30 años y funciona en su casa, le va muy bien con este negocio porque sus huéspedes reciben una buena atención y salen satisfechos de los servicios brindados.
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar sabanas, toallas y un televisor. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 12 ciclos y le gusta la organización que tiene la fundación. Su sueño es incrementar su negocio y ser la mejor Hostería.
texts.en:
The city of Manta is considered the most important, popular, and most visited beach resort town in Ecuador due to its beautiful and homely beaches, as well as the first deep-water port of Ecuador and South America.

It is in this place where Mrs. Sonia lives. She is 54 years old, married, and from this relationship has 3 adult and independent children. Her husband is in charge of the family business (hostel).

Doña Sonia works in the family business, where people from different cities and countries come to lodge. She works with the help of her husband, but Mrs. Sonia is the one who most deals with the clients. They have had their business for over 30 years, and it works out of their home. They get along well with the business because their guests receive a good care and they leave satisfied with the services they have been provided.

She would use the loan to buy sheets, towels, and a TV. She has been in the credit group for 12 cycles, and she likes how organized the foundation is. Her dream is expand her business, and be the best hostel.

loans.use: to buy sheets, towels, and a TV.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita, aged 60, is a widow with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Lolita has had a meat vending business in the Philippines for the past 10 years. 

She has requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy more meat to sell in the market. Lolita would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy more meat to sell in the market

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts, tyres and accessories

loans.name: Kemunto

texts.en:
Kemunto 55 years old, and supports 4 family members. 

She has been practicing small scale farming for the last 9 years earning an income of KES 9,000 per month. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. 

Her hope is to lead a financially stable life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his farming through application of modern farming technology to earn more income so as to improve family living standards.

loans.name: Briceño

texts.es:
Briceño tiene 39 años de edad, tiene seis hijos, vive en casa propia en la parte rural del distrito de Cañaris, provincia de Ferreñafe, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en esta comunidad es tranquila, sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería principalmente.

El se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, cuenta con 1 año de experiencia en el rubro y con clientela fija quienes brindan buenas referencias de el. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de abarrotes para incrementar el stock de su negocio, esto le generará mayores ingresos y así podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Briceño is 39 years old. He has six children and lives in a home he owns in the rural part of the Cañaris district, which is in the Ferreñafe province of the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. Life in this community is quiet; its inhabitants work mainly in farming, commerce, and animal husbandry.

He sells groceries for a living. His business is located in his home. He has one year of experience in the field, and he has steady customers who give him good references.

The loan will be used to purchase more groceries to increase his business' stock. This will generate a higher income for him, so that he can improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to increase his business' stock

loans.name: Ma. Venus

texts.en:
Ma. Venus is 49 years old and married with seven children. With three children in school, she works very hard to provide for them. Ma. Venus has been running a general store in the Philippines for the past 20 years.

She has requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy grocery items such as canned goods, personal care products, cigarettes, junk food, etc. to sell.

In the future, Ma. Venus would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy grocery items such as canned goods, personal care products, cigarettes, junk food, etc. to sell

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es:
José, de 25 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar, tienen un hijo de menos de un año de edad, en su casa vive una cuñada, pero solo su esposa y su hijo dependen de él.

José, trabaja como sastre desde hace 5 años, aprendió este trabajo tomando cursos de corte y confección, también siembra granos básicos, antes solo estudiaba, su trabajo está a 15 minutos viajando en bus, sale desde las 7:00 a.m. hasta las 4:00 p.m. 

José, necesita el crédito para comprar abonos, pesticidas, semillas y fertilizantes, de esa manera mejorará su condición para sembrar y esta necesidad se habrá terminado.

Sus sueños son ayudarle en el estudio a sus hijos y lograr darles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José, age 25, has completed high school. He’s married, and his wife does the housekeeping. They have a son who is less than a year old. His sister-in-law lives in his house, but only his wife and son depend upon him.

José has worked as a tailor for five years, having learned this work by taking sewing courses, and he also grows basic grains. Before, he only studied.  He travels fifteen minutes by bus to get to his job, and he’s gone from 7:00 A.M. until 4:00 P.M. 

José needs the loan to purchase compost, pesticide, seed, and fertilizer. In this way, he will improve his planting conditions and this necessity will have been met.

His dreams are to help his children with their studies and be able to give them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase compost, pesticide, seed, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Thol

texts.en:
Thol, aged 48, is a married man with four children who lives in a village in the Kandal province in Cambodia. Since 2010, vegetable farming has been the main source of his family’s income. His wife, aged 42, is a homemaker. Two of his four children work in a factory and two are in school. Thol and his two children can earn an income of USD 22 per day. 

Thol would like to improve his vegetable farming, so he is now requesting a loan to buy a tractor for plowing. With the loan, he will have enough money to buy this tractor for his farming, thus reducing his plowing expenses. Thol is going to help support his two children who are still in school to earn their bachelor degrees.

loans.use: to buy a tractor for plowing

loans.name: Lourenco

texts.pt: O Senhor Lourenço vive numa casa própria com a esposa e sua filha menor de idade.  É operador de maquina, com o presente empréstimo vai adiquirir materiais de contrução tais como cimento, areia, ferros, pedra, chapas de zinco para sua obra na casa onde reside. Tem como sonho terminar a obra e ser um comerciante reconhecido, visto que, tem uma barraca em casa. Seu maior desafio é financeiro pelo que vai reembolsar o emprestimo sem entrar em mora de forma a poder aceder ao outro para terminar a obra
texts.en: Lourenço lives with his wife and underage daughter in a house that he owns. He's a machine operator and with the current loan he'll purchase construction supplies such as cement, sand, iron, rocks and zinc plates to do construction work on his house. His dream is to finish the construction work and become a renowned trader, since he owns a stall at his house. His biggest challenge is financial, which is why he'll repay the loan without delinquency so that he can apply for another one to finish the construction work.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, iron, rocks and zinc plates to do construction work on his house.

loans.name: Herinqueta

texts.pt: A Senhora Henriqueta vive na casa propria com seu esposo e duas sobrinhas. É professora e com o presente emprestimo pretende adquirir cimento, pedra, ferro, areia para construir um murro na sua residência. Tem como sonho ter um filho, profissionalmente almeja progredir de carreira. Seu maior desafio é ter uma boa condição financeira para poder cuidar condignamente da sua família
texts.en: Henriqueta lives with her husband and two nieces in a house that she owns. She's a teacher and with the current loan she intends to purchase cement, rocks, iron and sand in order to build a fence wall around her house. Her dream is to have a child. Professionally, she wishes to get ahead in her career. Her biggest challenge is having a good financial situation so that she can provide for her family.

loans.use: to purchase cement, rocks, iron and sand in order to build a fence wall around her house.

loans.name: Juan Rodolfo

texts.es:
Juan, es una persona que vive con sus padres, es soltero; a buscado superase y apoyar económicamente a sus padres con los gastos que se generan en su hogar, es un alfarero reconocido en su comunidad, su familia le ha heredado el oficio, atiende su negocio desde hace 10 años sin que ayuda, tiene un horario de ocho de la mañana a ocho de la noche, además practica el cultivo de granos básicos. 
Quiere mejorar la productividad por lo que está solicitando capital de trabajo para comprar barro crudo, arenilla, nacazcol y leña, para elaborar sartenes, ollas, cantaros, etc., espera satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, administrar bien el 100% del crédito para obtener mejores ganancias.
Juan desea lograr tener solvencia económica, que se negoció crezca y seguir apoyando a su familia para tener un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his parents, is single, and is seeking to get ahead and financially support his parents with their household expenses. He is a renowned potter in his community, a craft that he has inherited from his family. He has attended to his business for the past 10 years without assistance, and has a schedule form eight in the morning until eight in the evening. Additionally, he works in the cultivation of basic grains.

He wants to improve productivity, for which he is requesting capital for his business to buy raw clay, sand, black dye, and firewood in order to make pots, pans, pitchers, etc. He hopes to satisfy the needs of his customers and successfully manage 100% of the loan to gain better profits. Juan hopes to achieve financial solvency, that his business grows, and to continue supporting his family have a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy raw clay, sand, black dye and firewood, in order to make pots, pans, pitchers, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase traditional skirts, fabric, and scarves for re-selling at the local market.

loans.name: 030504040003.thiệu Trung Group

texts.en:
Tuyết is 55 years old and she is married with two children. Tuyết is the group leader of the 030504040003.thiệu Trung Solidarity Group, which consists of four members. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

Mrs Tuyết has a retail business selling votive objects. She is requesting a loan to purchase votive objects to resell.

In 2009, Tuyết joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Tuyết has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

Tuyết has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Tuyết faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Tuyết hopes for her children to find a good job, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase votive objects to resell.

loans.name: Bersalia

texts.es:
Bersalia, ha tenido un impacto positivo en su negocio al invertir el financiamiento, las ganancias han sido utilizadas para mejorar su calidad de vida y remodelar su vivienda.
Está solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar fertilizantes, abono, semilla y herbicidas para sembrar maíz, está motivada a seguir trabajando con créditos para prosperar.
texts.en:
Bersalia has made a positive impact on her business by investing the funding. The profits have been used to improve her quality of life and remodel her home.
She is requesting a new loan to buy fertilizer, compost, seed and herbicides to grow corn. She is motivated to continue working with loans in order to prosper.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure, seed and herbicides to cultivate corn.

loans.name: Irma Yamileth

texts.es:
Yamileth, de 32 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato opción Asistente Administrativa, actualmente su compañero de vida reside en U.S.A, con el cual procrearon 4 hijos.- Yamileth, recibe ayuda del papá de sus hijos, pero ella se dedica a vender cosméticos y otros productos por catalogo, para cubrir ciertos gastos de su hogar.
