Currently, she is applying for a Kiva loan, her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to invest in her customers' orders: bags with children's designs, sandals, creams, perfumes, and more. With the investment, Laura believes it will allow her to increase her sales and, with that, increase her working capital. Laura wants to finish her professional degree to be able to do a postgraduate degree and, in her business, to continue growing to have a shop.

loans.use: to invest in her customers' orders: bags with children's designs, sandals, creams, perfumes, and more.

loans.name: Paola Andrea

texts.es: Paola es una joven nativa de Baranoa un municipio ubicado en la Región Caribe Colombiana, conocido por las fiestas patronales de Santa Ana y de Reyes el 6 de enero o La Loa a los Santos Reyes Magos.  A sus 18 años de edad es propietaria de un almacén misceláneo que heredó de su abuelo, quien antes de fallecer le dejo a su cargo, en el ofrece a los habitantes del sector artículos que comúnmente se venden en este formato de negocio; cintas, libretas, papeles para envolturas de regalos, cartulinas, detalles para toda ocasión y demás.  Su negocio se encuentra en su vivienda y todos los días atiende a partir de las 8 a.m. a  8 p.m., lo cual demuestra su compromiso y dedicación.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en tarjetas, blusas y peluches.  Esta inversión es de suma importancia para mejorar el surtido de productos y poder exhibir nuevos modelos. Paola es una joven que planea a futuro tener una casa propia y ampliar el local, así mismo desea continuar estudiando y mejorar los ingresos del negocio.
texts.en: Paola is a young woman from Baranoa, a municipality located in the Colombian Caribbean Region, known for its patron saint festivals of Santa Ana and of the Kings on January 6 or The Praises of the Holy Wise Men. At 18 years old, she is the owner of a general store which she inherited from her grandfather who, before he died, left it in her care. She sells the products which are commonly sold in this kind of business to the inhabitants in the area: ribbons, notebooks, wrapping paper, cardstock, decorations for all sorts of occasions,and more. Her business is located in her home and she works there every day from 8 am to 8 pm, which shows her commitment and dedication. Currently, she is applying for a Kiva loan, her first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to invest in cards, blouses, and stuffed animals. This investment is very important to improve the assortment of products and be able to show new models. Paola is a young woman who plans to own her own house and expand the retail space in the future, as well as wanting to continue studying and improve the business's income.

loans.use: to invest in cards, blouses and stuffed animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, meat, flour, vegetables, and seasonings for making food and selling it.

loans.name: Ñaupaqman Purisum Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “ÑAUPAQMAN PURISUM”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Santa Ana, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosa ella es soltera y tiene 38 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de restaurant, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de cereales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “ÑAUPAQMAN PURISUM” communal bank. This bank is located in Santa Ana district, La Convención province and Cusco department. 

The member Rosa is single, 38 years old, and has one child. She works in her restaurant business. She makes different dishes such as baked chicken, soups, and meat stir-fries. The member works from 8:00 am to 8:00 pm. She has had this business for 8 years now, and it is going very well. The member's dream is to have a restaurant. She asks for the loan to purchase products for cooking such as rice, vegetables, and chicken.

The other members work in a business selling animals, a business selling grains, a grocery store business, and a business selling food. 

The member is grateful to those who are a part of this dream through this platform and promises to make her payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase products for cooking such as rice, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Kalipa

texts.ru: Калипа, 55 лет, замужем, есть сын. Образование среднее, уже 15 лет занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее есть 3 коровы, 23 овец. На участке мерою 0,84 ГА она выращивает органические арбузы для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян, удобрений и клеенки для парника. Доходы от кредита Калипа планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, чтобы накопить средства на увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Kalipa is 55 and married with one son. She has a high school education and has been working in farming for 15 years. She has three cows and 23 sheep as well as 0.84 hectares of land where she grows organic watermelon for her own use and for sale. 

With the goal of further developing her business, Kalipa has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 40,000 KGS to purchase seeds, fertilizers and plastic for her greenhouse. She plans to put profits from the loan into further development of her business so she can save toward increasing her head count of livestock.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and plastic for her greenhouse in order to grow organic watermelons

loans.name: Antonio Faustino

texts.es: Antonio tiene 32 años de edad es casado tiene 2 hijos  vive en Ventanas Provincia de los Rios, El se dedica al servicio de transporte de pasajeros en tricimoto, solicita el crédito para el mantenimiento de la tricimoto ya que tiene algunas fallitas y quiere areglarle para dar un mejor servicio a sus usuarios, su sueño es comprarse un terreno y un carro para taxi, en su tiempo libre le gusta servir a Dios.
texts.en: Antonio is 32 years old, is married, and has two children who live in the town of Ventanas, in the Province of Ríos, Ecuador.  He works as a motorcycle taxi driver.  He is asking for a loan in order to fix his motorcycle taxi since it has a few issues and he wants to fix them in order to offer better service to his customers.  His dream is to buy himself a plot of land and a car that he can use as his taxi.  In his free time he likes to serve God.

loans.use: to fix his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, fabrics and threads to make more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 24-year-old man from Jabalia City. He is a single man.

Ali was living with his family in a small humble house, but during the latest war on Gaza, his house was completely destroyed and he had to rent a small apartment in the same area.

Recently, Ali took a USD loan from Palestine for Credit & Development (FATEN) in order to repair part of his family's old house. The loan will allow Ali to finalize the needed construction in a short time and return his family to their normal life.

Ali appears in the photo.

loans.use: to repair part of his family's old house.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 47 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Edna is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase spare parts for the repair of her farming equipment to be used during the farming season.

Edna has been farming rice for 25 years and also earns additional income from a buy and sell rice business.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream which is to  build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for the repair of her farming equipment to be used during the farming season.

loans.name: Mila

texts.en:
Mila is 40 years old and married with seven children.  With two children in school, Mila works very hard to provide for them.

Mila runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

Mila has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as soap, sugar, noodles and other groceries. 

In the future, Mila would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Mirasol

texts.en:
Mirasol is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Mirasol is 35 years old and both of her children are in school.

Mirasol has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. Mirasol requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more items like pants, blouses, curtains and other home products to sell.

Mirasol has been in this business for three years. In the future, Mirasol would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more items like pants, blouses, curtains and other home products to sell.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She runs a business selling coconut wine in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more empty containers for storage of her coconut wine.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Patricia dreams that, one day, she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more empty containers for storage of her coconut wine.

loans.name: Fidelina

texts.en:
Fidelina is 35 years old and has two children. Fidelina is married and has one child who is currently in school.

Fidelina is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Fidelina requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Fidelina has been in pig fattening for 4 years now and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Fidelina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Vazgen

texts.en:
Vazgen is happy and thankful for his first Kiva loan, and he hopes that with his second Kiva loan his business will develop again. 

After many years working in Russia, Vazgen returned to Armenia in 2005 and established his own business. In his own space, he opened a butcher shop, providing fresh and tasty meat to his regular customers. In his workplace, Vazegen also takes orders for kebab (shish kebob) and other kinds of meat dishes. Vazgen chooses the meat for his butcher shop very carefully, making sure of its freshness. He orders his meat at wholesale and there are several farmers who usually provide meat to Vazgen.  

Vazgen is married and he lives with his wife (she is a nurse) and two sons in Ijevan city of the Tavush region. Vazgen’s elder son greatly helps his father in their family business. With this loan, Vazgen will purchase a lot of meat for his business and its development.

loans.use: to purchase a lot of meat for his business and its development.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to help her sister cover her university fees and complete her education.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a smallholder farmer based in Kapsowar, Kenya. She grows maize and keeps poultry. She started farming three years ago. It was a means of looking after the family. Besides farming, she started planting trees to give the farm an aesthetic appearance. Since then, she has become a hardened farmer. Jane is seeking a loan to purchase farm implements. She is going to use the money to purchase modern farm equipment that is in good working condition, efficient and improved in design and usability. She has opted out of using old tools that are worn out and stressful to use. She believes she is going to realize a better harvest as a result of using better tools. She will use the additional income to provide her family with a better life.

loans.use: to purchase farm tools.

loans.name: Alba Leonor

texts.es: Alba es una señora muy trabajadora, ella tiene 59 años de edad, Alba es divorciada, Alba tiene 4 hijos que ya son mayores de edad y trabajan elaborando ladrillo. Alba desde muy joven se dedica a la crianza de animales menores. Alba en esta ocasión solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de  pollos. Alba comenta también trabaja haciendo ladrillo manualmente. Alba se puso la meta de seguir adelante en su negocio, readecuar los galpones y hacer un criadero de pollos, ya que de este negocio Alba espera ayudarse en la obtención de mas recursos económicos y mejorar la calidad de vida suya y de sus hijos.
texts.en: Alba is a very hard-working woman.  She is 59 years old and divorced with four grown children who work making bricks.  Alba has been dedicated to raising small feed animals since she was young.  Currently she is asking for a loan in order to invest in the purchase of chickens.  Alba comments that she also works making bricks by hand.  Alba gave herself the goal of moving forward with her business, fixing up her home and starting a breeding area for chickens.  Alba hopes to help herself via this business to obtain sufficient income and to improve her quality of life and that of her children.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of chickens.

loans.name: Katherine

texts.es:
Katherine es una joven estudiante de Ingenieria Civl, ella solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativo, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es Katherine y soy la ciudad de la Altagracia, tengo 21 año de edad y debido a que tengo que trasladarme a diario para estudiar tuve que mudarme a San Pedro de Macorís. Estoy viviendo sola, tuve que hacerlo de esta manera porque de lo contrario gastaría mucho dinero en el transporte y los viajes son muy largos. Tengo 5 hermanos los cuales estudian y mis padres trabajan. 
Quiero continuar estudiando ingeniería civil ya que tengo un media beca la cual debo aprovechar, pero la otra parte de la matriculación me hace falta y por eso estoy solicitando este préstamo. Soy estudiante meritoria y gracias a esto me gane una laptop en la universidad. Mi carrera es muy costosa po ello también necesito una ayuda para continuar los estudios. Soy una persona de escasos recursos y aunque mis padres hacen lo posible por ayudarme con lo que puede, me hace falta una ayuda extra ya que somos muchos y sus ingresos no son suficientes para ayudarnos.
Si me aprueban este préstamo voy a continuar estudiando mucho para graduarme con honores y así conseguir un buen empleo que pueda aportar aunque sea un granito de arena en mi sociedad. 
Mi familia no tiene mucho dinero, viven en una pequeña casa, por eso es que solicito este préstamo para continuar mis estudios y ser una gran profesional.
texts.en:
Katherine is a young civil engineering student. She is requesting this loan to cover her higher education costs, and this is her story:

"My name is Katherine and I'm from the city of Altagracia. I'm 21 years old, and since I have to travel to school every day, I had to move to San Pedro de Macorís. I'm living alone because if I did otherwise, transportation would cost too much money and the trips are very long.  I have five brothers who are all in school and my parents work.
I want to continue studying civil engineering as I'm on a half scholarship that I want to take advantage of. But I don't have the other part of my enrollment costs, and that's why I'm requesting this loan. I'm an honors student, and thanks to that, I earned a laptop for university. My field of study is very expensive, which is another reason I need a hand to finish my studies. I don't have a lot of resources, and even though my parents do what they can to help me, I still don't have everything I need, as there are a lot of us and their income isn't enough to help all of us.

If I'm approved for this loan, I'll continue studying hard so that I can graduate with honors and get a good job so that I can do my part to contribute to society.

My family doesn't have a lot of money. They live in a small house, and that's why I'm requesting this loan so that I can finish my studies and become a real professional."

loans.use: graduate with her civil engineering degree

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María, tiene 33 años de edad, es soltera, reside en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Tela, y colinda al municipio de el Progreso, Yoro.  María desde hace dos años y medio tiene establecida una pulpería para vender granos básicos, productos enlatados, productos de aseo, pastas, botellones con agua, condimentos, cereales, etc. y también vende mercadería  como ropa, cosméticos, cremas, lociones y otros. Esta solicitando un préstamo por 12,000 lempiras para surtir su pulpería de productos alimenticios y para comprar ropa nueva para vender. Su fin de invertir es para mantener el negocio y hacer crecer la pulpería para aumentar ingresos y seguir adelante.
texts.en:
Maria is 33 years old and single. She resides in a village in the municipality of Tela, adjoining the municipality of Progreso, Yoro. 

Maria established a general store two and a half years ago where she sells basic grains, canned goods, cleaning products, pasta, large bottles of water, condiments, cereals, etc. She also sells merchandise such as clothes, cosmetics, creams, lotions, and other products. 

Maria is seeking a loan for 12,000 lempiras to stock her general store with food products and new clothes. the goal of this investment is to keep her business going and to develop the general store so that her earnings increase and she can continue to get ahead.

loans.use: to stock her general store with food products and new clothes.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es:
Gabriela es una estudiante de Bionanális, ella solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es Gabriela y soy de San Pedro de Macorís, Republica Dominicana. Tengo 21 años y vivo con mis padres. Tengo dos hermanos, mi padre es chofer y mi madre cuidadora de niños.  
Quiero estudiar Bioanálisis en la Universidad Central del Este UCE. Escogí esta carrera porque siempre me he interesados por investigación en el análisis biológico del ser humano.
Mi familia no tiene muchos dinero, y la matrícula es muy alta, mis padre me pueden alojar y alimentar mientras estoy estudiando pero no tienen dinero para pagarme la matricula. Estoy solicitando este préstamo a KIVA para poder pagar la matricula. Si no obtengo este préstamo no podré estudiar y tendré que ponerme a buscar empleo. 
Si me aprueba este préstamo voy a estudiar mucho y pondré todo mi esfuerzo para graduarme y conseguir un buen empleo como bioanalista. Quiero enfocarme en el bienestar y la salud de cada persona.
texts.en:
Gabriela is a bioanalysis student.  She is requesting a loan in order to be able to cover her educational expenses.  Here is her story.

My name is Gabriela, and I am from San Pedro de Macorís in the Dominican Republic.  I am 21 years old, and I live with my parents.  I have two siblings.  My father is a driver, and my mother cares for children.

I want to study bioanalysis at the Universidad Central del Este UCE.  I chose this career because I have always been interested in human bioanalysis.

My family does not have much money, and the tuition is very high.  My parents can house and feed me while I am studying, but they do not have the money to pay the tuition.

I am requesting this loan from Kiva in order to pay the tuition.  If I do not get this loan, I will not be able to go to school, and I will have to look for employment.

If I am approved for this loan, I will study a lot.  I will put all of my efforts into graduating and getting a good bioanalysis job.  I want to focus on the well-being and health of each person.

loans.use: to cover higher education costs.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: Patricia es una señora muy alegre, Patricia se separo de su esposo. Patricia saca adelante a sus 3 hijos de las edades de 7, 13 y 15 años de edad. Patricia  se dedica a trabajar al jornal de trabajos de agricultura y a la crianza de animales menores. Patricia solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de chanchos. Patricia paga arriendo por la casa en la que vive con sus hijos que se encuentran estudiando. Patricia espera que su negocio siga siendo bueno y mejorarlo para que sus ingresos aumenten para el bienestar de sus hijos. Patricia comenta que ella es padre y madre de sus hijos ya que el que fue su esposo no le apoya en nada.
texts.en: Patricia is a very happy woman. Patricia separated from her husband. Patricia provides for her 3 children, ages 7, 13, and 15. Patricia makes a living working as a day laborer in agriculture and breeding small animals. Patricia is requesting the loan to invest it in the purchase of pigs. Patricia pays rent for the house in which she lives with her children where they can be found studying. Patricia hopes that her business will continue being good and to improve it so that her income will increase for the wellbeing of her children. Patricia comments that she is the father and the mother of her children since the man who was her husband doesn't support them at all.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Tatevik

texts.en:
Tatevik is 19 years old and she lives with her beloved husband in Vanadzor city in the Lori region. 

Both Tatevik and her husband are hairdressers and they are employed now. Tatavik took part in special courses on hairdressing and she has a certificate of professional master. Tatavik has worked only a year but she already managed to have a lot of customers thanks to her taste and nice work. 

Now, simultaneously with her work, she also has an idea of having another occupation and more profit. With this Kiva loan, she wants to buy some assortment of perfume and cosmetics that she can sell in the beauty salon where she works now. She is sure that it will work and it can be a rather profitable small business for her young family.

loans.use: to buy some assortment of perfume and cosmetics that she can sell in the beauty salon where she works now.

loans.name: Yulisa Del Carmen

texts.es: Yulisa de 22 años, inició su negocio de venta de productos por catálogos al afrontar una difícil situación económica, esta emprendedora joven se propuso generar recursos para su sostenimiento,  circunstancia de la vida que le permitió afrontar nuevos retos y ponerse a prueba como comerciante.  Comenzó a ofrecerles a sus familiares y amigos y  poco a poco incrementó su clientela al ofrecerles a sus compañeras de universidad.  Los productos que ofrece son lociones corporales, shampoo, cremas faciales, talcos y demás productos que se encuentren en la oferta del catálogo.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir pedidos de sus clientes; tratamientos faciales y para el cabello.  Yulisa desea continuar con su carrera universitaria para poder ejercer su profesión y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo desea seguir en su negocio y mejorar su flujo de caja.  Su gran desafío ha sido acceder al sector financiero.
texts.en:
Yulisa is 22 years old. She started her business selling products from catalogs upon confronting a difficult economic situation. This young entrepreneur pushed herself to generate the resources to support herself.  Life circumstances have allowed her to face new challenges and to put herself to the test as a businesswoman. 

She began to offer to her family members and friends, and little by little she grew her clientele to offer to her classmates at university. The products she offers are body lotions, shampoo, face cream, powders, and other products that are found in the catalog offerings. 

Currently she is using a Kiva loan, early financing provided by the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation to invest in her clients' orders; facial treatments and hair treatments. 

Yulisa wishes to continue her university career to be able to practice her profession and improve her quality of life, in this way she wishes to continue in her business and improve her cash flow. Her great challenge has been to gain access to the financial sector.

loans.use: to invest in her clients' requests: facial and hair treatments

loans.name: 040606050004 Đông Vệ Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Khoa operates a food stall/restaurant selling pork. Khoa has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Khoa faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more pork to resell.

Khoa is 51 years old, and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

Khoa is the group leader of the 040606050004 Đông Vệ solidarity group, which consists of four members. 

In 2011, Khoa joined the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Khoa has successfully repaid three loans from the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

Along with her business profit, Khoa hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase more pork to resell

loans.name: Fahid

texts.en:
Fahid is a 27-year-old man from Jabalia City. He is married and a father to one son and one little daughter.

Fahid was living with his family in a small, humble house, but during the latest war on Gaza his house destroyed completely, then he had to rent a small apartment in the same area.

Recently Fahid took a USD loan from Palestine for Credit & Development (FATEN) in order to help repair part of his old house. The loan will allow Fahid to finalize the needed construction in a short time and return his family to their normal life.

Fahid appears in the photo.

loans.use: to repair part of his old house.

loans.name: Amelita

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Amelita works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell vegetables business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from running a general store and raising pigs. 

Amelita is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of vegetables to sell for her buy and sell vegetables business.

Amelita has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.en:
Antonieta is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with five children.

She runs a fish-vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more seafood to sell to customers.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Antonieta dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more seafood to sell to customers.

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es: Blanca en una señora muy trabajadora, Blanca a sus 37 años de edad esta separada de su esposo, Blanca vive con sus 3 hijos que tienen 10, 12 y 17 años de edad. Los hijos de Blanca se encuentran estudiando. Blanca obtiene sus recursos  económicos de la crianza de animales menores y de trabajar al jornal. Blanca solicita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de pollos, Blanca esta segura de poder trabajar para salir adelante con sus hijos y sobre todo espera que no le haga falta el dinero para pagar los estudios de ellos. Blanca  cuenta con que su negocio se haga mas rentable para el bienestar de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Blanca is a very hardworking woman. At 37 years of age, she is separated from her husband and lives with her three children who are 10, 12, and 17 years old. Her children are currently studying. Blanca gets her financial resources raising small animals and working as a day laborer.

Blanca is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of chickens. She is sure that she will be able to work to get ahead with her children, and she especially hopes that she does not lack the money to pay for her children's education. She is counting on her business being more viable for the well-being of her children.

loans.use: to purchase chickens

loans.name: Getrude

texts.en:
Gertrude is 40 years old. She grew up under harsh conditions because she was an orphan and therefore started fending for herself at a very tender age. She dropped out of school after primary seven and joined a local building group where she was trained in brick making. She later got married and they started to work together for survival. 

She previously got a loan of 2,000,000 UGX from Ugafode microfinance, which she used to expand their brick-making project. She supplements income from the sale of bricks with agriculture.

She is now requesting a loan of UGX 3,000,000 to buy organic fertilizers and improved seeds to boost her production. She appreciates UGAFODE and Kiva support in her business endeavours.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers and improved seeds to boost her production.

loans.name: Evelin Patricia

texts.es: A  sus 24 años de edad Evelin se dedica a trabajar al jornal y a la crianza de animales menores, Evelin es madre soltera y su hijo tiene 2 años. Evelin vive con su hijo y su madre que es jornalera. Evelin comenta que se va a trabajar al jornal llevando a su hijo y muchas veces por las lluvias, o por el calor excesivo que hace  el niño se le enferma. Evelin con el dinero del crédito va a comprar chanchos ya que ella espera que este negocio mejore y ya no tener que salir con su hijo a trabajar al jornal por lo menos hasta que su hijo sea mas grandecito. Evelin dice que si puede sacar adelante a su hijo, solo espera que su inversión en chanchos sea muy buena, y todo para el bienestar de su hijo.
texts.en:
At the age of 24 Evelin makes a living as a field worker and raising young animals. Evelin is a single mother with a two year old son, she lives with her son and her mother who is also a field worker. 

Evelin says that she goes to work in the fields with her son, often it is raining or excessively hot and her son gets sick as a result. 

With the money from the loan, Evelin will buy pigs and she hopes that the business will grow and she won't need to go out with her son to work in the fields, at least until her son is older. Evelin says that in this way she can take care of her son, she hopes that the investment in pigs goes well and that everything is for the well-being of her son.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Zebra Group Musoma

texts.en:
Faustine, who is in her mid 20s, is single with one small child.  She has been running a retail shop for three years now. She works from 7 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Faustine's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She will use this loan to increase the shop inventory and meet her customers' requirements. She dreams of opening another business.

Faustine will share this loan with her loan group, Zebra Group Musoma, which consists of five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase the shop inventory and meet her customers' requirements.

loans.name: Nhóm 13 Phố Hạnh Phúc, Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thực operates a food stall/restaurant selling processed food. Thực has been involved in this business for five years.

One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase supplies to make processed food for sale.

Thực is 41 years old, and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

Thực is the group leader of the Nhóm 13 Phố Hạnh Phúc, Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of four members. This is Thực's first loan with the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

Along with her business profit, Thực hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to make processed food for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy dairy feeds for his dairy cows to get more milk and more income to support his family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase stocks of baking flour, maize flour, rice, beans and cooking oil for use in his food stall to attract and serve more customers.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice is a hardworking mother who lives in Chebiemit in the Kapsowar area of Kenya. She is a hardened crop farmer who is struggling with farm-related expenses. She has been doing this work for 10 years. Eunice noted that the crop's performance is heavily reliant on external factors such as weather. For this reason, farmers usually realize they have lost a great percentage of their crops during harvest. To make the investment worthwhile, a farmer has to make up for the foreseeable crop losses by working on a significant area of land. 

Eunice is seeking a loan of KES 10,000 that will enable her to buy seedlings and fertilizers to grow more crops in the coming season. She believes this loan will increase food security in her home.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as seedlings and fertilizers

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is 46 years old and has nine children. Analyn is married, and three of her children are still in school.

Analyn is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Analyn requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Analyn has been in this business for five years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
Guadalupe es una mujer de 42 años de edad, es soltera tiene una linda hija que ya es mayor de edad y se encuentra casada, ella vive en una comunidad de Guiniales.
Guadalupe con el afán de obtener sus ingresos salir adelante, se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica, ella tiene seis años de realizar esta labor.
Guadalupe necesita surtir mejor su negocio, porque hay mucha competencia y deberá ofrecerles a los clientes una variedad de precio y estilos, es por ello que ahora ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para poder realizar esta inversión.
El gran sueño de Guadalupe es poder instalar una tienda de ropa típica  y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is a 42 year old woman, she is single with a beautiful daughter who is now an adult and married. Guadalupe lives in the community of Guiniales. 

Guadalupe has been making a living selling and buying typical clothing for the last six years, with the goal of making enough money to improve her life. She needs to better stock her business as there is a lot of competition and she needs to offer a variety of styles and prices to her customers. For this reason she has decided to seek a loan. 

Guadalupe's dream is to open a store selling typical clothing and increase her earnings.

loans.use: to buy and sell typical clothing.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es: Rosa es una señora alegre, tiene 2 hijos de 4 y 6 años de edad, ellos asisten a la escuela y dice que son muy estudiosos, Rosa se dedica 5 años a su negocio que es una tienda y panadería. Rosa comenta que siguió un curso para poder elaborar pan, pasteles, galletas y mas. Rosa trabaja de lunes a sábado en su negocio ya que si tiene buenas ventas de productos de panadería y  productos de tienda, Rosa no tiene ninguna ayuda del padre de sus hijos asi que tiene que luchar sola para los gastos de sus hijos, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos para elaborar pan asi como harina y para comprar mercadería para su tienda y le gustaría ampliar y adecuar su negocio para que sea más llamativo para su clientela.
texts.en: Rosa is a cheerful woman who has 2 children, ages 4 and 6. They go to school and she says they are very studious. Rosa has worked for 5 years in her business which is a store and bakery. Rosa says that she took a course to be able to make bread, cakes, cookies, and more. Rosa works from Monday to Saturday in her business, since she has good sales of her baked goods and the products in her store. Rosa doesn't have any help from the father of her children, so she has to struggle alone with her children's expenses. The loan will be invested in the purchase of products to make bread, such as flour, and to purchase merchandise for her store and she would like to expand and outfit the business so that it is more attractive for her customers.

loans.use: to purchase flour.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre de 56 años de edad, es soltero vive junto a su linda familia de dos hijos quienes ahora ya se encuentran casados y con familia, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Nahualá.
Francisco con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a prestar servicios de trasporte desde hace diez años. Pero para mejorar sus ingresos también se dedica a la venta de banano.
Francisco ahora está muy preocupado porque tiene la necesidad de remodelar el piso de su casa, porque a pesar de todo el esfuerzo que él ha hecho no le ha sido posible por tal motivo tomo la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para poder comprar pisos de cerámica y cemento.
El gran sueño de francisco es poder comprar otro microbús para mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Francisco is a 56-year-old man. He is single and lives with his lovely family of two children who are now married and have families. This humble family lives in a community of Nahualá.

Francisco, with the desire to earn income and get his family ahead, has worked offering transportation services for the past ten years. But, to get more income, he also works selling bananas.

Now, Francisco is very concerned since he needs to remodel the floor of his house because, despite all of the efforts that he has made, it has not been possible. For this reason, he decided to ask for a loan to be able to purchase ceramic floor tiles and cement.

Francisco's biggest dream is to be able to purchase another passenger van to increase his income.

loans.use: to purchase ceramic floor tiles and cement.

loans.name: Nhóm 5 Thôn 7 Quảng Hải Group

texts.en:
Mr. Liên works in agriculture, raising poultry. Liên has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Liên faces in his business is the lack of capital. He is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Liên is 46 years old, and he is married with two children. He lives and works in Quang Xuong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

Liên is the group leader of the Nhóm 5 thôn 7 Quảng Hải solidarity group, which consists of four members. This is Liên's first loan with the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

Along with his business profit, Liên hopes for his family to be healthy and happy, for his business to do well, and for his children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Shadi

texts.en:
Shadi is a 37-year-old man from Jabalia City, married and father to two sons and a one little daughter.

Shadi was living with his family in a small humble house, but during the latest war on Gaza, his house was destroyed completely, so he had to rent a small apartment in the same area.

Recently Shadi took a USD loan from Palestine for Credit and Development (FATEN) to help repair part of his old house. The loan will allow Shadi to finalize the needed construction in a short time and return his family to their normal life.

loans.use: to repair part of his old house.

loans.name: Hanifa

texts.en:
Hanifa is an honest woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1960. She is married and has children. She is living in a rural area with her family. 

She is a business woman. She does businesses of keeping livestock and planting agricultural products. She works hard and feeds her family. 

For many years she did not have a rest and it has influenced her health. She became sick and needs treatment now but she does not want to miss her business because it brings her money to live. She appealed to IMON asking financial support to get treatment for herself and to buy cattle for her business.

She hopes to be supported because in their rural place, earning a living is hard and they have to work hard to live.

loans.use: to get medical treatment and buy cattle for her business.

loans.name: Lenie

texts.en:
Lenie is 58 years old and a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Lenie has a general store business in the Philippines. Lenie requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional items like soft drinks, coffee, detergent soap, sugar, shampoo, biscuits, etc., to sell.

Lenie has been in this business for 15 years. Lenie would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like soft drinks, coffee, detergent soap, sugar, shampoo, biscuits, etc., to sell

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is married and works hard to support her family. 

Janet has a pig-fattening business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years now.

Janet requested a PHP 11,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more vitamins and other supplies for her business.

Janet would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more vitamins and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Jose Esteban

texts.es:
José, de 42 años de edad, es una persona honesta, trabajadora y responsable, siempre se ha dedicado a la siembra de granos básicos, ya que el no tuvo la oportunidad de asistir a la escuela, hoy en día está acompañado y junto a su pareja han procreado tres hijos.

José, desde que tenía 15 años de edad, se ha dedicado a la agricultura, ya que su padre trabajaba de esa manera.

El dinero del crédito lo necesita para darle mantenimiento a una plantación de papaya que tiene sembrada y para poder cultivar sus granos básicos, ya que es tiempo para sembrar, es por eso que necesita el dinero.

José, sueña con que sus hijos estudien y se preparen académicamente, para que en un futuro tengan una vida mejor.
texts.en:
José, 42 years old, is an honest, hard-working, and responsible person. He has always made a living from sowing basic grains since he did not have the opportunity to attend school. Currently he is in a relationship and he and his partner have had three children.

Since he was 15 years old, José has made a living from agriculture since his father worked in this way.

He needs the money from the loan to maintain a papaya field that he has sown and to be able to cultivate his basic grains since it is time to sow. It is because of this that he needs the money.

José dreams that his children study and academically prepare themselves so that in the future they have better lives.

loans.use: to provide maintenance to a papaya field that he has sown and to be able to cultivate his basic grains.

loans.name: Nonsoung Group

texts.en:
Nuan understands the difference a water filter can make for her family and for her group’s families. Nuan knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption, and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.  

The water filter Nuan purchased will increase her family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood. The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.    

Nuan is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for two years – so she and her group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Angie

texts.en:
Angie is 30 years old and has four children. Angie is married, and one of her children is still in school.

Angie is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Angie requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig.

Angie has been in this business for three years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig

loans.name: Ma Dorfa

texts.es: Ma Dorfa, tiene 39 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene un hijo y vive en un sector que pertenece a Cofradía, Cortes. Ella siempre busca como obtener ingresos, inició vendiendo mercadería y ahora vende tortillas de maíz, las que elabora en su casa. Para mantener este negocio a solicitado tres prestamos anteriores en la institución y actualmente solicita el cuarto ciclo que es por 6,000 lempiras, para comprar harina de maíz y leña para la elaboración de tortillas y vender. Su plan es poder mejorar su situación económica y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: Ma Dorfa is 39 years old, lives in a common-law marriage with her partner, with whom she has one child and lives in a sector which is part of Cofradía, Cortes. She always seeks a way to get income, and began to sell merchandise and now sells corn tortillas, which she makes at home. To maintain this business, she has asked for three previous loans from the institution and currently is in her fourth loan cycle, which is for 6,000 lempiras to purchase corn flour and firewood to make tortillas and sell them. Her plan is to be able to improve her economic situation and help her family.

loans.use: to purchase corn flour and firewood to make tortillas and sell them.

loans.name: Rosmery Melva

texts.es: Rosmery tiene 29 años de edad, trabaja en una empresa comercializadora de materiales para el hogar y está estudiando administración de empresas en una universidad  privada donde ya va por el II ciclo de la carrera, ella se siente muy entusiasmada porque quiere crecer profesionalmente y aspirar a puestos con más importancia en su actual trabajo. El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar una herramienta para sus estudios (laptop) y así continuar con sus actividades. Uno de los sueños de Rosmery es culminar con éxito su carrera y poder implementar su propio restaurante donde ella misma pueda administrarlo y dar trabajo a muchos jóvenes como ella que lo necesitan. Rosmery está muy agradecida por el apoyo que está recibiendo y  pide encarecidamente que continúe con muchos chicos emprendedores como ella.
texts.en:
Rosmery is 29 years old. She works in a business that sells materials for the home and is studying business administration in a private university where she is going for the major’s second cycle. She is very enthusiastic because she wants to grow professionally and she aspires to positions more important than her current job. 

She will use the loan to purchase a tool for her studies (a laptop) and so continue with her activities. One of Rosmery’s dreams is to finish her degree with success and to be able to open her own restaurant that she herself can administrate and give work to many youths like her that need it. 

Rosmery is very thankful for the support that she is receiving and urgently requests that you continue with many entrepreneurial youths like herself.

loans.use: to purchase study tools.

loans.name: Anibal Jhonatan

texts.es: Anibal tiene 26 años de edad, está soltero y es técnico en industrias de alimentos, actualmente trabaja como asistente de almacén en una gran empresa y ahora sigue estudiando la carrera de ingeniería industrial en una universidad privada donde ya va por el VI ciclo ya que tiene en mente seguir creciendo profesionalmente en la empresa donde se encuentra. El préstamo lo usara para pagar las cuotas de la universidad y también para comprar una herramienta para estudio (laptop) que necesita para desenvolverse mejor. Anibal tiene como anhelo obtener su título profesional para laborar en empresas muy importantes e implementar su propio restaurante porque también estudio la carrera de gastronomía ya que es uno de sus gustos personales que tiene. Se siente muy contento y agradecido por la confianza que los inversionistas de KIVA están depositando en él y pide que el apoyo continúe con muchos chicos que lo necesitan.
texts.en:
Anibal is 26 years old. He is single and is a food industry technician. He currently works as grocery assistant in a large company. He is also studying for a career in industrial engineering in a private university where he is enrolling for his sixth term. He is planning to continue to grow professionally with his current employer.

He will use this loan to pay for his university expenses and also to buy a laptop for use as a study tool, which will help him get along better. Anibal's goal is to earn his professional degree so that he can work in very important companies and one day open his own restaurant. He has also studied cooking since this is one of her personal pleasures. He is pleased and grateful for the confidence that Kiva investors are putting in him and he asks that the support will continue for all the youths who need it.

loans.use: pay for university costs

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en:
Maria Fe is 44 years old, married, and has three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for four years and earns additional income from selling vegetables.

Maria Fe is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Rosie works hard to support her family.

She has a rice farming business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising livestock. Rosie is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fertilizers for her rice farming business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Rosie has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college and save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fertilizers for her farm

loans.name: Yanira Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yanira, de 32 años de edad, es una persona trabajadora y responsable, está acompañado y junto a su esposo han procreado un hijo, por el cual los dos trabajan para darle lo necesario.- Yanira, se dedica al comercio ya que en C.E de la comunidad le ha dado la oportunidad de poder poner su negocio en la escuela, lo cual cada día sale a vender para poder ganar dinero y poder ayudar con los gastos del hogar.   

Yanira, tiene 5 años de estar administrando la tienda, lo cual de esa manera ella puede sacar su poco de ganancias.

El dinero del crédito lo necesita para comprar mercadería para su tienda, ya que el dinero que tenía ahorrado lo tuvo que invertir en unas medicinas para su esposo ya que estaba enfermo.

Yanira, sueña con poder ayudar a su hijo, para que sea un profesional y una persona de bien en la comunidad, además desea surtir más la tienda con mercadería para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Yanira, 32 years old, is a hard working and responsible person. She is married and, with her husband, has one child for whom they both work to give him all he needs. Yanira is dedicated to trade since the community has given her the opportunity to put a business in the school for which she leaves every day to sell to be able to earn money and be able to help with the expenses of the home. Yanira has been managing the shop for five years through which she can take a little profit.

She needs the money from the loan to buy merchandise for her shop since she had to invest the money she had saved in some medicine for her husband who was sick.

Yanira dreams of being able to help her son become a professional and a good person in the community as well as wishes to stock her store better with merchandise to have better income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her shop.

loans.name: Rainel

texts.es:
Rainel es un joven que desea estudiar Ingeniería Civil, para eso solicita un préstamo y poder cubrir sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia:
Mi nombre es Rainel, tengo 21 años de edad y vivo en Santo Domingo. Nací en la provincia La Romana, donde vivo con mis padres. Tengo un hermano y tengo una hija de un año. Mis padres son negociantes independientes y mi hermano es estudiante. Soy soltero, quiero estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería civil ya que esta es una carrera que me gusta mucho y además es una carrera que aporta mucho a la sociedad. 
Necesito este préstamo porque mis padres son de escasos recursos y mis ingresos no son suficientes para poder estudiar; mi sueldo es mínimo y por mis responsabilidades no me alcanza para los estudios. Necesito su ayuda para poder empezar mis estudios superiores ya que quiero cumplir mis metas de ser un gran profesional y poder ayudar a mis padres que han luchado tanto por darme educación, darme un futuro mejor a mi hija y poder ser útil a para la sociedad  y aportar un granito de arena a la sociedad. 
Después que termine mi carrera con la ayuda de Dios y ustedes quisiera trabajar en mi campo ya sea en una empresa o como independiente, Gracias por su atención.
texts.en:
Rainel is a young man who wishes to study civil engineering, which is why he is requesting a loan to cover his educational costs. 

This is his story, in his own words: "I am 21 years old and live in Santo Domingo. I was born in La Romana province, where I live with my parents. I have a brother and I have a one-year-old daughter. My parents are independent businesspeople and my brother is a student. I am single and I want to study civil engineering, a field that I really like and which contributes a lot to society. 

"I need this loan because my parents are low-income and my income is not sufficient to be able to study. My salary is minimal and because of my responsibilities there isn't enough money for studies. I need your help to be able to start my university studies since I want to accomplish my goals of being a great professional, being able to help my parents who have fought to educate me, giving my daughter a better future, and being able to be useful to society and contribute my bit to society. After I am done with college, with the help of God and all of you, I would like to work in my field either in a company or independently. Thank you for your consideration."

loans.use: to cover costs of higher education

loans.name: Nhóm 28 Thành Lập, Ngư Lộc Group

texts.en:
Phương is applying for a loan to purchase more tools for fishing. She is a fisher-woman. Phương has been involved in this business for two years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

Phương is 34 years old, and she is married with three children.

Phương is the group leader of the Nhóm 28 Thành Lập, Ngư Lộc solidarity group, which consists of four members. 

In 2009, Phương joined the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Phương has successfully repaid five loans from the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

Along with her business profit, Phương hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more tools for fishing

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Benard is 30 years old, married and is blessed with two children. He has been a carpenter for the last two years.
 
He will use the loan to purchase timber for making chairs and tables for sale to his clients and hopes this will enable him to generate more income to support his family.

He plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate his children. His future hopes are to expand his carpentry business by making more house and office furniture, and make more income.

loans.use: to purchase timber for making chairs and tables for sale to his clients

loans.name: William

texts.es: William de 34 años, identifico la oportunidad de abrir un café internet en el barrio donde habita al sur occidente de Barranquilla, puesto que un gran número de personas no poseen el servicio de internet en sus casas y acceden a estos negocios para realizar sus tareas y trabajos o simplemente para tener un rato de esparcimiento.  En la actualidad tiene dos años de estar funcionando en su local, todos los días a partir de las 9 a.m. a 8 p.m. abre su negocio al  público y ofrece servicios de navegación, impresión y fotocopiadora.  Aunque su principal desafío ha sido la falta de capital, William ha logrado pese a las adversidades dotar su negocio con equipos de cómputo e infraestructura necesaria para su funcionamiento, en la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en la compra de un aire acondicionado e instalarlo en el local donde funciona su negocio. Esta inversión mejorará las condiciones del servicio ya que la afluencia de clientes ha disminuido debido  a las altas temperaturas.  William desea mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y para ello trabaja muy comprometido y dedicado en su Café Internet.
texts.en:
William is 34 years old. He saw the opportunity to open an internet cafe in the neighborhood in which he lives in the South-West of Barranquilla, given that a lot of people do not have internet service at their houses and use these services to do their work and homework or simply to have a bit of leisure activity.

He has two years of operating his cafe. He opens his business to the public every day from 9 am until 8 pm and offer internet, copies and photocopy services. Although his first challenge was the lack of capital William despite the challenge managed to equip his with the computers and infrastructure necessary to function.

Currently he us applying for a loan from Kiva, the first loan he has had from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo which he will invest in buying an air conditioner and installing it in the place he has his business. This investment will improve the conditions of his service as the number of customers has declined due to the high temperatures. William wants to improve the living conditions of his family and to do this he will work very hard, committed and dedicated to his internet cafe.

loans.use: to invest in buying an air conditioner..

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es:
María, de 60 años de edad, no estudio, desde pequeña sus padres le enseñaron a trabajar,es madre soltera, vive sola pues sus hijos ya están aparte.

María, toda su vida ha trabajado en la elaboración de hamacas, ya que sus padres de eso trabajaron y sus hijos 
ahora se dedican a la misma actividad, también tiene personas que le ayudan a elaborar las hamacas.
 
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar hilos de nailon y de seda al por mayor, de esa manera lograra elaborar más hamacas y sus ingresos mejoran.

El sueño de María, es mantener el negocio de hamacas y seguir trabajando de esa manera.
texts.en: Maria, 60 years old, did not attend school. When she was little, her parents taught her to work. She is a single mother. She lives alone since her children have left home. Maria, for her whole life, has worked making hammocks since her parents performed this work and her children are now dedicated to the same job. She also has some people who help her make the hammocks. She will use the loan to buy nylon and silk thread at wholesale. In this way, she will manage to make more hammocks and her income will improve. Maria's dream is the maintain the hammock business and keep working in this way.

loans.use: to buy nylon and silk thread at wholesale.

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.en:
Consuelo works hard to support her family. Consuelo is married with four children and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Consuelo requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional fishnet and gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

Consuelo has been in this business for 30 years now.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional fishnet and gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business

loans.name: Maria Ilda

texts.es:
María, de 57 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañada y juntos tienen un negocio de un comedor, viven solos, pues sus hijos viven a parte porque ya son mayores.

María, desde hace varios años se dedica al negocio de venta de comida y pupusas, de esa forma logro crecer a sus hijos y sigue en el mismo negocio y su horario es de 5:00 p.m. a 7:00 p.m.
 
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar una plancha y mesas para que su negocio sea más grande, ya que tiene mucha demanda de clientes, de esa manera lograra satisfacer su necesidad.

El sueño de María, es seguir trabajando siempre junto con su pareja, para seguir obteniendo más ingresos y de esa forma lograr cubrir sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Maria, 57 years old, studied through ninth grade. She is partnered and together they have a small restaurant. They live alone, since their children live apart because they are grown.

Maria has been working for several years selling food and pupusas (traditional Salvadoran stuffed tortillas), which is how she managed to raise her children and continue in the same business. Her schedule is from 5-7pm. 

She will use the loan to purchase a griddle and tables so her business expands, due to the high demand from her customers. This way she will be manage to satisfy the demand. Maria's dream is to continue working with her life partner forever, to continue to get more income, and in this way, manage to cover their needs.

loans.use: to purchase a griddle and tables for her business.

loans.name: Fátima Gisela

texts.es:
Fátima, de 40 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato y es madre soltera, tiene un hijo de 15 años de edad que está estudiando. 

Fátima, se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos desde hace 5 años, ella compra los lácteos al por mayor y los vende por unidad en la comunidad, su madre le ayuda a vender el producto. 

El préstamo lo necesita para mejorar el techo de su vivienda, debido a que se acerca la época lluviosa y hay goteras en muchas partes de su vivienda. 

Fátima, sueña con ampliar su negocio, darle buena educación a su hijo y cuidar a su mamá ya que es de edad avanzada.
texts.en:
Fátima, 40 years old, has a high school education and is a single mother, she has a 15-year-old son who is in school. 

Fátima has made a living selling dairy products for 5 years. She buys the dairy products wholesale and sells them by the unit in the community. Her mother helps her to sell the products. 

She needs the loan to improve the roof of her home, since they are approaching the rainy season and there are leaks in many parts of her home. 

Fátima dreams of growing her business, giving her son a good education, and caring for her mother since she is elderly.

loans.use: to improve the roof of her home

loans.name: María Sofía

texts.es:
María, de 47 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la crianza de ganado y agricultura, tiene tres hijos y una de sus hijas es madre soltera, dos de ellos estudian. 

María, es comerciante de ropa, se dedica al comercio desde hace tres años, anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de lácteos, pero debido a la competencia decidió cambiar de negocio.- Ella camina por toda la comunidad ofreciendo sus productos y recibe la ayuda de su hija mayor. 

María, necesita el préstamo para comprar más ropa para el negocio, quiere acondicionar su casa para tener ahí sus prendas y brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes.

María, sueña con poder vender ropa al por mayor, para poder facilitarles el producto a otros comerciantes de la zona y generar más ingresos.
texts.en:
María, 47 years old, has a sixth grade education. She is married and her husband makes a living breeding livestock and farming. She has three children and one of her daughters is a single mother. Two of her children are in school. 

María is a clothes seller. She has made a living in this business for three years. Before, she made a living selling dairy products, but because of the competition she decided to change her business. She walks all throughout the community offering her products and she gets help from her oldest daughter.

María needs the loan to buy more clothing for the business, she wants to air condition her house so she can have her garments there and provide better service for her clients. 

María dreams of being able to sell clothing wholesale, to be able to provide the product to other sellers in the area and generate more income.

loans.use: to buy more clothing for the business.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel es un hombre trabajador y responsable que para obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a sus nueve hijos se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica, él tiene siete años de realizar esta labor. Manuel y su familia viven en una comunidad de Nahuala.
Manuel con el afán de superarse y darle lo mejor a sus hijos ahora ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para poder invertir un poco más en su negocio comprando más cortes,  fajas y güipiles  pues el en este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario.
El gran sueño de Manuela es que su negocio sea más grande, para obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Manuel is a hard working and responsible man who, to earn income and get his nine children ahead, is dedicated to buying and selling typical clothing. He has been doing this work for seven years. Manuel and his family live in a Nahuala community.

Manuel, with a desire to excel and give the best to his children, now has decided to request a loan so he can invest a little more in his business buy more skirts, belts and blouses since, right now, he doesn't have the money needed. Manuel's great dream is that his business becomes bigger to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy and sell typical clothing.

loans.name: Jhony Kimboll

texts.es:
Jhony es un hombre de 37 años de edad, es casado tiene una linda familia de tres hijos de las edades entre 5 y 10 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de San Pablo Jocopilas.
Jhony con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia trabaja como maestro de educación media, él tiene nueve años de realizar esta labor. Pero para mejorar sus ingresos trabaja también como soldador.
Jhony ahora se ve a la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo para poder comprar sus materiales como cemento, cal, arena y block para la construcción de una pared que su casa necesita, porque el lamentablemente no cuenta con suficiente dinero para poder cubrir esta necesidad.
El gran sueño de Jhony es poder un taller de soldadura para mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Jhony is a 37 year old man. He is married and has a beautiful family with three children who are between the ages of 5 and ten years. This humble family lives in the community of San Pablo Jocopilas.

Jhony,in an effort to earn income and get his family ahead, works as a high school teacher. He has been doing this work for nine years. But to improve his income, he also works as a welder.

Jhony now sees the need to request a loan to be able to buy materials like cement, lime, sand and block for the construction of a wall that his house needs because, unfortunately, he doesn't have enough money to cover this need. 

Jhony's great dream is to be able to have a welding shop to improve his income.

loans.use: to buy materials like cement, lime, sand and blocks.

loans.name: Maria Luz

texts.es: La Sra. Maria vive en la ciudad de Sucre, se dedica a vender y preparar papas rellenas, ella es madre soltera,su mamá  solo le dio un lugar donde vivir pero no le colabora con la alimentación de su hija ni de ella, Maria comenzó a vender papas rellenas cuando se enteró que estaba embarazada y su pareja la abandono, desde entonces ella tuvo que ingeniarse para salir adelante, se prestó un puesto en el mercado para vender sus rellenos y así fue superándose, desgraciadamente en una ocasión tuvo la mala suerte de que su hija a sus 8 meses se apoyó en la cocina y  se quemó por lo que gasto mucho dinero en su tratamiento y hasta la fecha sigue comprando pomadas para la cicatriz de su manito, es por tal motivo que no pudo ahorrar y mejorar su negocio,  pero ahora ella desea ampliar su negocio para lo cual solicita un crédito, de esta forma lograra mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria lives in the city of Sucre. She works preparing and selling potato rellenos (empanadas). She is a single mother. Her mother gives her a place to live but doesn't help with food for her daughter or her. Maria started selling potato rellenos when she learned she was pregnant and her partner abandoned her. Since then she has had to be inventive to get ahead. She got the services of a stall in the market to sell her rellenos and she moved forward.

Unfortunately on one occasion she had the bad luck of her 8 month old baby leaned on the stove and got burned, which cost a lot of money for her treatment and up to now she is still buying ointment to put on on the scar on her hand. For this reason she could not save money and improve her business. But now she wants to expand her business so she has requested a loan. In this way she can improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to expand her business of selling rellenos (a type of empanada) to improve the living standard of her family.

loans.name: Raquel Del Carmen

texts.es:
Lo que en un principio parecía una venta de comidas en un grupo solidario, terminó siendo en un inicio para una etapa como emprendedora para Raquel de 33 años de edad. Esta mujer trabajadora miró en su camino una oportunidad de mejorar su calidad de vida junto a sus dos hijos, ahora de cinco y de un año de edad, estableciendo una pulpería en su hogar. 
Actualmente tiene tres años con su negocio, afortunadamente con el apoyo de su esposo. Raquel sueña con ver crecer más su pulpería, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar shampoo, café, jabón, azúcar, arroz, pan, entre otros productos de alta demanda en su venta. Con esto podrá surtir su establecimiento y aumentar sus ganancias con las ventas. En sus planes está extender su negocio a una distribuidora.
texts.en:
What at first seemed a sale of food in a united group, ended up being the start of an entrepreneurial phase for Raquel, 33. This hardworking woman saw an opportunity in her path to improve her quality of life along with her two children, who are now 5 and 1 years old, by starting a grocery store in her home.

Currently, she's had the business for three years fortunately with the support of her husband. Raquel dreams of seeing her store grow more for which she is requesting a loan to buy shampoo, coffee, soap, sugar, rice, bread, among other products that are in high demand. With this, she will be able to stock her business and expand her income with sales. Included in her plans are extending her business to a distributor.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, coffee, soap, sugar, rice, bread, among other products.

loans.name: Maria Rosaura

texts.es:
Rosaura, de 76 años de edad, es una mujer viuda y tiene dos hijos, que no viven con ella ya que tienen sus propios hogares, con ella solo vive una hermana y dos sobrinos, quienes dependen económicamente de ella.

Rosaura, se dedica a la agricultura y la ganadería desde hace 13 años cuando murió su esposo quien fue quien le enseño sobre este oficio.- Ella cultiva a 2 kilómetros de su casa y paga quien le ayude. 

Rosaura, necesita el préstamo para comprar fertilizante, abono y para pagar mano de obra para que limpien el terreno donde tiene su ganado. 

Rosaura, sueña con cultivar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y tener para el sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosaura, 76 years old, is a widowed woman with two children who don't live with her since they have their own homes. Only her sister and two nephews live with her, and they depend on her economically. 

Rosaura has made a living farming and ranching since her husband died 13 years ago. He was the one who taught her about this trade. She grows 2 kilometers from her house and pays the people who help her. 

Rosaura needs the loan to buy fertilizer, manure, and to pay for the labor that cleans the land where she has her livestock.

Rosaura dreams of growing 14,000 square meters of corn and having it support her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure and to pay for the labor that cleans the land where she has her livestock

loans.name: Kelvy Reynaldo

texts.es:
Kelvy tiene 28 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su familia en el ditrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales principalmente.

El se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio, su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de frutas y verduras para incrementar el stock de su negocio, dicha inversión le servirá para incrementar sus ventas, el espera tener mayor stock de productos para poder atender las diversas necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los clientes de la zona, esto tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Kelvyis 28 years old and has a life partner and two children. He lives with his family in a rural area in the district of Oyotun which is located in Chiclayo Province in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. The people in this region work mostly in agriculture, commerce and in raising animals.

Kelvy sells fruits and vegetables and has been doing this for more than five years. He runs his business out of his house and is asking for the loan so he can buy fruits and vegetables in larger quantities to increase his stock. This investment will help increase his sales and will help him meet the various needs and tastes of his customers in the neighborhood leading to more income and thus a better quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy greater quantities of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Naxeuak Group

texts.en: Khayphet is excited to know that a water filter is available on an affordable payment plan. He and his group, along with other villagers, participated in a meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies.  Charcoal, firewood, and even bottled water were discussed and priced out for a period of two years.  The water filter Khayphet and his group purchased is guaranteed for two years but is known to function for up to five.  Khayphet and his group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. And after totaling up the costs, they recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick, 29, is married and blessed with 1 child. He has been a carpenter for the last 2 years and the business has been profitable.
 
He will be using this loan from Vision Fund Kenya to purchase timber to make chairs, tables, wall units and beds to sell and he hopes this will enable him to generate more income to support his family.

He plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and provide food for his family. His future hopes are to expand his carpentry business and be successful.

loans.use: to purchase timber to make chairs, tables, wall units and beds to sell.

loans.name: Olivia

texts.en:
Olivia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 25000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional fishing nets for her fishing business.

Olivia has been in this business for 14 years. Olivia earns more income from buying and selling fish.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Olivia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing nets.

loans.name: Carmen Beatriz

texts.es: Carmen de 38 años, apasionada por la culinaria emprendió su idea de negocio; un restaurante que inauguro hace años, sin embargo tuvo que abandonar esta labor por encontrarse en embarazo.  Posterior al nacimiento de su hija retomó esta actividad y hoy en día cuenta con dos puntos de comidas rápidas que se encuentran abiertos de martes a domingo en el horario de 4 p.m. a 12 de la media noche.  En ellos ofrece deliciosos asados, pizzas, perros calientes, hamburguesas y toda la variedad de comida rápida.  Sus compras las realiza de contado a proveedores de salsamentaría y productos cárnicos, así mismo compra carnes y pollos en expendios.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en la compra de insumos y materia prima ( pollo, carne, salsas, embutidos y demás).  Con tres años de funcionamiento la demanda del mercado le exige estar aprovisionada para responder adecuadamente a los pedidos sin descuidar ningún ingrediente esencial en la preparación y que altere la calidad de la comida.  Su meta de negocio a futuro es adquirir un local. Carmen es madre de tres hijos que dependen económicamente de ella y por ello les ofrece bienestar, así mismo desea que accedan a una educación de calidad y sean unos profesionales.
texts.en:
Carmen is 38 years old. The idea for her business came out of her passion for cooking, a restaurant that she opened years ago. However she had to abandon this work when she was pregnant.
