After the birth of her daughter she reactivated her business and today has two fast food stands that are open from Tuesday to Sunday from 4 pm until midnight. She offers delicious steaks, pizza, hot dogs, hamburgers and all kinds of fast foods. She makes her purchases from the deli and meat product distributors and buys her chicken and meat in small shops.

Currently she is applying for a loan from Kiva her first loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to invest in buying supplies and raw materials (chicken, meat, sauces, cold cuts and others). With three years of operating the market demand requires these supplies to adequately respond to requests without leaving out any essential ingredients in making the food and alter it's quality.

Her goal for the future for her business is to have her own location. Carmen is the mother of 3 children who depend on her economically so she provides them with well-being and also wants them to have a quality education so they become professionals.

loans.use: to invest in buying supplies and raw materials (chicken, meat, sauces, cold cuts and others).

loans.name: Carlos Jose

texts.es: Carlos, de 20 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja, y reside en el municipio de San Marcos, Ocotepeque, Colinda con el municipio de Gracias Lempira. estuvo trabajando un tiempo como ayudante de albañilería pero por obtener mejores ingresos decidió poner su propio negocio en un puesto de venta que alquila, vende variedad de calzado para damas, caballeros y niños.  Para comprar y surtir mas su negocio ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 10,000 lempiras y comprar calzado para damas, caballeros y niños. Tiene como plan aumentar el negocio para en un futuro poner otro puesto de calzado en otro lugar.
texts.en: Carlos is 20 and lives with his domestic partner in San Marcos municipality, Ocotepeque which borders on Gracias Lempira municipality. He was working as a masonry assistant but he decided to start his own business in a rented stall to earn more money. He sells a variety of footwear for men, women and children. He has decided to request a loan of 10,000 lempiras to buy more footwear for men, women, and children to stock his store. His plan is to increase his business so that, in the future, he can open another shoe stall in another site.

loans.use: to buy footwear for men, women and children to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a supply of hog feed.

loans.name: Chimwemwe Group

texts.en: Emmie is 36 years old, married and the mother of three children, one of whom attends school. She and some of her relatives try to provide for her family by selling tea by the side of the road. Despite this business, she still faces a number of challenges, and would like to get a loan in order to open a grocery store where she can sell assorted items. Her dream is to provide uniforms, notebooks and school fees to her children in addition to the adequate amount of food she has for them now.

loans.use: to buy more  fish

loans.name: Marcelo

texts.es:
Marcelo es un hombre de 57 años de edad, es casado tiene una linda familia de tres hijos de las edades entre 22 y 37 años de edad, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de San Pablo Jocopilas.
Marcelo con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a sus hijos tiene una ferretería desde hace dos años.
Marcelo ahora se ve a la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo porque necesita invertir un poco más en su ferretería pues ahora su negocio tiene mucha demanda y él no cuenta con suficiente productos, lo que el comprara con el préstamo son tornillos, cemento, laminas y otros.
El gran sueño de Marcelo es poder ampliar su negocio he instalar otro negocio en otra aldea.
texts.en:
Marcelo is a man of 57 years. He is married and has a beautiful family with three children between the ages of 22 and 37. This humble family lives in the community of San Pablo Jocopilas. 

Marcelo is trying to increase his income and support his children with his hardware store business, which he has run for two years. Marcelo now sees the need to apply for a loan because he needs to invest a little more in hardware for his business. Hardware is in high demand and he does not have enough products. He will buy products with the loan including screws, cement, metal sheeting, and more.

Marcelo’s great dream is to expand his business into another village.

loans.use: to stock his hardware store with screws, cement, and more.

loans.name: Ingrid

texts.es:
Ingrid es una mujer de 33 años de edad es casada tiene una linda familia de un hijo, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Suchitepéquez.
Ingrid con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia, trabaja como asistente en la municipalidad de su pueblo, ella tiene tres años de realizar esta labor. Pero para mejorar sus ingresos también se dedica a la venta de cosméticos.
A Ingrid le preocupa la comodidad de su familia es por eso ha  que ha tomado la iniciativa de remodelar su casa, pero una de las dificultades que ella tiene es que no cuenta con el dinero necesario, por tal motivo solicita un préstamo para comprar cemento,cal, arena y block.
El gran sueño de Ingrid es poder conseguir un mejor trabajo para obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Ingrid is a 33-year-old married woman with a beautiful child. This humble family lives in the community of Suchitepéquez. In an effort to earn an income and support her family, Ingrid works as an assistant in the municipality of her town. She has done this work for three years. She also sells cosmetics to improve her income.

Ingrid is concerned about the comfort of her family so that is why she has undertaken the initiative to remodel their house. One of her difficulties is that she does not have the money so she has applied for a loan to buy cement, lime, sand, and cement blocks. 

Ingrid’s greatest dream is to get a better job and a better income.

loans.use: to purchase cement and materials to improve her home

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is 48 years old and has seven children. She is married and has one child still in school.

Eva is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Eva has been in this business for five years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Zebo

texts.ru:
Это прекрасная женщина Зебо. Она из города Куляб. Зебо не смотря ни на, что трудится. Она занимается продажей одежды на рынке. Это работа женщинам больше подходит, чем мужчины. Ей нравится общаться с новыми клиентами и помочь им сделать правильный выбор.  Зебо продает детские и женские одежды. Она начала свою работу 6 лет назад. Зебо выбрала эту деятельность, потому что ее сестра тоже занималась этой видом бизнесе. 
Зебо замужняя женщина. У нее один сын и одна дочка. Детям  13 и 11 лет. Ее муж занимается ремонтом телевизоров и радио. Он мастер механик.  Зебо хотелось расширить деятельность. Она решила взять кредит и перевозит одежды на продажу. Зебо надеется с увеличением товарооборот увеличиться доход, и она может улучшить условия жизни семью.
texts.en:
This wonderful woman is Zebo. She is from the city of Kulob and works no matter what. She sells clothes at the market. Women are better suited to this work than men. Zebo enjoys chatting with new customers and helping them make the right choice. Zebo sells children's and women's clothing, having started her business six years ago. Zebo chose to do this because her sister also has this type of business. 

Zebo is a married woman with a son and a daughter, ages 13 and 11. Her husband repairs televisions and radios. He is an experienced mechanic. Zebo wants to expand her business and decided to take out a loan to bring in new clothing to sell. Zebo hopes to increase her sales turnover and increase her revenue so that she can improve the lives of her family.

loans.use: to expand her business and obtain new clothing to sell.

loans.name: Nhóm 05 Cụm 18 Xã Quảng Nham Group

texts.en:
Mrs Trọng has a retail business selling cake, sweet, sugar and milk. Trọng has been involved in this business for seven years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

She lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Trọng is 60 years old and she is married with four children.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more cake, sweet, sugar and milk to sell.

Trọng is the group leader of the Nhóm 05 Cụm 18 xã Quảng Nham solidarity group, which consists of seven members. 

In 2014, Trọng joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business. Trọng has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

In the future, Trọng hopes for her business to do well, for her children to find good jobs, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more cake, sweet, sugar and milk to sell

loans.name: Yadira Katiuska

texts.es:
En  el Florón  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen cada quince días los socias del Grupo De Crédito Los Almendros, este es un lugar urbano marginal de la ciudad en la cual las personas son muy trabajadoras y responsables en sus obligaciones. 
En este lugar vive la señora Yadira, tiene 33 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta  relación tiene  cuatro hijos de 15, 14, 11 y 2 años, los dos mayores estudian en colegio y el siguiente en escuela. El marido trabaja en una empresa de envíos. Hace varios años ella aprendió belleza en una Academia artesanal en la ciudad
Doña Yadira es una mujer muy trabajadora que hace lo posible para obtener sus propios ingresos y con esto ayudar a su esposo con los gastos que genera mantener el hogar y los estudios de sus hijos, hace más de seis años instaló en su casa un salón de belleza, allí ella realiza diversidad de trabajos como tinturados, cortes de cabellos, pintado de uñas entre  otras cosas. Trabaja todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde si sus clientes requieren de sus servicios, ella  también hace servicio a domicilio si así sus clientes lo desean con lo cual les cobra un poco mas que le sirven para mejorar sus ingresos.
Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar esmaltes, tintes y ciertas herramientas que ella necesita para dar un mejor servicio. Está desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta el trato de la promotora y los beneficios que recibe de la fundación. Su sueño es capacitarse constantemente y ser la  mejor estilista.
texts.en:
In Florón in the city of Portoviejo, the members of the credit group Los Almendros meet every two weeks. This is a marginal urban part of the city in which people are hardworking and responsible in their duties. 

Here lives Yadira, 33, who is in a common-law relationship. They have four children aged 15, 14, 11, and 2 years. The two oldest are in high school and the third is in elementary school. Her husband works in a shipping company. Several years ago, Yadira learned her trade at the Beauty Academy in the city.

Yadira is a hardworking woman who does her best to earn her own income to help her husband cover the expenses incurred in the maintenance of their household and their children’s education. More than six years ago, Yadira established a beauty salon in her house. She performs diverse services such as coloring and cutting hair, manicures, and more. She works every day from 8 am to 4 pm and sometimes even later if her customers require her services. She also does home services if the clients wish. For this service, she charges a bit more. It helps to improve her income.

She will use this loan to buy nail polishes, hair color, and certain tools she needs to provide better service. She has been in this group from its start and likes the benefits she receives from the foundation. Her dream is to constantly train to be the best stylist.

loans.use: to purchase nail polish, hair color, and tools for her beauty salon

loans.name: Baby Grace

texts.en:
Baby Grace is 31 years old and single; she lives in Jose Dalman, Zamboanga del Norte. Baby Grace has a fish vending business and owns a small fish pond, as well. She earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month and she has been doing this type of activity for two years. 

She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase fishing materials, additional fingerlings and equipment for her fish pond. 

Baby Grace has recently became an active member of PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase fishing materials, additional fingerlings and equipment for her fish pond

location.town: SINDANGAN-TAMIL, JOSE DALMAN, ZAMBONGA DEL NORTE

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell charcoal and firewood business in the Philippines.

Marilyn requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of charcoal and firewood to sell to her customers.

Marilyn has been in this business for two years now.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of charcoal and firewood to sell to her customers

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es: Martha tiene 39 años de edad tiene 4 hijos es madre soltera vive en Ventanas provincia de los Rios, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, solicita el crédito para la compra de mercaderia para tener variedad y poder vender mas para mejorar su economia y mantener a sus hijos ya que es ella la cabeza del hogar, realiza las compras en Guayaquil, su sueño es tener una Boutique de ropa y zapatos grande, los desafios a los que se enfrenta son las enfermedades, en su tiempo libre le gusta leer la biblia.
texts.en:
Martha, age 39, is a single mother of four children and she lives in Ventanas in the province of Los Rios. She is in the business of selling clothing, and she is requesting this loan so that she can buy more merchandise, offer a wider variety of goods, and improve her household economy. This will help her to support her children as she is the head of her household. She does her shopping in Guayaquil.

Her dream is to run a large clothing and shoe boutique. One challenge in her life is poor health. In her spare time, she likes to read the Bible.

loans.use: buy merchandise

loans.name: Asel

texts.ru: Асель, 35 год, есть 5 детей, замужем. Образование у нее высшее, в качестве дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 17 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Асель, на данный момент в ее хозяйстве имеется 3 коровы, 20 овец. На 5,0 Га земли она выращивает картофель, фасоль, клевер. Продает молоко на ежедневной основе. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Асель обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 55,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы с теленком для увеличения объемов реализации экологически-чистого молока. Доходы от кредита Асель планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en: Asel is 35 years old. She has five children and is married. She has a higher education, and she rears animals and grows crops for income for her family, having started 17 years ago. Thanks to her hard work, today Asel has three cows and twenty sheep. She grows potatoes, beans, and clover on five hectares of land. She sells milk on a daily basis. In order to further develop her business, Asel has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 55,000 som (KGS) to buy a dairy cow with a calf to increase the volume of her sales of organic milk. Asel plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow and calf in order to increase her organic milk sales.

loans.name: Alexandra Janeth

texts.es:
En el Florón  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen  cada quince días los socias  del Grupo De Crédito Los Almendros, este es un lugar urbano marginal de la ciudad en la cual las personas son muy trabajadoras y responsables en sus obligaciones. 
En este lugar vive la señora Alexandra, tiene 45  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 4  hijos, dos mayores de edad y dos de 17 y 14 años que estudian  en  colegio. Su esposo es albañil.
Doña Alexandra es una mujer muy trabajadora que le gusta ganarse lo suyo y así ayudar a su marido con los gastos que genera el hogar y la educación de su hijos que es  lo más importante para ella, ella tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de víveres, legumbres, colas, carnes, embutidos, entre otros variados productos, trabaja todos días y casi todo el día. Su negocio cada vez está mejor y esto por la ayuda que recibe con los créditos. Tiene más de 6 años con su negocio.
Este crédito es para comprar arroz, azúcar y otros  productos de primera necesidad. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos mejora su negocio. Sus sueños es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In Florón in the city of Portoviejo, the members of the credit group Los Almendros meet every two weeks. This is a marginal urban part of the city in which people are hardworking and responsible in their duties. 

Here lives Alexandra, 45, who is married with four children. Two are adults and two are 17 and 14 and attend school. Her husband is a bricklayer. 

Alexandra is a hardworking woman who does her best to earn her own income to help her husband cover the expenses incurred in the maintenance of their household and their children’s education, which is the most important for her. More than six years ago, Alexandra established a grocery store in her house. She sells all kinds of food, vegetables, soft drinks, meats, sausages, among other assorted products. She works everyday at almost all hours. Her business is improving and she receives the support of loans.

This loan is to buy rice, sugar, and other staple grocery products. She has been a member of this group since its start and likes the loans because of their business improvement. Her dream is to give her children the best that she can.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, and other staple grocery products

loans.name: Carmen Del Rocio

texts.es:
En  el Florón  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen  cada quince días los socias  del Grupo De Crédito Los Almendros, este es un lugar urbano marginal de la ciudad en la cual las personas son muy trabajadoras y responsables en sus obligaciones. 
En este lugar vive la señora Carme, tiene 36 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen tres hijos, una mayor de edad y dos de 11 y 6 años  que estudian en escuela. Su esposo es albañil.
Doña Carmen es una muy buena madre y ama casa que además de atender su hogar también se dedica a la cría de pollos y gallinas criollas, ella  tiene una pequeña granja en su casa, compra los pollos cuando aun están pequeños y luego los mantiene por espacio de dos a tres meses, por temporadas mete hasta 300 pollos y cuando están de buen peso y desarrollo los vende a comerciantes o entrega a vecinos y tiendas del lugar, lleva un año con esta actividad la misma que les ayuda mucho ya que su marido en ocasiones no tiene trabajo y es gracias a sus ganancias que salen adelante. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar alimentos para los pollos y gallinas. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In Florón in the city of Portoviejo, the members of the credit group Los Almendros meet every two weeks. This is a marginal urban part of the city in which people are hardworking and responsible in their duties. 

Here lives Carmen, 36, who is in a common-law relationship. They have three children. One is an adult and the others are 11 and 6 years old and attend school. Her husband is a bricklayer. 

Carmen is a very good mother and wife who not only attends to her home but also raises chickens and “Criolla” hens. She has a small farm in her home. She buys chickens when they are small and then keeps them for two to three months. Each season she amasses up to 300 chickens. When they are at a good weight, she sells them to dealers or delivers them to neighbors and shops in her area. She has been doing this work for a year and it helps the family a lot since her husband does not always have work. Thanks to her earnings, they can make ends meet. 

This loan is to buy feed for chickens. She has been a member of this group since its start and likes it because the loans are helpful. Her dream is to give her children the best that she can.

loans.use: to purchase chicken feed

loans.name: Nhóm 04 Cụm 24 Thôn Tân Quảng Nham Group

texts.en: Mrs Chuyên has a retail business selling cake, sweets, sugar and milk, and is requesting a loan to buy more of these items to sell. She is 36 years old, married and the mother of two children. She leads a seven-person loan group, the Nhóm 04 cụm 24 thôn Tân Quảng Nham solidarity group, and  lives in the Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. In 2010, Chuyên joined the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business, and has successfully repaid three prior loans from our institution. She has been involved in this business for the last six years, and one of her main difficulties is a lack of capital. In the future, Chuyên hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more cake, sweet, sugar and milk to resell.

loans.name: Ramón Joel

texts.es:
En  el Florón  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen  cada quince días los socias  del Grupo De Crédito Los Almendros, este es un lugar urbano marginal de la ciudad en la cual las personas son muy trabajadoras y responsables en sus obligaciones. 
En este lugar vive el señor Ramón, tiene 22 años de edad y vive con familiares. El está desde el inicio en el grupo de crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten financiar su negocio. 
Don Ramón es un hombre muy trabajador que siempre le ha gustado ganarse lo suyo y así irse forjando un mejor porvenir, él se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo y su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta, el casi todos los días vende por la ciudad y también los fines de semana se desplaza a otros cantones cercanos lugares donde cuenta con muy buena clientela,  el deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días. Tiene 2 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual le da  para salir adelante.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar pantalones, blusas y ropa de niños que es lo que más vende. Sus sueños son tener un carro para realizar más ventas.
texts.en:
Every fifteen days, the members of the credit group Los Almendros meet in the Florón area in the city of Portoviejo, Ecuador. This is a marginal urban part of the city in which people are hard working and responsible in their duties.

Ramón, who is 22 years old, lives here with his family. He has been in the credit group from the beginning and likes it because the loans allow him to finance his business .

Ramón is a hardworking man who has always liked to make his own way in order to build a better future. He works in commerce. He sells all kinds of clothing door-to-door. He makes sales almost every day in the city and on weekends goes to other nearby counties where he has a good clientele. He sells on credit and collects payment every 8 days. He has been working for 2 years at this job, which has allowed him to be successful.

This loan will be used to buy pants, blouses and children's clothing, which are what he sells the most. His dream is to have a car in order to make more sales.

loans.use: buy pants, shirts and children's clothes.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en: Josefina is married and works hard to support her family by buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines. She is requesting a PHP 14,000 loan from NWTF to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell. Josefina has been in this business for the last five years, and earns additional income by running a general store. She would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Gulsanam

texts.ru: Гулсанам, 27 лет, замужем, есть четырехлетняя дочь. У нее среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи, вместе с супругом занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 2012 году с суммы 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду, Гулсанам на сегодняшний день имеет 2 коровы и 4 овец. На участке мерою 1,23 Га собственной земли она выращивает кукурузу и пшеницу для реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулсанам обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений, семян и обработку почвы для выращивания экологически чистой кукурузы. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса и увеличение площади орошаемых земель.
texts.en: Gulsanam is 27, married, and has a 4-year-old daughter. She has a secondary education and raises livestock with her spouse in order to earn income for her family. They started this business in 2012 with 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Gulsanam's hard work, she currently has two cows and four sheep. She plants corn and wheat to sell on a 1.23 hectare plot of land. In order to further develop her business, Gulsanam applied for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy fertilizer and seeds to treat the soil and grow organic corn. She plans to use the earnings from the loan to invest in continuing to develop her business and to acquire more irrigated land.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers to cultivate her land in order to grow organic corn

loans.name: Bazarbubu

texts.ru: Базарбубу 44 года, замужем, мать 5 детей. Базарбубу, в качестве основного дохода уже 10 лет занимается сельским хозяйством.  На сегодняшний день у нее есть 3 коровы, 10 овец. Ее ежемесячный доход - 7,700 сом (KGS). Базарбубу обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) для покупки овец, так как сейчас цены на скот ниже. Доходы от кредита позволят Базарбубу улучшить благосостояние и жилищные условия ее семьи.
texts.en: Bazarbubu is 44, married and the mother of five children. Agriculture has been her main souce of income for over ten years. She currently has three cows and ten sheep and earns 7,700 som (KGS) per month. Bazarbubu applied for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy sheep while livestock prices are low. The earnings from the loan will help Bazarbubu improve her family's living conditions and well-being.

loans.use: to buy some sheep in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Jose Noe

texts.es:
José, de 20 años de edad, es una persona muy responsable a su corta edad, siempre se ha dedicado a trabajar en la tierra junto a su padre, cultivando maíz y frijoles, vive aún con sus padres y otro hermano quien también se dedica al mismo rubro.

José, aprendió a cultivar cuando su padre lo llevaba a la milpa, luego decidió hacer sus propios cultivos y expresa que le va muy bien y que tiene mucha fuerza de trabajo por dar aún.

Con el préstamo José, comprara 2 sacos de abono, 2 sacos de sulfato de amonio, herbicida, grano certificado e insecticidas para sembrar.

En el futuro desea seguir produciendo sembrando.
texts.en:
José, at the young age of 20, is a very responsible person. He has always worked the land, along with his father, growing corn and beans. He still lives with his parents and another brother who does the same work.

José learned farming when his father brought him to the cornfield, and later he decided to grow his own crops. He says that it is going very well and that he has a lot of hard work yet to do.

With the loan, José will purchase two sacks of compost, two sacks of ammonium sulfate, herbicide, certified grain, and insecticide, in order to do the planting.

In the future, he wants to continue producing and planting.

loans.use: to purchase two sacks of compost, two sacks of ammonium sulfate, herbicide, certified grain, and insecticide, in order to do the planting.

loans.name: Elvie

texts.en:
Elvie works hard to support her family. She is married and has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her business.

Elvie has been in this business for 13 years now. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her business.

loans.name: Andreina

texts.es:
Andreina de 20 años de edad, se ha ganado el cariño de todos sus vecinos por su amabilidad y buen sentido del humor. 

Ama su familia, la cual es el motor principal para luchar cada día y generar el sustento para sobrevivir. Aunque no contaba con recursos para iniciar su negocio, esto no fue impedimento para cumplir su sueño de convertirse en comerciante, con un pequeño capital, esta mujer inició con un negocio de tienda de abarrotes.

Sus sueños no paran, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra surtido de productos de la canasta familiar para abastecer su negocio. 

Espera poder mejorar su condición económica, poder tener una vejez sin preocupaciones monetarias y garantizarle a su familia un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Andreina is 20 years old and has earned the love of all her neighbors for her freindliness and good sense of humor.

She loves her family, which is the principal motor of her daily struggle to generate the sustenance to survive. Though she could not count on the resources to initiate her business, this was no impediment to fulfilling her dream of converting herself into a merchant. With very little capital, this young woman launched her business, a grocery store.

Andreina's dreams haven't stopped. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of a selection of products from the family basket to re-stock her store.

Andreina hopes to be able to improve her economic condition and to reach old age without monetary preoccupations, and to guarantee her family a good future.

loans.use: purchase a selection of products from the family basket to re-stock her business.

loans.name: Lelis

texts.en:
Lelis is a 52-year-old member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative from Poblacion, Sapang Dalaga, Misamis Occidental, industriously caring for her fishing activities.  She is married and has one child.  She personally takes charge of their business, and their child works for them as support. The business is doing well.  Lelis has humbly taught her child the techniques of how to enjoy business and at the same time make earnings from it. The ups and downs of the business are nothing but a normal situation for her. Sometimes they have business losses, sometimes a good return. She is a savvy businesswoman. 

Now Lelis sees a good opportunity to expand their business. She is requesting PHP 10,000 from Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for capital to buy additional of dried fish. She deeply wishes for a good education for her child and for them to have businesses on their own.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of dried fish.

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz is 48 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, sugar, eggs, drinks and other personal care products.

Luz has been in this business for 20 years.  She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, sugar, eggs, drinks and other personal care products.

loans.name: Gulira

texts.ru: Гулира, 30 лет, замужем, она мать 3 детей. У нее высшее образование, работала в школе преподавателем, сейчас в декретном отпуске. В качестве дополнительного дохода на протяжении 7 лет занимается разведением скота и полеводством. В хозяйстве Гулиры есть корова и 10 овец. На участке мерою 0,74 Га она выращивает фасоль. Также на ежедневной основе продает молоко. Ежемесячная прибыль Гулиры составляет около 12,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) с целью развития ее бизнеса, а именно, на запрошенную сумму Гулира планирует приобрести удобрения и селитру для обработки почвы и выращивания органической фасоли. Доходы от кредита Гулира будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Gulira is 30 years old, married, and the mother of three children. She has a higher education. She has worked as a school teacher and she is now on maternity leave. For seven years she has reared livestock and grown crops for her main income. Gulira has a cow and ten sheep. She grows beans on a 0.74 hectare plot of land. She also sells milk on a daily basis. Gulira's monthly profit is about 12,000 som (KGS). She has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) with the aim of developing her business. In particular, Gulira plans to buy fertilizer and saltpeter with the requested sum in order to treat her plot of land and grow organic beans. Gulira will invest the proceeds from the loan in further developing her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and saltpeter to treat her land in order to grow organic beans.

loans.name: Isabel Maria

texts.es:
Isabel una persona emprendedora desde siempre, quien ha emprendido varios negocios con el fin de encontrar una sostenibilidad económica y sobre todo poder dedicar su tiempo a sus hijos, está incursionando en el mundo de la belleza con sus servicios de cepillado, maquillaje, arreglo de uñas, etc. Con el cual ha generado ingresos para sostener su hogar.

Espera crecer mucho más su negocio, en un futuro poder tener un gran local de belleza y posicionarse en el mercado de un forma segura.

Su dificultad más grande son los altos costos de los insumos.
El crédito será utilizado para adquirir productos como lacas, gel. Lociones capilares, y realizar una remodelación a su local actual.
texts.en: Isabel has always been an entrepreneur. She has started various businesses in order to have financial stability and, above all, be able to spend time with her children.  She has embarked on the world of beauty, offering hair brushing, make-up, nail grooming, and other services, which has generated income to support her household.  She hopes to grow her business much further and, in the future, be able to have a large beauty salon, and position herself securely in the marketplace.  Her greatest challenge is the high cost of supplies. She will use the loan to acquire products such as hairspray, gel, and hair lotion and to remodel her salon.

loans.use: to acquire products such as hairspray, gel, and hair lotion and to remodel her salon.

loans.name: Gladys Del Socorro

texts.es:
Unas cuantas libras de arroz, otras de frijoles, unas de azúcar y algunas bolsas de pan, fueron el inicio de Gladys de 36 años de edad, como comerciante en su negocio de pulpería. Trabajo que le ha ayudado salir adelante a ella, a sus dos hijos de quince y de seis años de edad y a su esposo, quien siempre le ha apoyado en su trabajo como cuidador. 
Afortunadamente ya tiene seis años de haberse establecido con mucho esfuerzo y siente que cada día va creciendo más. Por esta razón quiere invertir en su negocio y solicitar un préstamo para comprar arroz, frijoles, avena, azúcar, frijoles, salsas, entre otros productos para ofrecer en su pulpería. Con esto podrá surtir su pequeño negocio y ofrecer variedad. En sus planes esta llegar a tener una distribuidora grande.
texts.en:
With a few pounds of rice, beans, and sugar, and some bags of bread, Gladys—aged 36—started her grocery store and became a merchant. 

Her business has helped Gladys, her two children—aged 15 and 6—and her husband to get ahead. Her husband has always supported her by working as a security guard.

Fortunately, it's been six years since she set up her business with great effort. She feels that her business is growing every day, and, for this reason, she wants to invest in it. 

She is requesting a loan to buy rice, beans, oats, sugar, and salsas, among other products to sell at her grocery store. With this purchase, she will be able to stock up her small store and offer a variety of products.

She plans to become a wholesale distributor.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oats, sugar, and salsas among other products to sell at her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his farming through application of modern farming technology, to earn more income so as to improve family living standards.

loans.name: Altynkyz

texts.ru: Алтынкыз, 24 года, мама 2 детей, замужем. В качестве дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав свой бизнес в 2010 году. Благодаря упорному труду Алтынкыз, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 50 овец, также есть 2,0 ГА арендованной и 0,37 ГА собственной поливной земли, где она выращивает фасоль. Ежемесячный доход Алтынкыз составляет около 18,000 сом (KGS). Алтынкыз решила развивать свое дело и обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 110,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья бычков, также для покупки удобрений и топлива для обработки почвы. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, а также хочет накопить средства на ремонт дома и покупку автомобиля.
texts.en: Altynkyz is 24 year old, married, and the mother of two children. She rears animals and grows crops for income for her family, having started her business in 2010. Thanks to her hard work, today Altynkyz has 50 sheep and she also has 2.0 hectares of rented and 0.37 hectares of her own irrigated land where she grows beans. Altynkyz's monthly income is about 18,000 som (KGS). Altynkyz has decided to develop her business and has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 110,000 som (KGS) to increase her number of steers, and also to buy fertilizer to treat her land and fuel. She plants to invest the proceeds of the loan in further increasing her herd of livestock, and also wants to save up to renovate her house and buy a car.

loans.use: to buy steers, fertilizer to treat her land, and fuel.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy feed for her dairy cows and hopes this will enable her to get more milk to sell and make more profits to support her family.

loans.name: Kuken

texts.ru: Кукен, 56 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. Около 35 лет назад начала бизнес по разведению скота. На сегодняшний день у нее в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 2 лошади. На 4,25 Га земли она выращивает люцерну и пшеницу. На ежедневной основе продает вкусное, экологически чистое молоко. Совокупный среднемесячный доход составляет до 16,500 сом (KGS). Кукен обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы, для увеличения объемов реализации молока. Доходы от кредита позволят Кукен улучшить ее благосостояние, развить бизнес и отремонтировать автомобиль.
texts.en: Kuken is 56 years old, married, and the mother of three children. About 35 years ago she started a livestock rearing business. Today she has two cows and two horses. She grows alfalfa and wheat on 4.25 hectares of land. She sells tasty organic milk on a daily basis. Her gross average monthly income is up to 16,500 som (KGS). Kuken has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a dairy cow, to increase her milk sales volume. The proceeds from the loan will allow Kuken to improve her well-being, develop her business and repair her car.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow in order to increase her volume of organic milk sales.

loans.name: Luz Dary

texts.es:
Luz, a sus 56 años de edad, es una mujer carismática y servicial que se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una tienda de abarrotes que inició por la necesidad de generar ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia. 
A pesar de las adversidades, ella tuvo la fortaleza y la determinación para levantarse y seguir adelante y, gracias a ello lleva 4 años de trayectoria en esta actividad.
Trabaja todos los días durante 15 horas sola.

Su propósito en la vida es seguir progresando y por ello desea fortalecer su negocio acreditándolo con la compra de surtido de cervezas y gaseosas, de esta forma podrá ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor calidad y servicio, logrando aumentar notablemente sus ventas y los ingresos que recibe de sus ventas.

Luz manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo su negocio con la ayuda de Interactuar y en un futuro desea convertirlo en un supermercado, en el que los clientes puedan encontrar todos los artículos que necesiten. 

Apoyando a este crédito estarás contribuyendo con el emprendimiento de las mujeres Colombianas!
texts.en:
Luz, age 56, is a charismatic, service-oriented woman who runs her own business. She started a grocery store out of the need to earn more money to support her family. In spite of difficulties, she had the strength and determination to lift herself up and move ahead, and thanks to that, she's been in this line of work for four years now. She works by herself for fifteen hours every day.

Her mission in life is to keep making progress, and to do that, she wants to strengthen her business, enhancing it through increased inventory of beers and sodas. That way, she can offer her customers better quality and service, notably increasing her sales and income.

Luz says that he greatest goal is to keep growing her business with Interactuar's help and eventually convert it into a supermarket where her customer can find all kinds of goods that they need.

By supporting this loan, you will be contributing to the business ventures of Columbian women!

loans.use: expand her grocery store's selection of merchandise

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is 52 years old and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her store like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, etc.

Marivic has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her store like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, etc.

loans.name: Phontad Group

texts.en:
Bounlam’s village sources much of their drinking water from local wells, streams, and collected rainwater.  These sources of water are not safe to drink without treatment by boiling.  

Bounlam and her group are excited that the filter was available on a payment plan that made it much more affordable.  Treating drinking water requires cash and time, which now she can shift to other pursuits.  

Bounlam and her village also understand the impact unsafe drinking water has on their families' budgets. The filter is guaranteed for two years; within this two-year period, filter users, like Bounlam’s family, identify a substantial decrease in illness and associated medical costs.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Nonghai Group

texts.en:
Buaphan understands the difference the water filter can make for her family and for her group’s families.  Buaphan knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.  

The water filter Buaphan purchased will increase her family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood. The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.    

Buaphan is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for 2 years – so she and her group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Nhóm 03 Cụm 24 Thôn Tân Xã Quảng Nham Group

texts.en:
Mau is applying for a loan to purchase fish to resell. She has a retail business selling fish. Mau is 53 years old and she is married with three children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 03 cụm 24 thôn Tân xã Quảng Nham Solidarity Group, which consists of four members. Mau supports two dependents with her business in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2011, Mau joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. She has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. Mau has been involved in this business for six years. The main hardship that Mau faces in her business is the lack of capital. In the future, she hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell.

loans.name: Emmalyn

texts.en:
Emmalyn works hard to support her family. She is married with two children and has a business raising pigs in the Philippines.

Emmalyn requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Emmalyn has been in this business for three years now, and she also earns additional income from buying and selling ready to wear.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure a better future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Lorena

texts.es:
Lorena, con 41 años de edad vive en unión libre con su pareja. 
Actualmente se dedica a la venta de mercancía y productos de papelería en su almacén de variedades, ofrece cosméticos, accesorios, ropa, perfumes, entre otros y con esto ha logrado obtener recursos para aportar al sostenimiento de su hogar durante los tres años que lleva realizando dicha actividad. 

Es una mujer emprendedora, con visión, dedicada y comprometida con su familia y su trabajo, siempre busca oportunidades que le permitan progresar, por esa razón solicita el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de mercancía al por mayor como piñatería para aprovechar los descuentos que le realizan y ofrecer más variedad que satisfaga los gustos y necesidades de sus clientes y así poder tener mejor margen de utilidad por las ventas. 

De esta manera, Lorena podrá avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su objetivo primordial, que es ampliar su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Lorena, age 41, lives in a common-law marriage with her partner. She currently runs a shop selling a variety of paper products and other merchandise, including cosmetics, accessories, clothing, perfume, and more. For the three years she has run this business, she has been able to earn the money she needs to support her household.

She's an enterprising woman - dedicated, visionary, and committed to her family and her work. She is always looking for opportunities to get ahead, which is why she's requesting this loan. She plans to invest it in buying wholesale merchandise such as piñata supplies, taking advantage of the discounts that that offers and offering greater variety to meet the tastes and needs of her customers. This will give her a greater sales margin.

With this work, Lorena will be able to advance towards her root goal, which is to expand her store and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: stock her variety store with discounted wholesale merchandise

loans.name: Magnolia

texts.es:
Magnolia es una mujer de 34 años es casada y madre de tres hijos.

Ella es emprendedora, independiente, generosa, sensible, responsable y trabajadora. 

Su negocio de venta de ropa lo desarrolla en el municipio de Medellín; un área estratégica porque tiene un alto flujo comercial; es una vitrina de la producción de la pequeña y mediana empresa, la zona es una muestra del panorama típico comercial e industrial de la ciudad. 

Su vida la comparte con sus hijos y su esposo que trabaja y le ayuda con los gastos del hogar.

Actividad que realiza de forma muy responsable y dedicada.
Su sueño es incrementar sus ingresos económicos para abrir un almacén, ella desea realizar la compra de ropa al por mayor con el préstamo solicitado, para ofertar mayor variedad a sus clientes y aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Magnolia, age 34, is married and the mother of three children. She, her husband, and her children all live together. Her husband also works and they both help with the household expenses. Magnolia is enterprising, independent, generous, sensible, responsible, and hard-working. 

She runs her business selling clothes in the neighborhood of Medellín, a strategic area because of the high volume of commerce. It is a showcase of small- and medium-sized business output. The whole area shows off the commercial and industrial panorama that is typical of the city. She runs her business with responsibility and dedication.

Her dream is to increase her income enough to open a store. She wants to use this loan to buy clothing at wholesale so that she can offer greater variety to her customers and expand her sales.

loans.use: buy wholesale clothing

loans.name: Nohora Vilma

texts.es:
Nohora, de 51 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidida a salir adelante y tener una buena vida.

Ella se desempeña como vendedora de mercancía variada tales como ropa, accesorios como billeteras y algunos cosméticos, entre otros a través de catálogos.

Esta actividad la inicio con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para el sostenimiento de sus hijos.

Es una mujer emprendedora y muy disciplinada.

Ella solicita un crédito para comprar un amplio surtido de mercancía y de este modo tener inventario disponible para vender a sus clientes.

Tiene la esperanza de poder progresar como empresaria y tener unos ingresos más estables.
texts.en: Nohora, 51, is very clear about what she wants for her life, and she is dedicated to succeeding and having a good life.  She is a salesperson, and sells varied merchandise such as clothing, accessories such as wallets, some cosmetics, and other items through catalogs.  She started this activity because with the desire to find the resources she needed to support her children.  She is an enterprising and very disciplined woman.  She is requesting the loan to purchase a wide variety of merchandise and, in this way, have inventory available for her customers.  She hopes to be able to progress as a business woman, and have more stable income.

loans.use: to purchase a wide variety of merchandise and, in this way, have inventory available for her customers.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru: Светлана, 49 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. Много лет занимается животноводством и полеводством, мастер в своем деле. У Светланы высшее образование. По хозяйству активно помогают супруг и дети. Светлана достигла больших успехов в своем бизнесе. В хозяйстве имеет 19 овец. Также есть земельный надел 4,72 ГА собственной земли, где она выращивает фасоль для реализации. Совокупная прибыль Светланы составляет около 12,000 сом (KGS). Светлана обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита Светлана планирует и дальше направлять на развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Svetlana is 49 years old, married, and the mother of two children. She has reared animals and grown crops for many years and is a master in her field. Svetlana has a higher education. Her husband and children actively help her work. Svetlana has achieved great success in her business. She has 19 sheep, and she also has a plot of 4.72 hectares of her own land where she grows beans for sale. Svetlana's gross profit is about 12,000 som (KGS). Svetlana has applied to Bai Tushum bank for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock. Svetlana plans to keep directing the proceeds of the loan towards developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Jeniffer Monserrate

texts.es:
En  el Florón  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen  cada quince días los socias  del Grupo De Crédito Los Almendros, este es un lugar urbano marginal de la ciudad en la cual las personas son muy trabajadoras y responsables en sus obligaciones. 
En este lugar vive la señorita Jeniffer, tiene 19 años de edad, es soltera y vive en casa de los padres, ella está por ingresar a la universidad.
Doña Jeniffer es una joven muy luchadora que le gusta trabajar y con su esfuerzo ayudar con los gastos del hogar y de sus estudios, ella junto a su mamá tienen  una pequeña granja de pollos, en temporadas meten hasta 200 pollos los cuales los cría de dos a tres meses que es el tiempo que ya están listos para la venta, luego de este tiempo  los entrega a comerciantes y  también vende por libras por su casa, de esta forma ella se logra ganar algo que le sirve para continuar sus estudios realizando una labor que no le quita mucho tiempo.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar pollos, alimentos y medicinas para los pollos. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan a ella y todo el grupo. Sus sueños son terminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
The members of Grupo de Crédito Los Almendros [Almond Trees Credit Group] meets every two weeks in the Florón neighborhood in the city of Portoviejo. This a marginal urban place in the city where the people are hardworking and responsible in their obligations. This is where 19 year-old Jeniffer, who is single, lives in her parents' house and is about to start college. Jeniffer is a young woman with a fighting spirit who likes to work, and through her efforts, help with household and school expenses. 

She and her mother have a small chicken farm, in which they keep up to 200 chickens during some seasons. They raise the chickens for two to three months, which is when they are ready for sale. Then they give them to retailers, and also sell chicken by the pound from their home. In this way she is able to earn something which allows her to continue her studies and do work that doesn't take much time. 

She will use the new loan to purchase chickens, and feed and medicine for the chickens. She has been in the Credit Group from the start, and she likes it because of the support it gives her and the whole group. Her dream is to complete her studies.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, and feed and medicine for chickens.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana es una mujer de 50 años de edad es casada tiene una linda familia de tres hijas de las edades entre 19 y 29 años de edad, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de San Pablo Jocopilas.
Juana se dedica a la venta de tortillas en los tres tiempos, gracias a esta labor a sacador adelante a su familia, ella ahora tiene una necesidad de comprar láminas para mejorar el lugar donde ella vende, y comprar leñas para seguir preparando sus tortillas pero no cuenta con el dinero suficiente por tal razón solicita un préstamo.
Juana sueña con poder contar con un local donde ella pueda vender mejor y obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Juana is a 50-year-old woman.  She is married and has a lovely family with three daughters between the ages of 19 and 29.  This humble family lives in the community of San Pablo Jocopilas.

Juana works selling tortillas for the three daily meals.  Thanks to this work, she has gotten her family ahead.  Now she has a need to buy sheet metal to improve the place where she lives.  She also needs to buy firewood in order to keep preparing her tortillas, but she doesn’t have enough money, so she is asking for a loan.

Juana dreams of being able to have a little shop where she can sell better and get a better income.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting and firewood

loans.name: Luna Bella Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LUNA BELLA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Mirtha ella es casada y tiene 43 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de productos de belleza, la socia vende lápiz labiales, cremas y perfumes, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cremas, lápiz labial y perfumes.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de golosinas, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de librería.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These groups members belong to the Luna Bella communal bank.  This bank is located in the Cusco district, part of the Cusco province and Cusco department.

The featured member is Señora Mirtha.  She is married and is 43 years old.  She has four children.  She works in her business selling beauty products.  She sells lip pencils, creams, and perfumes.  She wants to get ahead by means of her business.  She is an enterprising woman and a real fighter.  She is asking for this loan to buy creams, lip pencils, and perfumes.

She is thankful to the people who are part of her dream in this way, and she is committed to making her payments on schedule.

The other group members work selling treats, selling clothing, running a small grocery store, and running a bookstore.

loans.use: to buy creams, lip pencils, and perfumes

loans.name: Enecita

texts.en:
Enecita is 58 years old and has twelve children. She is married and four of her children are still in school.

Enecita is in the agricultural business, raising a pig in the Philippines. Enecita requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

Enecita has been in this business for two years now and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Romeo

texts.es:
Romeo, de 47 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a la venta de pupusas, tienen un hijo de 18 años de edad, que ya no estudia pero que trabaja.

Romeo, trabaja como motorista público desde hace tres años, aprendió a manejar desde muy pequeño con su papá, no tiene otras actividades económicas, antes tenia una tienda y su horario es desde las 6:00 a.m. hasta las 5:00 p.m.

Romeo, necesita el crédito para comprar maíz, frijol, aceite, quesillo y otros productos que serán para la venta diaria, con el préstamo podrá mejorar su negocio.

Los sueños de Romeo, son pintar su casa y mejorar su condición económica, para darle la oportunidad de superarse a su hijo.
texts.en:
Romeo, 47, studied until the ninth grade. He lives with his partner, who makes pupusas [stuffed tortillas]. They have an eighteen-year-old son who is no longer studying, but who works. 

Romeo has worked as a public driver for three years, having learned to drive with his father at a very young age. He doesn't have another job. Previously, he had a store.  His schedule is from 6:00 A.M. until 5:00 P.M.

Romeo needs the loan to purchase corn, beans, oil, fresh cheese, and other products that will be for the daily sales, and with the loan he will be able to improve his business.

Romeo’s dreams are to paint his house and improve his economic condition in order to give his son the opportunity to succeed.

loans.use: to purchase corn, beans, oil, cheese, and other products that will be for the daily sales.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Jocelyn works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling fish.  Jocelyn is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. for her general store business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 30 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dreams, to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college and save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Hello lenders! Meet Judith, 22 years of age and a very hardworking and self-driven farmer who is based in Kipkaner a remote village in Kapsowar. This region has harsh weather patterns, and poultry farming is the only profitable business venture that thrives.

Judith is happily married and blessed with a beautiful family. For the past three years, she has been involved in mixed farming, and her primary sources of income have been selling milk and crop farming. She passionately loves poultry farming though. When asked what is most enjoyable about farming, her reply was “selling eggs”. Her biggest challenge is the lack of funds to increase her poultry farming.

She is seeking a loan to buy additional poultry. Poultry farming is the only business that thrives in the Kapsowar area because of the harsh weather patterns, so she wants to take full advantage of the poultry business.

Judith is a member of Tuturung Self-help Group and through the group, she has received training on financial management and saving. Through the loan, she will sell eggs to the local market and to her neighbors, hence improving her living conditions and getting out of the poverty situation she is in currently. Profits from the loan will be used in repaying the loan and increasing her business.

loans.use: to buy additional poultry.

loans.name: Elsa Andrea

texts.es:
En  el Florón  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen  cada quince días los socias  del Grupo De Crédito Los Almendros, este es un lugar urbano marginal de la ciudad en la cual las personas son muy trabajadoras y responsables en sus obligaciones. 
En este lugar vive la señora Elsa, tiene 68 años de edad, hace varios años su compañero de toda su vida falleció y quedo viuda, pero de esta relación tuvo seis  hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, un hijo que es discapacitado vive con ella. 
Doña Elsa es una mujer que le gusta ganarse lo suyo y así salir adelante ella sola con su hijo, ella se dedica al comercio,  vende ropa y productos Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas), este tipo de ventas las realiza en sus ratos desocupadas ya que ella también tiene un pequeña tercena en el mercado central, allí vende pollo ya sea por libras o enteros. A pesar de que el trabajo es cansado ella lo realiza por su bien y el de su hijo. Lleva muchos años con este negocio el cual le permite salir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, perfumes y pollos. Esta desde el inicio en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son de mucha ayuda. Sus sueños son tener salud para ella y su hijo.
texts.en:
The members of the credit group Los Almendros meet every fifteen days in the Florón area of the city of Portoviejo. This is a marginal urban part of the city in which people are hard working and responsible in their duties.

Elsa, 68, lives here. Several years ago her husband and life companion died and she was left a widow. From the relationship, she has six children who are already adults. One child, who is disabled, lives with her.

Elsa is a woman who likes to earn her own keep so that she and her son can get ahead. She works in commerce selling clothes and Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and women's accessories). She does this during her free time and she also has a small butcher shop in the central market where she sells chicken whole and by the pound. Although the work is tiring she does it for the sake of herself and her son. She has been working for many years in this business, which has allowed her to get ahead.

This loan is to buy clothing, perfumes and chickens. Elsa has been with the credit group from the start. She likes it because the loans are a big help. Her dream is that she and her son be healthy.

loans.use: buy clothing, perfumes and chickens.

loans.name: Darlen

texts.en:
Darlen is 53 years old and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

Darlen has borrowed and repaid 24 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from charcoal retailing and fattening pigs. Darlen aspires to save enough money to expand her businesses.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Zhanylcha

texts.ru: Жанылча, 51 год, замужем, дети взрослые и самостоятельные. У нее средне-специальное медицинское образование. По характеру: трудолюбивая, честная, заботливая. В качестве дохода для своей семьи, уже 15 лет Жанылча занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Жанылчи, в хозяйстве есть земельный надел мерою 2,28 ГА, на котором она выращивает органический картофель и фасоль для реализации. Она также занимается рукоделием, шьет на заказ национальные изделия. Вся деятельность приносит около 9,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жанылча обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян картофеля. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства и хочет накопить на постройку сарая.
texts.en: Zhanylcha is 51 years old. She is married, and her children and grown up and independent. She has a secondary specialist medical education. She is hard-working, honest, and caring by her nature. Zhanylcha has been rearing animals and growing crops to get income for her family for the last 15 years. Thanks to her hard work, Zhanylcha has a 2.28 hectare plot of land on which she grows organic potatoes and beans for sale. She also does needlework, sewing national products to order. All this activity brings her about 9,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to further develop her business, Zhanylcha has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy potato seeds. She plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further increasing her business and wants to save up to build a barn.

loans.use: to buy seeds in order to grow organic potatoes.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El es un joven de 35 años de edad es casado, necesita una cirugía refractiva ya que desde los nueve años fue diagnosticado con miopía y astigmatismo en ambos ojos, tras una valoración oftalmológica el especialista le comenta que es candidato al procedimiento quirúrgico, para el es muy importante poder dejar sus lentes de manera definitiva. Desgraciadamente sus recursos son limitados y él es el único sostén en su familia.
texts.en:
This borrower is 35 years old and is married.  He needs refractive surgery because 9 years ago he was diagnosed with myopia and astigmatism in both eyes, and after an ophthalmologic evaluation, the specialist stated that he is a candidate for a surgical procedure.  For him, it is very important that he can 
permanently eliminate the need to wear lenses.  Unfortunately his resources are limited, and he is the only source of support for his family.

loans.use: to obtain ophthalmological services

loans.name: Phungheng Group

texts.en: Naykhou’s village sources much of their drinking water from local wells, streams, and collected rainwater. These sources of water are not safe to drink without treatment through boiling. Naykhou and her group are excited that the filter was available on a payment plan that made it much more affordable. Treating drinking water requires cash and time, which now she can shift to other pursuits. Naykhou and her village also understand the impact unsafe drinking water has on their family’s budgets. The filter is guaranteed for two years; within this two years filter users, like Naykhou’s family, identify a substantial decrease in illness and associated medical costs.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his farming through application of modern farming technology

loans.name: Phanomxai Group

texts.en: Vieng understands the difference the water filter can make for her family and for her group’s families. She knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.  The water filter Vieng purchased will increase her family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood. The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available. Vieng is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for two years so she and her group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come. Children pictured are children of borrowers in the picture.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Nhóm 02 Kp4 Lam Sơn Group

texts.en:
Hạnh works in the agricultural industry, raising pigs, and has been involved in the business for more than 10 years. One of the challenges her business faces is a lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby pigs to raise and sell.

Hạnh is 57 years old, and she is married with one child. She lives and works in the Bim Son district, an urban area in the Thanh Hoa province. She is the leader of a 3-member group, the Nhóm 02 KP4 Lam Sơn solidarity group. In 2014, Hạnh joined the Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business, and she has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa.  

With her business' profit, Hạnh hopes to do well, maintain a successful business, and have her family be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more pigs to raise and sell.

loans.name: Koudkaxo Group

texts.en:
Seesavad’s village sources much of its drinking water from local wells, streams, and collected rainwater. These sources of water are not safe to drink without treatment by boiling.  

Seesavad and his group are excited that the filter was available on a payment plan, which made it much more affordable. Treating drinking water requires cash and time, which now Seesavad can shift to other pursuits.  

Seesavad and his village also understand the impact unsafe drinking water has on their family’s budgets. The filter is guaranteed for two years. Within these two years, filter users, like Seesavad’s family, should experience a substantial decrease in illness and associated medical costs.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter, so he can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 57 years old, and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

Melanie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, shampoo, soap, milk, coffee, drinks, juice, bread, etc.

Melanie has borrowed and paid back five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from selling rice. Melanie aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, shampoo, soap, milk, coffee, drinks, juice, bread, etc.

loans.name: 05 Lạch Trường Hải Lộc Group

texts.en:
Gương operates a food stall selling fruit. She is requesting a loan to purchase fruit to resell. Gương has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

Gương is 46 years old and she is married with two children. She is the group leader of the 05 Lạch Trường Hải Lộc solidarity group, which consists of four members. In 2014, Gương joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business. She has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa. 

With her business profit, Gương hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: to purchase fruit to resell.

loans.name: Mercy Monserrate

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito Amigas Trabajadoras se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Rocafuerte lugar  conocido por la gran variedad de dulces que se preparan en este lugar y que son reconocidos  a nivel nacional por su delicioso sabor.
En este lugar vive la señora Mercy, tiene 55 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos mayores de edad que viven en su casa pero en departamentos in dependientes. Su esposo es Ing. Civil.
Doña Mercy es una mujer que le gusta ganarse lo propio para salir adelante, ella tiene un almacén en el cual vende semillas, fertilizantes, insecticidas, alimentos de aves y chanchos, así como también medicinas y químicos utilizados en la agricultura y cría de animales, trabaja todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 18h00, sus ventas son muy buenas ya que son muchos los agricultores que hay en la zona que siempre le compran a ella ya que les da muy buenos descuentos y facilidades de pago a los que ya son más conocidos, lleva más de 4 años con su negocio y sus ventas cada vez son mayores.
Este crédito es para comprar alimentos y medicinas para animales. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos se ayuda mucho. Sus sueños son cada día mejorar su negocio.
texts.en: The credit group "Amigas Trabajadoras" meets every 15 days in the canton Rocafuerte, a place known for its variety of sweets that are prepared in this place and are known nationally for their delicious taste. In this place lives Mercy, who is 55 years old and married with two adult children living at home, but in independent sections. Her spouse is a civil engineer. Mercy is a woman who likes to make it on her own to succeed. She has a store in which she sells seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, and bird and pig food, as well as medicines and chemicals used in agriculture and animal raising. She works every day from 8AM to 6PM. Her sales are very good since many farmers who live in the area always buy from her, because she gives them good discounts and payment terms. She has over 4 years with this business and her sales keep growing. This loan is to buy food and medicine for animals. Mercy has been in the credit group since the beginning and likes it because the loans are a big help. Her dream is to improve her business every day.

loans.use: to buy food and medicine for animals

loans.name: Nhóm 05 Kp2 Lam Sơn Group

texts.en:
Hường is 42 years old and is married with two children. She is the leader of a three-member group, the Nhóm 05 Kp2 Lam Sơn solidarity group. She lives and works in Bim Son district, an urban area in Thanh Hoá province.

Hường works in agriculture, raising poultry. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that she faces is the lack of capital.

In 2014, Hường joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business. Hường has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. Now she is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future.

With her business profit, Hường hopes to maintain a successful business. She hopes for her business to do well  and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future

loans.name: Merie

texts.en:
Merie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a rug making business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more materials like fabric, thread, etc. for her business.

Merie earns additional income from pig fattening. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more materials like fabric, thread, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Namoyon

texts.ru: Намоён спокойная и умная женщина. Ей 49 лет. У нее двое детей. Один сын и одна дочка. Сыну 20 лет, а дочку 17 лет. Ее дети взрослые и умные. Человеку нелегко прожить после потеря любимого человека. Намоён после смерти мужа начала зарабатывать на жизнь. Раньше ее муж зарабатывал и обеспечил семью. Сейчас сама Намоён старается, чтобы прокормить детей. Она занимается продажей одежды на рынке. Намоён уже получила опыт, и продвигает бизнес вперед. Она 8 лет занята этой делом. Намоён решила расширить бизнес. Она просит кредит для перевоза летную детскую и женскую одежду. Намоён надеется с расширением бизнеса увеличиться доход и позволит детям новые экономические возможности.  В будущем Намоён планирует открыть еще одну торговую точку для сына. Она надеется на Вашу поддержку. Вы можете ее поддержать сейчас.
texts.en:
Namoyon is a calm and intelligent woman. She is 49 years old. She has two children: a son and a daughter. Her son is 20 years old, and her daughter is 17. Her children are grown up and clever.

It is not easy for a person to go on living after losing a loved one. Namoyon began earning a living following the death of her husband. Previously her husband earned money and provided for the family. Now Namoyon herself strives to feed her children. She sells clothing at the market. Namoton has already gained experience, and is moving her business forwards. She has been doing this work for eight years.

Namoyon has decided to expand her business. She is asking for a loan to bring in children's and women's summer clothing. Namoyon hopes that with the expansion of her business her income will increase, and this will give her children new economic opportunities. In the future, Namoyon plans to open another retail outlet for her son. She hopes for your support. You can help her now.

loans.use: to expand her business and bring in children's and women's summer clothing for sale.

loans.name: Monalyn

texts.en:
Monalyn is 37 years old and married with four children. Her four children are still in school, and Monalyn works very hard to provide for them.

Monalyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 18,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, shampoo, soap, milk, coffee, drinks, juice, bread, etc. She has been in this business for five years. 

Monalyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items of groceries to sell like canned goods, shampoo, soap, milk, coffee, drinks, juice, bread, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more clothing inventory to meet client needs and those of her family.

loans.name: April

texts.en:
April is 34 years old, and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

April runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of items like canned goods, soft drinks, noodles, diapers and other personal care products.
