April has borrowed and paid back five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns an income from selling fish and salt.

April aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of items like canned goods, soft drinks, noodles, diapers and other personal care products.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is married with two children, and she works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fishing materials like fishing net, gasoline for her boat, and maintenance for her business.

Nida has been in this business for 30 years now. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing materials like fishing net, gasoline for her boat, and maintenance for her business

loans.name: Noniluna

texts.en:
Noniluna is a 49-year-old married woman with three children, one of whom is currently in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur with a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She has requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase ingredients like spices, meat, vegetables, fish, etc. for her business.

Noniluna has been in this business for eight years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like spices, meat, vegetables, fish, etc. for her business

loans.name: Gladys Ruth

texts.es:
La socia Gladys Ruth se sigue dedicando al trabajo como profesora de niños,la socia por medio de este trbajo quiere sacar adelante a su familia.La socia solicita el credito para comprar una cocina para su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Gladys Ruth is still dedicated to her work as a teacher. Through this work she wants to support her family. She is requesting this loan to buy a stove for her house. She is happy for the loan and promises to meet the payment fees.

loans.use: to buy a stove for her house

loans.name: Jesus Carlos

texts.es:
El socio Jesus Carlos se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de repuestos de computadora y tambien tiene un trabajo como tecnico de computadoras,el socio por medio de estos trabajos quiere sacar adelante a su familia.El socio solicita el crecito para compras repuestos de computadoras como mouses,teclado y computadora.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Member Jesus Carlos still works selling computer parts, and also holds a job as a computer technician. Through his work, this member provides for his family. 

He is requesting this loan to buy computer parts and mouses, keyboards, etc. This member is happy with his loan and promises to comply with his payment terms.

loans.use: to buy computer parts, mouses, keyboards, etc.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
La socia Marina se sigue dedicando al negocio de atencion y administracion de restaurante,la socia es una mujer emprendedora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere que sus hijos que terminen de estudiar, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant grande. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollo, verduras, arroz y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Member Marina still runs her restaurant. She is an enterprising woman whose goal is for her business to allow her to put her children through school. Her dream is to have a bigger restaurant. 

This member is requesting a loan to buy chicken, vegetables, rice, and meat. She is happy with her loan and promises to comply with her payment terms.

loans.use: to buy chicken, vegetables, rice, and meat.

loans.name: Patmahan

texts.ru: Патмахан, 61 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитали 3 детей. У Патмахан- средне-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она работает главным бухгалтером, также экономистом по совместительству, заработная плата составляет 18,438 сом (KGS). Также в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы. Патмахан решила в этом году сделать дома ремонт, поэтому она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку клея, краски, замены труб и навеса в доме. Доходы Патмахан планирует вложить в дальнейшее улучшение жилищных условий и покупку скота.
texts.en: Patmahan is 61 years old, married, and together with her husband has raised three children. Patmahan has a secondary specialist education. She works as a chief accountant as her family's main source of income, and she also works as a part-time economist. Her salary is 18,438 som (KGS). She also has two cows. Patmahan has decided to renovate her house this year, and so she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy glue and paint, and to replace her house's pipes and roofing. Patmahan plans to invest her income in the future in further improving her living conditions and buying livestock.

loans.use: to buy glue and paint for renovations and to change the pipes and roofing in her house.

loans.name: Kalongtai Group

texts.en: Sone was excited that the filter was available on an affordable payment plan. Sone and her group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies. Charcoal, firewood, and bottled water were discussed and priced out over 2 years. They also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne diseases. After totaling up the costs, Sone and her group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families. The water filter is guaranteed for 2 years, but it is known to function for up to 5 years. (children pictured are children of borrowers)

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters for access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Mery Anselma

texts.es:
La socia Mery Anselma se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de golosinas, la socia es una mujer emprendedora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a su familia. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar chupetes,chicles, caramelos y galletas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Member Mery Anselma still works selling sweets. This borrower is an enterprising woman whose goal is for her business to allow her to support her family. 

This member is requesting a loan to buy candy, chewing gum, lolly pops, and cookies. She is happy with her loan and promises to comply with her payment terms.

loans.use: to buy candy, chewing gum, lolly pops, and cookies.

loans.name: 020303070004 Trung Hải-Hoằng Than Group

texts.en:
Thảo is a fisher-women. She is requesting a loan to purchase nets to catch fish for sale.

She is 48 years old and is married with three children. She is the group leader of the 020303070004 Trung Hải-Hoằng Than solidarity group, which consists of seven members. Thảo lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2002, Thảo joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid six loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. Thảo has been involved in the fishing business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that she faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Thảo hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to sustain a successful business, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase nets to catch fish for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and certified seeds

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina is 41 years old, single, and works hard to support her parents.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from a butcher shop. Angelina is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like peanut, sugar, milk, flour, etc for her food vending business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Angelina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Amna

texts.en:
Amna sells sheets, tablecloths, and linens from her home-based store. She is a divorced ‎mother who has succeeded in supplementing her income with her business. ‎

Amna needed this loan to renew her stock and incorporate summer products in her store.‎

Currently Amna is also preparing for the busy time before Ramadan. She wants to save the extra ‎profits and use her earnings to invest in her children’s education.‎

loans.use: to renew her stock and incorporate summer products.‎

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia Felicitas se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ferreteria,la socia es una mujer emprendedora que por medio de ste negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a su familia.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar clavos, pinturas y alambres.

La socia esta feliz con el credito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Felicitas, the member, still works selling hardware. She is an enterprising woman who wants to help her family get ahead by means of her business. She is requesting a loan to buy nails, paints and wires.

The member is happy to receive a loan and promises to comply with loan repayment terms.

loans.use: buy nails, paints and wires.

loans.name: Las Floresitas Group

texts.es:
Silvia es una mujer de 42 años de edad, casada, tiene 4 hijos de 8, 12, 20 y 24 años, y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, organizada, constante, activa, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la localidad ‘Cotoca’ situada al este de la ciudad junto al río a una distancia de 20 kilómetros, Es un pueblo conocido por sus excelentes trabajos en cerámica, y por el ‘sonso’: plato típico de queso y yuca.
Silvia es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello largo negro lo usa amarrado por detrás, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza (la segunda de la derecha, viste blusa rosada y pantalón blanco). Su vida la comparte con su esposo que trabaja como empleado y con sus hijos; los 2 mayores estudian y trabajan y los 2 menores estudian en la escuela, viven en un cuarto propio construido de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de ladrillo que cuenta con agua de pozo extraída mediante bomba, energía eléctrica y no cuenta con alcantarillado.  La necesidad de ayudar a estudiar a sus hijos la llevó a formar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de ropa de segunda mano, venta de comida, venta de sábanas, venta de pan, venta de queso, venta de huevos, servicio de taxi moto y servicio de plomería para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus actividades. Su negocio es la venta de productos cosméticos de marca. Su rutina consiste en visitar oficinas y comercios ofreciendo productos de excelente calidad para el cuidado de la belleza en general y accesorios de moda, a través de revistas y catálogos, fuera del ambiente común de ventas, “la venta directa es uno de los ambientes con mayor movimiento donde cada comerciante toma decisiones importantes en base de su propia estrategia y situación particular…”, comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes continuos, la desventaja es la falta de capital de inversión para ampliar su oferta de productos. Su sueño es abrir una tienda distribuidora de cosméticos, ella desea realizar la compra de productos cosméticos por mayor. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Silvia solicita un préstamo para la compra de cosméticos por mayor para abrir una tienda distribuidora y con los beneficios hacer estudiar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Silvia is a married 42 year old woman who has four children, ages 8, 12, 20 y 24.  Her business is cosmetics sales.  She is a good mother, innovative, organized, tenacious, active, responsible and very hard working.  She has developed her business in "Cotoca" to the east of the city 20 kilometers near a river.  It is a town known for its ceramics and for "sonso", a typical meal of cheese and yucca.  

Silvia has a dark complexion, dark eyes, long black hair which she braids, is not tall and her native language is Guarani, which is spoken at home.  She speaks Spanish in public and for business.  (Second from the right, wearing a pink blouse and white pants).  She shares her life with her husband who also works, and with her children.  The older two study and work and the younger two study in school.  They live in their own home made of brick and mortar with a corrugated tin roof and a brick floor.  They use well water from a pump, have electricity and do not have a sewage system.  

The need to help her children study brought her to form a group of people with businesses such as: second hand clothing sales, food sales, sheet sales, bread sales, cheese sales, egg sales, motor taxi service and plumbing service to apply for a loan and improve their lives.  Her business is the sale of brand name cosmetic products.  Her routine consists of visiting offices and businesses and offering beauty products of excellent quality as well as fashion accessories.  "Direct sales is one of the environments with the most activity where every salesperson makes important decisions based on their own strategies", she says.  The advantage of her business is that she counts on continuous clients.  The disadvantage is the lack of capital to invest to increase her inventory.  

The is the first sequence of loans with the institution in two years that will develop this activity.  For these reasons Silvia is asking for a loan for the purchase of wholesale cosmetics to open a distributor location and use the profits to help with her children's studies.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics wholesale to open a store. The income would be for her children's studies.

loans.name: Shaha...

texts.en:
Shaha, who Is in his early 30s, is married with one small kid.  He has been selling stationary, electronic payment service, maximalipo, Tigo pesa, M-pesa and Airtel money for 2 1/2 years now.  He works from 08 am to 9.30 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Shaha’s second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loan to increase his business and has paid back his loan successfully. He used the profit to take care of his family, loan repayment and covered household expenses.  

He will use this loan to operate an internet cafe and to buy a photo machine for three minute service.  He dreams of opening another office for selling electricity products and a business of Tigo pesa and M-pesa sales.

He will make sure he pays back his loan according to the loan scheduled.

loans.use: to operate an internet cafe and to buy a photo machine for three minute service

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia Ana Maria se dedica al negocio de venta de ferreteria,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia,la socia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora y su sueño de la socia es ampliar su negocio de ferreteria.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar clavos, pinturas y alambres.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ana Maria makes a living from a hardware store business. Through this business she wants to bring her family out ahead. She is a very hard-working and entrepreneurial woman, and her dream is to grow her hardware store. She is requesting the loan to purchase nails, paint, and wire.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make the payments of her loan.

loans.use: to purchase nails, paint, and wire.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es:
La socia Ernestina se dedica al negocio de venta de golosinas, la socia es una mujer emprendedora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante asu familia. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar chupetes, caramelos,chicles y galletas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Ernestina works selling sweets. She is an enterprising woman who wants to help her family get ahead by means of this business. She is requesting a loan to buy lollipops, candy, gum and cookies.

She is happy to receive a loan and promises to comply with loan repayment terms.

loans.use: buy lollipops, candy, gum and cookies.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
La socia Edith  se dedica al negocio de guía de turismo,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia,la socia quiere ampliar y abrir otra agencia de viajes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar unas sillas para su agencia de viajes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Edith works as a tour guide. She wants to help her family get ahead by means of this business. She wants to expand and open another travel agency. She is requesting a loan to buy chairs for her travel agency.

She is happy to receive a loan and promises to comply with loan repayment terms.

loans.use: buy chairs for her travel agency.

loans.name: Pastora Dolores

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito Amigas Trabajadoras se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Rocafuerte lugar  conocido por la gran variedad de dulces que se preparan en este lugar y que son reconocidos  a nivel nacional por su delicioso sabor.
En este lugar vive la señora Dolores, tiene 31 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 11, 8  y 1 año, los  mayores estudian en escuela. El marido trabaja en metalmecánica.
Doña Dolores en esta ocasión realiza el crédito para que su esposo lo utilice en su trabajo, él tiene un taller en el cual realizan arreglos y construcción de carrocerías un automóviles y todo tipo de vehículos, el trabaja con ayuda de dos personas a quienes les paga un sueldo semanal por su labor. Ella por su parte trabaja en  una pequeña tienda que tiene en su  casa. Gracias a los créditos que ellos reciben de la institución salen adelante y por eso agradecen a la fundación y a quienes hacen posible que ella pueda recibir su crédito.
Este crédito es para comprar metales, pinturas y víveres para  surtir su tienda. Lleva tres ciclos  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos les ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son seguir adelante y darles lo mejor a sus pequeños.
texts.en:
The credit group Amigas Trabajadoras meets every fifteen days in the Rocafuerte Canton, a place known for the great variety of sweets that are prepared there and that are known at a national level for their delicious flavor.

In this place lives Dolores. She is 31 years old and maintains a civil union from which she has three children who are 11, 8, and 1 year old. The older children study in school. The husband works in the metallurgical industry.

On this occasion, Dolores is taking out the loan for her husband to use in his work. He has a garage in which they do repairs and the construction of bodywork on cars and all types of vehicles. He works with the help of two people to whom he pays a weekly salary for their work. For her part, she works in a small store that she has in her home. Thanks to the loans that they are receiving from the institution, they are succeeding and because of this they are thankful to the foundation and to those who make it possible for her to be able to receive her loan.

This loan is to purchase metals, paint, and supplies to supply her store. She has been with the credit group for three cycles and she likes it because the loans help them a lot. Her dreams are to continue on and provide the best to her children.

loans.use: to purchase metals, paint, and supplies.

loans.name: Ritchelle May

texts.en:
Ritchelle May is 25 years old and is married with one child.  She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,500 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Ritchelle May has borrowed and repaid 5 loans from NWTF. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns income as a food vendor. She aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Irshad's Group

texts.en:
Irshad is 45 years old and lives with her five children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

Her son owns a vehicle service business and provides the services to change the seat covers of vehicles. He purchases ready-made seat covers and stitches as well. His shop is situated in the vehicle’s workshop market. He finds his customers one-by-one by offering them to change their seat covers. His business is going very well because he is an expert and very professional in what he does. He can quickly change the seat covers so that his customers don't need to wait for long. 

So far he has provided services for motorbikes seats only and now he wants to extend to various cars as well. For this purpose he wants to buy various colors and types of car seat samples to show to his potential customers. 

Irshad is proud of her son and wants to help him financially. She requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so that her son could buy the various types of samples. Irshad thanks Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy seat cover samples and materials for her son's vehicle service business

loans.name: Khonekhuang Group

texts.en:
Somchid’s village sources much of its drinking water from local wells, streams, and collected rainwater. These sources are not safe to drink without treatment (by boiling). 

Somchid and her group were excited that the filter was available on a payment plan that made it more affordable. Treating drinking water requires money and time, which she can now shift to other pursuits. Somchid and her village also understand the impact unsafe drinking water has on family budgets. The filter is guaranteed for 2 years, during which time they hope to identify a substantial decrease in illness and associated medical costs.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters for access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Solomon

texts.en:
Hello lenders, meet Solomon, an active 31-year-old smallholder farmer from Kaborok in Kenya. Solomon is involved in multiple agricultural activities with a special focus on poultry farming. A poultry farm is fairly easy to start and run and he has not experienced major challenges in this field except for transportation.

Solomon is seeking a loan to buy an Indian motorcycle with a carrier to transport his produce to and from the market. Having a motorcycle will help Solomon grow his business as he would be able to have a deeper market reach. He can also generate additional income to pay the loan by offering transportation services on his motorcycle. 

This loan will give Solomon the opportunity to grow his business and earn additional income to improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for farm transportation

loans.name: Asida

texts.ru: Асида, 45 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. У Асиды - высшее образование, работает в Государственном Медицинском Институте начальником отдела кадров, начинала свою деятельность в качестве кассира. На сегодня ее заработная плата составляет 23,490 сом (KGS). Асида обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дверей, кафеля, обоев и прочего для проведения ремонта в доме. Асида является лидером группы "ГМИ", в которой всего состоят 3 человека. Доходы Асида планирует вложить в дальнейшее улучшение жилищных условий и свадьбу сына.
texts.en: Asida is 45 years old, married, and the mother of three children. Asida has a higher education and she works for the State Medical Institute as the head of the Personnel department, having started out as a cashier. Her current salary is 23,490 som (KGS). Asida has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy doors, tiles, wallpaper and other items to carry out a renovation of her house. Asida is the leader of the "GMI" [State Medical Institute] group which comprises three people in total. Asida plans to invest her income in further improving her living conditions and her son's wedding.

loans.use: to buy doors, tiles, wallpaper and other items in order to renovate her house.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
La socia Eva  se dedica al negocio de venta de productos de belleza, la socia es una mujer trabajadora que por medio de estos negocios quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los productos de belleza. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar cremas,sombras de ojos, lápiz labiales y perfumes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Member Eva works selling beauty supplies. She is a hardworking woman whose goal is for her business to allow her to provide for her children. This member's dream is to have a retail space where she could set up her business and sell her beauty supplies. 

This member is requesting a loan to buy creams, eye shadow, lipstick, and perfume. She is happy with her loan and promises to comply with her payment terms.

loans.use: to buy creams, eye shadow, lipstick, and perfume.

loans.name: Mariluz

texts.es:
La socia Mariluz se sigue dedicando al negocio de cafetin,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia.La socia solicita el credito para comprar tortas,pasteles y gelatinas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Mariluz partner still works in a café. By means of this business she wants to help her family get ahead. She is requesting the loan to buy cakes, pies and jellies.

She is happy to receive a loan and promises to comply with the loan repayment terms.

loans.use: buy cakes, pies and jellies.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de celulares,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia,el sueño de la socia es abrir otra tienda de venta de celulares.La socia solicita el credito para comprar celulares.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sandra continues making a living from her business selling mobile phones. Through this business she wants to bring her family out ahead. Her dream is to open another store selling mobile phones. She is requesting the loan to purchase mobile phones.

She is happy because of the loan and promises to complete the loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase mobile phones.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
La socia Eva se sigue dedicando al negocio de elaboracion de tortas,bocaditos y pasteles para eventos como matrimonios,bautizos y cumpleaños,la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que por medio de estos negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a su familia.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar harina,manteca,mantequilla y huevos para la elaboracion de tortas y bocaditos.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Member Eva still works baking cakes and pastries for special events like weddings, baptisms, and birthdays. This member is an enterprising woman and a hard worker whose goal is for her business to allow her to support her family. 

This borrower is requesting a loan to buy flour, lard, butter, and eggs to make cakes and pastries. She is happy with her loan and promises to comply with her payment terms.

loans.use: to buy baking ingredients.

loans.name: Fátima Noemi

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito Amigas Trabajadoras se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Rocafuerte lugar  conocido por la gran variedad de dulces que se preparan en este lugar y que son reconocidos a nivel nacional por su delicioso sabor.
En este lugar vive la señora Fátima, tiene 57 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos mayores  de edad, uno de ellos aun vive en su casa. Su esposo es maestro jubilado.
Doña Fátima es una mujer muy luchadora que le gusta trabajar para salir adelante, ella es maestra y trabaja en una escuela de la localidad pero también se dedica al comercio, vende carteras, perfumes y otros productos, ella les vende a las madres de familia que van a la escuela donde labora y también sale a vender en sus ratos libres, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual le deja muy buenas satisfacciones.
Este crédito es justamente para comprar carteras, perfumes, entre otras cosas. Está desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos. Sus sueños son tener su casa terminada.
texts.en:
The Credit Group of Hardworking Friends gets together every two weeks in Canton Rocafuerte, a place known for the variety of sweets that are prepared here and are recognized nationally for their delicious flavor.  In this place lives Senora Fatima, who is 57 years old, is married and has three older children, one of whom lives with her.  Her husband is a retired teacher.  

Dona Fatima is a hardworking woman who likes to work in order to come out ahead.  She is a teacher and works in a local school but she also is a business person.  She sells wallets, perfume and other products.  She sells them to the mothers of the families that attend the school where she works and she goes out to sell in her free time.  She accepts credit from her customers and charges every week.  She has been doing this for ten years, which has been very satisfying.  

This loan is to purchase wallets, perfumes and other items.  She has been a member since the inception of the Credit Group and she like it for the help that the get with the loans.  Her dream is to finish her house.

loans.use: to purchase wallets, perfume, etc.

loans.name: Gulzada

texts.ru: Гулзада, 34 года, замужем,есть дочь. У Гулзады - высшее образование, работает в Государственном Медицинском Институте старшим преподавателем. Ее заработная плата составляет 27,743 сом (KGS). Гулзада обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку труб, кафеля, обоев, дверей и прочего для проведения ремонта в доме. Гулзада является участником группы "ГМИ", в которой всего состоят 3 человека. Доходы она будет вкладывать в улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en: Gulzada is 34 years old, married, and has a daughter. Gulzada has a higher education and she works for the State Medical Institute as a senior teacher. Her salary is 27,743 som (KGS). Gulzada has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy pipes, tiles, wallpaper, doors, and other items to carry out a renovation of her house. Gulzada is a member of the "GMI" [State Medical Institute] group which comprises three people in total. She will invest her income in improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy doors, pipes, tiles, wallpaper and other items in order to renovate her house.

loans.name: Reyna Ester

texts.es:
Reyna es una mujer de 22 años de edad es casada tiene una hija, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de San Pablo Jocopilas.
Reyna con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la venta de tortillas, ella tiene ocho años de realizar esta labor.
Reyna es una de las mujeres que lucha día con día para superarse, es por ello que ahora ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para comprar maíz por quintal y leña para seguir elaborando las deliciosas tortillas y obtener mejores ganancias.
El gran sueño de Reyna es seguir construyendo su casa y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Reyna is 22 years old, and she is married with one daughter. This humble family lives in a community in San Pablo Jocopilas.  In an effort to earn an income and provide for her family, Reyna sells tortillas . She has been doing this work for eight years. 

Reyna is one of the women who fight to succeed every day. That is why she has now made the decision to request a loan to purchase corn by the quintal [about 100 lb. /46 kg] and firewood, in order to continue making the delicious tortillas and obtain better earnings.

Reyna’s great dream is to continue building her house and improving her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase corn by the quintal and firewood, in order to make tortillas.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 36 years old, is married, and has one child, who is still in school. Rosalie is in the agricultural business and farms rice in the Philippines. She requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farming supplies.

Rosalie has been in this business for 5 years now, and she has borrowed from NWTF to sustain her business 5 times in the past. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farming supplies.

loans.name: Gulnura

texts.ru: Гулнура, 41 год, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее - высшее образование, работает в Государственном Медицинском Институте заместителем директора. Ее заработная плата составляет 26,753 сом (KGS). Гулнура обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку труб, кафеля, обоев и прочего для проведения ремонта в доме. Гулнура является участником группы "ГМИ", в которой всего состоят 3 человека. Доходы она и дальше планирует вкладывать в улучшение жилищных условий, а также в образование ее детей- школьников.
texts.en: Gulnura is 41 years old, married, and the mother of two children. She has a higher education and works as a deputy director for the State Medical Institute. Her salary is 26,753 som (KGS). Gulnura has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy pipes, tiles, wallpaper and other items to carry out a renovation of her house. Gulnura is a member of the "GMI" [State Medical Institute] group which comprises three people in total. She plans to continue to invest her income in improving her living conditions and also in educating her school-age children.

loans.use: to buy pipes, tiles, wallpaper and other items in order to renovate her house.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is a 57-year-old married woman with eight children, two of whom are still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur with a food vending business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Rosario has been in this business for three years. She would like to save enough money to be able to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Kaenglouang Group

texts.en:
Chantha understands the difference a water filter can make for her family and her group’s families. 

The local water sources require boiling before consumption and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources. The water filter Chantha purchased will increase her family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing the amount of money spent to buy charcoal to boil the water or reducing the time and cost foraging for firewood. The filter will also eliminate the need to purchase bottled water.

Chantha is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter has a 2-year guarantee. She and her group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so her family can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Audomxai Group

texts.en:
Eai and her group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies. Charcoal, firewood, even bottled water were discussed and priced out over two years. Eai and her group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. 

After totaling up the costs, Eai and her group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families. The water filter Eai and her group purchased is guaranteed for two years but is known to function for up to five years. Eai is excited because the filter was available on an affordable payment plan.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.
